src_text: Ndangulo ya tshiwo nga murahu ha miḓalo.
tgt_text: Ulawulo lweentlekele emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Khabinethe yo swikisa maipfi ndiliso kha vhathu vhoṱhe vhe vha ṱutshelwa nga  vhafunwa vhavho kha miḓalo ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane ine ya kha ḓi tou bva vha hone zwenezwino kha zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango ḽashu, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Zwa ḓivhadzwa ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka na maga thuso ya ṱhaḓulo kha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano zwe zwa itwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, zwo livhiswa kha vhona uri hu khou vha na maga khwaṱhaho nahone tshimbidzwaho zwavhuḓi vhukati ha masia oṱhe muvhuso hu tshi shumiswa  Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo ya Lushaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ithi mabalale ngenxeba bonke abantu abaswelekelwe zizihlobo zabo kwezi zikhukhula zakutsha nje zenze umonakalo omkhulu bezithwaxe iindawo ezithile kweli lizwe lethu, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Masheleni linganaho R1 biḽioni a ṋetshedzwa nga muvhuso khou shumiswa kha tikedza ndingedzo dza mvusuluso na ṱhaḓulo vhuedzedza tshumelo dza mutheo khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa vhuthu nga vha ṋea zwiḽiwa, maḓi, vhudzulo, tshumelo dza vhuthathazwitzhili na zwiambaro..     Mushumo wa dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa fhethu ho tshinyadzwaho nga miḓalo kati, ngeno vhathu vha shango ḽashu vha tshi khou farana vha vha ṅanda nthihi kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha thusa avho vho tshinyalelwaho nga mahaya na thundu dzavho.
tgt_text: Ukubhengezwa kweMeko yeNtlekele kwiZwelonke kunye namanyathelo oncedo kwezentlalo nakwezoqoqosho abhengezwe nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuneenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho intsebenziswano emandla nebambeneyo kuwo onke amaqoqo karhulumente, ngokusebenzisa iZiko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele.

src_text: Mafhungo maswa nga ha Vhulwadze ha Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Le mali iyibhiliyoni yeerandi ikhutshwe ngurhulumente iza kusetyenziselwa ukuncedisa kumaphulo oncedo nawohlangulo, ukubuyisela iinkonzo ezisisiseko kunye nokunikezela uncedo olunxulumene nentlalontle yabantu olufana nokutya, amanzi, iindawo zokufihla intloko, ugutyulo kunye neempahla zokunxiba.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha khathihi na vhilaedzwa nga engedzea ha zwenezwino  ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga vairasi ya COVID-19 kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa  shango nahone khou  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela ḓitsireledza kha vairasi iyi re khombo ngaurali, nga maanḓa nga tshifhinga tsha vhuriha.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokwakha kwakhona iindawo ebezichaphazelekile sele iqalile njengoko abantu belizwe lakuthi bathe bafunquka ngobuninzi babo bafaka isandla kwabo amakhaya abo adilizwe zizikhukhula baze futhi balahlekelwa nazizinto zabo.

src_text: Vairasi iyi khou bvela phanḓa na vha khombo tshifhinga tshoṱhe nahone muhaelo ndi wone une swika zwino wa vha tshone tshiṱhavhane tsha vhuhali tsha ḓitsireledza.
tgt_text: Ezakutsha malunga nesiFo seNtsholongwana ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Khabinethe khou takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha khou bvela phanḓa na nanga muhaelo sa tshone tshipileli tshavho tsha thoma kha COVID-19 nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dzo sumbedza uri ro swika kha ḽiga ḽa nṱhesa ḽa fhirisa phesenthe dza 50 dza vhaaluwa vho haelwaho kha mavunḓu maṱanu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalatyisiwe kukunyuka kwenani labantu abosulelwe yi-COVID-19 kutsha nje kwiindawo ezithile kweli lizwe kwaye ibongoza bonke abantu ukuba bathathe amanyathelo okuzikhusela kule ntsholongwana ingubhubhane, ingakumbi ngeli xesha lasebusika.
Le ntsholongwane iseyingxaki kuthi sonke kwaye inye indlela yokuyilwa nokuzikhusela kuyo, kukugonya.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha avho vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ite ngauralo itela uri vha kone ḓitsireledza khathihi na tsireledza vhafunwa vhavho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukubona abantu abaninzi beqhubeleka besebenzisa amachiza okugonya njengezona zixhobo zokuzikhusela kwi-COVID-19 njengoko iingxelo zakutsha nje zichaza ukuba kumaphondo amahlanu ngabantu abadala abangaphezulu kwe-50% asele begonyiwe.

src_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya thivhela dwadze ḽa COVID-19, hu tshi katelwa na zwa ambara maski une wa thivhedza mulomo na ningo ṱamba zwanḓa nga maḓi na tshisibe kana shumisa sanithaiza ya zwanḓa re na aḽikhohoḽi linganaho 70%, khathihi na sia tshikhala tshi linganaho mithara muthihi vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu..     Magavhelo Ṱhaḓulo ya Thambulo  kha Vhadzulapo (SRD) .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela abo bangekagonyi ukuba baye kugonya ukuze bakhusele bona kunye nezihlobo zabo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha wanaho Magavhelo masheleni linganaho R350 SRD uri vha dovhe vha ite khumbelo hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha musi ho thoma shumiswa milayo miswa langaho zwa itwa ha khumbelo idzi khathihi na zwa vha muthu tewaho nga wana magavhelo aya.
tgt_text: Kufuneka futhi siqhubeleke nokuthobela imiqathango yokuthintela i-COVID-19, equka ukunxiba isifonyo esigquma impumlo nomlomo, ukuhlamba izandla ngamanzi anesepha okanye ukusebenzisa isibulala-ntsholongwane esine-alkhoholi eyi-70%, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho umgama oyimitha enye phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Khumbelo dzi nga itwa kha webusaithi ya Zhendedzi ḽa Thuso ya zwa Masheleni kha Vhadzulao ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SASSA) ine ya vha https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: IsiBonelelo sezeNtlalo soNcedo (i-SRD).

src_text: Sisiṱeme ya ita khumbelo yo vula nga ḽa 23 Lambamai 2022 nahone khumbelo  dzenedzo dzi itwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho ya didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone  wanala phindulo nga ṱavhanya..     Magavhelo ṱhaḓulo tshikwama tsha ndeme tsha thuso ya zwa masheleni kha miṱa shayaho ye ya vha tshi ḓo vha kha nyimele konḓaho vhukuma nga mulandu wa vhushai na shayea ha mishumo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemi beli abafumana isiBonelelo se-SRD esiyi-R350 ukuba baphinde bafake izicelo kwakhona kulandela ukuqaliswa kwemigaqo emitsha eza kulandelwa xa kuphicothwa izicelo kujongwa ukuba umntu ufanelekile na ukuba afumane esi sibonelelo.

src_text: Muvhuso wo ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa matshilisano kha avho vha sa koni ḓiitela uri na vhone vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza mutheo.
tgt_text: Izicelo kufuneka zifakwe kwiwebhusayithi ye-Arhente yoMzantsi Afrika yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo (i-SASSA) ethi: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Tsireledzo na Vhutsireledzi.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokungenisa izicelo yavulwa ngomhla wama-23 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 kwaye yonke iqhutywa ngobuxhaka-xhaka be-intanethi into leyo iza kwenza ukuba ikhawuleze..     Isibonelelo soncedo sibalulekile ukunceda amakhaya angathathi ntweni engethwaxwa kanobom yindlala nentswela-msebenzi ukuba besingekho.

src_text: Khabinethe khou bvela phanḓa na sasaladza zwa vhulawa ha vhafumakadzi nga nḓila ya tshiṱuhu nahone khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhukando ho dzhiwaho nga ṱavhanya nga vhaofisiri vha zwa mulayo ha fara vhahumbulelwa malugana na lufu lwa Mufumakadzi Vho Hillary Gardee (28), vha fhaḽa Kamagugu kha ḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uzimisele ukunikezela ngezibonelelo kubantu abangathathi ntweni ukuba bakwazi ukufumana izinto ezisisiseko zokuziphilisa..     Ukhuselo nokhuseleko.

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya sasaladza mabulayo vhathu vha rathi ngei Khayelitsha, hune ha vha fhaḽa Cape Town.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhubeleka nokugxeka kabukhali umkhuba wokubulawa kwamabhinqa ngolunya kwaye iyawubulela umsebenzi owenziwe ngamagosa olwaphulo-mthetho athe abamba ngokukhawuleza abarhanelwa abakrokrelwa ngokubulala uNksz Hillary Gardee (obeneminyaka engama-28 ubudala), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Mabulayo aya tshiṱuhu ngaurali tou vha tshihumbudzi tsha uri hu kha ḓi vha na zwinzhi zwine ra kha ḓi tea ita sa vhadzulapo itela fhelisa zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi khathihi na khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu hu tshi katelwa na mabulayo vhathu vha tshifumakadzi (GBVF)..     Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni uri vha shumisane na muvhuso kha lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga na GBVF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakugxeka kunye nokubulawa kwabantu abathandathu eKhayelitsha.

src_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu khathihi na magondo ashu vhe tsireledzeaho kha vhathu vhoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa vhaaluwa, vhafumakadzi na vhana..     Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Lo mkhuba wokubulawa kwabantu ngolunya usikhumbuza ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela ngokubanzi kunye nobo busekelwe kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (i-GBVF).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa lwa tshiofisi ha ḽimaga ḽa foroma zwidina ḽa Corobrik Kwastina ngei Driefontein kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 4 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu elizweni ukuba basebenzisane norhulumente kwidabi lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ne-GBVF.

src_text: Ḽimaga iḽi ḽa maimo nṱha ḽi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R800 miḽioni, zwine hezwi zwa khou tshimbila khathihi na maṅwe masheleni linganaho R200 miḽioni ane khou lavhelelwa ḓo engedza mishumo ya khonkhirithi ya vha ha Corobrik ngei KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Xa sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuba bakhuselekile abantu kunye neendawo abahlala kuzo, abo bantu baquka abantu abadala, amanina kunye nabantwana..     Ezoqoqosho.

src_text: Corobrik ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mabindu fhano hayani a fhindula khuwelelo ya Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ye vha ita kha mabindu fhano Afrika Tshipembe na dzitshaka uri bindudze kha ikonomi ya ḽino shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa ngokusesikweni komzi-mveliso wokwenza izitena wakwa-Kwastina Corobrik ose-Driefontein e-Gauteng nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wesi-4 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwa uri ikonomi ya gesemaḓi ine ya khou  aluwa yo wana thikhedzo khulwane nga rwelwa ṱari ha tshiendedzi tsha ṱhiraka shumisaho gesemaḓi nga vha ha Anglo American.
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso wale mihla uyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluxabisa izigidi zeerandi ezingama-800, oluhambisana nolunye lwezigidi zeerandi ezingama-200 ezibekelwe ukwandisa umzi-mveliso wakwa-Corobrik oKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Tshiendedzi itshi tsha ṱhiraka, tshe tsha shandukiswa bva kha tsha shumisa diziḽi ya kha tsha gesemaḓi, nahone tshi shumisa na beṱiri dza lithium-ion, tshi tou vha tshone tsha thoma ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: U-Corobrik yenye yeenkampani eziliqela zeli ezithe zasabela ikhwelo elahlatywa nguMongameli Ramaphosa kwinkampani zoMzantsi Afrika nezehlabathi ukuba zityale imali kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     IKhabhinethi ithethile nangomba wecandelo lehaydrojini elikhulayo elithe lahlutshezwa nayiloli ehamba ngehaydrojini yakwa-Anglo American.

src_text: Ikonomi ya gesemaḓi yo ṱaluswa sa tshithu tsha ndeme kha ikonomi sa tshikafhadzi mupo wa shango ḽashu khathihi na kha ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi na sika mishumo..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafu ya ṱanganedza vhuṅwe vhubindudzi kha ikonomi yashu bva kha khamphani ya zwiḽiwa ya Ireland ine ya ḓivhiwa sa The Kerry Group ye ya vula ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽi ḓuraho masheleni swikaho R650-miḽioni ngei Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal ḽiṋe ḽa ḓo bveledza zwiḽiwa zwine zwa nga shumiswa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Le loli – ebikade ihamba ngedizili yaza yatshintshwa yayesebenzisa ihaydrojini futhi isebenzisa neebhetri ze-lithium-ion – yeyokuqala elolu hlobo ehlabathini.

src_text: Heḽi ndi ḽimaga ḽo khetheaho ngauri ḽi na zwishumiswa zwinzhi zwo khwaṱhaho zwine zwa katela na zwishumiswa zwi shumisaho fulufulu ḽiṱuku, vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha masana ḓuvha itela fhungudza shumiswa ha muḓagasi bvaho kha netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya henefho fhethu kuvhanganywa ha mufhiso wo no shumaho kuvhanganywa ha maḓi nga nḓila yavhuḓi shumisa hafhu na phungudzo.
tgt_text: Icandelo lehaydrojini lityuntywe njengalamanye abalulekileyo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kuqoqosho lweli olungenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, kunye nokukhokela kumaphulo okukhulisa uqoqosho nawokudala imisebenzi..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yalubulela notyalo-mali olwenziwe yinkampani yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, evule umzi-mveliso oxabisa imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-650 e-Hammersdale, kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal, inkampani leyo iza kuvelisela eli lizwekazi ukutya ngendlela engazikwenza monakalo kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Ḽimaga ḽa The Kerry Group ḽo vha hone fhano Afrika Tshipembe bva nga ṅwaha wa 2011, nahone vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa vhune ḽa vhu ita ndi tshiga tsha uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha fhethu havhuḓi ha ita zwa vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso ufana wodwa kuba usebenzisa iintlobo zobuxhaka-xhaka obungenzi monakalo kokusingqongileyo obuquka izixhobo ezingatyi mbane kakhulu, ukuvelisa umbane ngemitha yelanga ukuze ungatyi kakhulu umbane oveliswa liziko lombane leli, ukuvelisa amandla okuzifudumeza kusetyenziswa inkunkuma, ukuqokelelwa, ukusetyenziswa kwakhona kunye nokuphungulwa kwamanzi asetyenziswayo ngendlela ehlakaniphileyo.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu khou vha hone nga murahu ha rwelwa ṱari zwa magwa ha tshiendedzi tsha luṱanḓala tsha Isuzu D-Max ngei Gqeberha kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha ṅwedzi wo fhelaho.
tgt_text: Le nkampani yakwa-Kerry Group yaqala ukusebenza eMzantsi Afrika ngowama-2011, futhi ukutyala kwayo enye imali kubonakalisa ukuba uMzantsi Afrika lilizwe elithandwayo ngabatyali-mali.

src_text: Lushaka luswa lwa D-Max lu khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha ha Isuzu kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nahone ndi iṅwe ya mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa nga fhasi ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mveledziso ya Vhubveledzi ha Mimoḓoro (APDP).
tgt_text: La maphulo otyalo-mali alandela kanye emva kokuba kuveliswe i-bakkie eluhlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eGqebera eMpuma Koloni kule nyanga iphelileyo.

src_text: APDP ndi tshikimu tsha magavhelo vhubveledzi kha nḓowetshumo ya mimoḓoro tsho livhiswaho kha ṱuṱuwedza vhubveledzi nga vhunzhi kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro yo tiwaho ṱuṱuwedza nyengedzedzo ya ndeme kha tshipiḓa tsha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro  zwine hezwi zwa  fhedza nga sika mishumo kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhubveledzi ha mimoḓoro nga angaredza.
tgt_text: Olu hlobo lutsha lwebakkie luyi-D-MAX lubonisa phandle ukuba abakwa-Isuzu bazimisele ukuzinza eMzantsi Afrika kwaye luyeminye yemisebenzi emihle ezelwe yiNkqubo yokuPhuhlisa iMizi-mveliso yeziThuthi (i-APDP).

src_text: Masheleni swikaho R2,8 biḽioni ḓo bveledzwa kha zwa vhubveledzi ha zwibveledzwa zwa fhano hayani nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi APDP tshi kha ḓi vha hone.
tgt_text: I-APDP sisibonelelo secandelo lezithuthi esenzelwe ukunyusa umthamo wezithuthi eziveliswayo , into leyo eza kukhwezela necandelo leentsimbi zeemoto ngolo hlobo kudaleke imisebenzi kuwo onke amashishini achaphazelekayo kwicandelo lezithuthi.

src_text: Vhubindudzi uvhu vhu ḓo sika mishumo ya vhukuma fhiraho 1 000 kha ḽimaga ḽeneḽo ya dovha hafhu ya thola vhathu vha linganaho 24 000 henefho nga thungo tsini na ḽimaga, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo vha shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha bveledza zwitshavha henefho kha dzingu ḽeneḽo..     Indaba ya zwa Migodi.
tgt_text: Imali eqikelelwa kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-2,8 iza kwenziwa kumashishini avelisa iintsimbi zeemoto alapha ekhaya ngoku isaqhubeka ukusebenza i-APDP.

src_text: Indaba ya Bindudza kha Migodi ya Afrika ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa  Cape Town International Convention Centre bva nga ḽa 9 swika nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022, ndi tshiṅwe tsha tshikhala tshihulwane tsha nyambedzano na tshumisano vhukati ha vhashumisani vhoṱhe vha kwameaho zwa kha nḓowetshumo ya migodi.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luza kudala imisebenzi engaphezulu kwe-1 000 eza kuvela ngqo kulo mzi-mveliso luze ludale neminye engama-24 000 kwamanye amacandelo asebenzisana neli, into leyo iza kuphelisa intsokolo kubantu balo mmandla.

src_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo yo vha tshi ri: “Tshanduko kha zwa Migodi ya Afrika bindudza kha Tshanduko ya Fulufulu, ESG, na Dziikonomi”.
Khabinethe na fulufhelo ḽa uri iyi Indaba ya zwa Migodi ḓo thusa kha ṱana bveledzisa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu ho teaho ita zwa vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yezeMigodi.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ṱanganedza vhubindudzi kha shango ḽashu nahone ḽo ḓiimisela bveledza nyimele dzavhuḓi hu tshi itelwa nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na tshanduko ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yokuTyala iMali kwezeMigodi e-Afrika yowama-2022 ibibanjelwe kwiZiko laseKapa leNgqungquthela zeHlabathi ukususela ngomhla wesi-9 ukuya kowe-12 kuCanzibe 2022, yenye yeendibano ezinkulu yokudibana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwawo onke amahlakani akwicandelo lemigodi.

src_text: Vhushaka ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Umxholo wale ngqungquthela ubusithi: “Ukutshintsha kweMigodi e-Afrika: Ukutyala imali kwiMithombo eMitsha yaMandla, i-ESG kunye noQoqosho”.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza nyambedzano dza zwenezwino dza vhukati ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa na Phresidennde Vho Joe Biden vha shango ḽa Amerika, Phresidennde Vho Emmanuel Macron vha ḽa Fura khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Hakainde Hichilema vha ḽa Zambia kha miṱangano yavho yo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba le Ngqungquthela yezeMigodi iza kubonisa futhi ithengise noMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliphambili elinamathuba otyalo-mali.

src_text: Hedzi nyambedzano dzo ita uri Phresidennde vha kone khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha mashango mavhili khathihi na tshumisano vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango vhashumisani nga ha mafhungo ndeme dzitshaka na dzingu, hu tshi katelwa na wana thandululo ya mulalo kha nndwa ya fhaḽa Ukraine     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyawamkela amaphulo otyalo-mali eza kweli kwaye uyathembisa ukuba uza kudala iimeko ezifanelekileyo eziza kukhuthaza uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye neenguqu kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     Ubudlelwane namazwe ehlabathi nawengingqi.

src_text: Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uqhakamshelwano uMongameli Ramaphosa abenalo noMongameli Joe Biden wase-United States, uMongameli Emmanuel Macron wase-France kunye noMongameli Hakainde Hichilema wase-Zambia esebenzisa amaqonga awahlukeneyo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha thetshelese Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama nga mihasho ya muvhuso ya lushaka na Ofisi ya Phresidennde itela uri vha kone hwesa muvhuso vhuḓifhinduleli..     Nga tshifhinga tsha Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama, mihasho yoṱhe ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo zwa puḽane na zwipikwa zwayo zwa ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Olu qhakamshelwano lunike uMongameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwane nentsebenziswano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika nala mazwe angamahlakani wawo kwimiba engundoqo etya le ngingqi nehlabathi, equka ukusombulula ungquzulwano oluse-Ukraine     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Hedzi Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama ndi dzine dza lingedza vhona uri masheleni muvhuso khou shumiswa zwavhuḓi itela swikela ṱhoḓea dza vhadzulapo..     Dzi dovha hafhu dza ṋea tshikhala tsho teaho kha Dziminisṱa uri vha kone dodombedza nga vhuḓalo mushumo wa muvhuso, hu tshi katela na mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho khathihi na khaedu dzine dza vha hone..     Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha Gese ya Peṱiroḽiamu yo Luḓifhadzwaho (LPG).
tgt_text: IiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha LPG  ye ya anḓadzwa itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022 uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi beli ukuba bamamele iintetho zeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali lwamasebe esizwe karhulumente kunye nolwe-Ofisi kaMongameli ukuze bakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba urhulumente bambeke phantsi kweliso ngenene..     Ngethuba kuqhutywa ezi ntetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali, onke amasebe aza kunika iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngezicwangciso zawo kunye nezinto aza kuzikhokelisa phambili kulo nyaka.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ndi ine ya khou lingedza alusa nḓowetshumo iyi ya LPG kha shango.
tgt_text: IiNtetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba imali yombuso isetyenziswa ngobunono kwizinto ezifunwa luluntu.

src_text: LPG ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha vha hone ha zwiko zwo fhambanaho zwa fulufulu..     Puḽane iyi, vhukati ha maṅwe maga u lugisa zwithu ḓo langa mitengo kha nḓowetshumo yoṱhe khathihi na tikedza vhubveledzi ha maboḓelo LPG kha shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya gudisa vhadzulapo nga ha mbuelo dza shumisa LPG sa luṅwe lushaka lwa fulufulu ḓo wanala nga murahu ha musi yo no anḓadzwa nga Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu kha www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Zikwanika ithuba nabaPhathiswa ukuba bacacise ngokupheleleyo umsebenzi karhulumente, kuquka izinto ezenziwe ngempumelelo kunye nezo ziseyimingeni.

src_text: Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza  Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa iRhasi Elulwelo (i-LPG).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba siqalise ukusebenza isiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa i-LPG, esasipapashwe ngenyanga yoKwindla yowama-2022 ukuba uluntu luhlomle kuso.

src_text: Muhanga uyu ndi une wa khou lingedza eletshedza sekhithara dzoṱhe ya muvhuso na ya phuraivethe kha vhona uri pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dzi khou tsireledzwa, sa zwe zwa sumbedziswa kha Mulayotewa wa Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe wa.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokwandisa icandelo le-LPG kweli lizwe.

I-LPG iza kunceda kakhulu kwiphulo lokuqinisekisa ukuba sineentlobo ezahlukeneyo zamandla..     Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siza kubeka imithetho eza kulawula ukubekwa kwamaxabiso kumashishini akweli candelo size sixhase nokuveliswa kwamagadlela e-LPG kweli lizwe, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza tshishumiswa tshine tsha ḓo thusa kha fheliswa ha zwikonḓisi zwa khethululo kha zwa dzhia tsheo, nga maanḓa idzo dzine dza elana na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha hafhu wa eletshedza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali uri vha ḓivhe nga ha pfanelo dzavho sa zwe dza tsireledzwa nga Mulayotewa.
tgt_text: Siza kufundisa noluntu malunga nezinto eziluncedo ngokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza vhupfumbudzi, mivhigo kha nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na tsivhudza vhathu tshitshavhani nga ha pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha wa ita uri Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali thome shuma.
tgt_text: Siza kufumaneka emva kokuba sipapashiwe liSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa naMandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽone ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho idzi Thendelano dza Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali khathihi na Maitele UN kha Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu na Pfanelo dza Vhathu dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali (Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali Afrika).
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Muhanga uyu wo vha hone nga murahu ha vhukwamani na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho, hu tshi katelwa na vha Khoro ya Mveledziso ya Ikonomi na Mafhungo zwa Vhashumi ya Lushaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokusebenza njengesikhokelo sokunceda icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente ukuba aqinisekise ukuba akhuselekile amalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo, njengoko noMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 usitsho.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo Nnyi na nnyi nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela, wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Esi scwangciso-qhinga sisixhobo esiza kunceda xa kuguzulwa imiqobo ecalulayo xa kuthathwa izigqibo, ingakumbi ngokumayelana nabantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Tsheo dza nga ha Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Mavu Nnyi na nnyi nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe.
tgt_text: Senzelwe kwanokufundisa abantu abakhubazekileyo ngamalungelo wabo akuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Yo ṋea ndaela ya uri hu dovhe hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na vhaṅwe vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sikwanceda nangoqeqesho, indlela amajelo eendaba anika iingxelo ngazo kunye nokufundisa uluntu ngamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo vha wone maṱhakheni  mushumo we wa itwa ṅwaha wo fhiraho, we wa ita khumbelo ya mahumbulwa bva kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho vho fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Sikwazalisekisa izithembiso ezikwiPhepha eliCacisa uMgaqo-nkqubo wamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamazwe atyikitya isiVumelwano seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) samaLungelo Abantu Abakhubazekileyo kunye nesiVumelwano se-UN soXwebhu lwase-Afrika lwamaLungelo oLuntu nawaBantu abaKhubazekileyo (isiVumelwano samaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo e-Afrika).

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ndi ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi ya Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana fhaḽa Durban International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 15 swika Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Onke amahlakani afanelekileyo ebelinikiwe ithuba lokuhlomla kwesi sicwangciso-qhinga, kuquka neBhunga leSizwe loPhuhliso lezoQoqosho nezaBasebenzi (i-Nedlac).

src_text: Ndi lwa tou thoma musi Dzangano ḽa zwa Vhashumi ḽa Dzitshaka (ILO) ḽi tshi farela muṱangano uyu fhano kha ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu.

src_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango, dziminisṱa vha swikaho 120, vhuimeli ha masia mararu ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya ILO swikaho 187, mazhendedzi UN, zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo, madzangano vhadzulapo, madzangano ane sa vhe muvhuso, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na vhadzulapo vha khou lavhelelwa vha hone kha muṱangano uyu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kubanjwe iNgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo dovha hafhu ha ṋea  Afrika Tshipembe tshikhala tsha bvisela khagala Mulayotewa wa shango sa izwi tshi tsireledza pfanelo dza vhana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele iPhepha elinoLuvo ngoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngeyoKwindla.

src_text: Shango ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa davhidzana na mashango fhambanaho ane no vha phanḓa fhirisa riṋe kha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha vhana hu itela uri ri kone vha na zwine ra nga guda bva kha mashango ayo.
tgt_text: Iye yalela ukuba kufuneka usasazwe kumahlakani afanelekileyo ukuba nawo alihle amahlongwane.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM).
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kwenzeka ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa kulo nyaka uphelileyo, obuquka ukufuna izimvo zamahlakani awahlukeneyo     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM ngei Mpumalanga nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu na ane tea sala murahu”.
tgt_text: INkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Sa tshikhala tsha ndeme tsha shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo, Imbizo iyi ṋea tshikhala Phresidennde tsha amba na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho vho tou livhana navho, nga maanḓa zwitshavha zwa mahayani, khathihi na thetshelesa thaidzo dzavho na khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo itela uri dzi kone tandululwa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha iNkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana e-Durban International Convention Centre kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natala ngeCawe, umhla we-15 ukuya ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM yo livhiswa kha vula zwikhukhulisi zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo yo ṱanganelaho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo ya nga DDM.
tgt_text: Kokokuqala uMbutho wezaBasebenzi weHlabathi (i-ILO) ubamba le nkomfa e-Afrika..     INtloko zamazwe, abaphathiswa abali-120, amahlakani angunxantathu amazwe ali-187 angamalungu e-ILO, ii-arhente ze-UN, amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente, amajelo eendaba kunye noluntu kulindeleke ukuba azimase le nkomfa..

src_text: MaAfrika Tshipembe vha nga tevhela na shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano dza kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano nga fhasi ha hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Lo msitho uza kunika uMzantsi Afrika ithuba lokuba uqhayise ngoMgaqo-siseko wawo okhusela amalungelo abantwana.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika.
tgt_text: Eli lizwe liza kubamba iingxoxo namazwe ahlukeneyo asele ehambe umgama omde kwidabi lokulwa ukuqeshwa kwabantwana njengabasebenzi lize lifunde kuwo.

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ha Ṅwedzi wa Afrika na Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 25 Shundunthule vhu khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ṅwaha wa Pfushi khwaṱhisedza zwa konḓelela kha zwa pfushi na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika”..     Sa tshipiḓa tsha bono ḽa tshifhinga tshilapfu ḽe ḽa sumbedziswa kha Adzhenda ya 2063 (ine ya vha pulane ya mveledziso ya Afrika hu tshi itelwa swikela mveledziso ya ikonomi na matshilisano ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone katelaho vhathu vhoṱhe lwa miṅwaha fhiraho 50), thero iyi sedzesa kha vhukoni ha vhathu vha Afrika, nga maanḓa ho sedzeswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhatukana na vhasidzana khathihi na vhana.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweziThili (i-DDM).

src_text: Hezwi ndi zwa ndeme kha mveledziso sa zwi zwi tshi livhisa kha khwinifhadzea ha matshilo vhathu, mbuelo dza nṱha na miholo yo khwinifhadzeaho ya mashango.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphonsa uza kubamba Imbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kuCanzibe 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Masingashiyi namnye ngasemva”.

src_text: Tsha ndeme khulu nahone tshi vhonalesaho kha mabembela aya Ṅwedzi wa Afrika, ndi Vhege ya Vhudavhidzani ya Afrika, ine ya ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Constitutional Hill kha ḽa Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 23 swika ḽa 27 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Njengokuba le iyindibano ebalulekileyo enika uluntu ithuba lokuthatha inxaxheba, le Mbizo iza kunika uMongameli ithuba lokuba athethe ngqo namahlakani ahlukeneyo – ingakumbi abantu basemaphandleni – aze amamele imiba kunye nemingeni ngeenjongo zokuza nezisombululo.
Imbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM yenzelwe ukususa imiqobo ethintela ukuhanjiswa kweenkonzo ngendlela ehlangeneyo kunye nokukhuthaza uluntu ukuba luthathe inxaxheba njengoko i-DDM isitsho.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ndi tshikhala tsha ṱuṱuwedza vhuthihi ha Afrika khathihi na ṱhanganelo ya dzingu yo khwaṱhaho hu tshi katelwa na kumedzela hafhu Afrika kha vhuyo vhu fanaho.
tgt_text: Abemi boMzantsi Afrika bangazilandela iingxoxo futhi bathathe nenxaxheba kuzo kumakhasi oluntu onxibelelwano phantsi kwesihloko esithi: #PresidentialImbizo..     INyanga ye-Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe khou humbudza muthu muṅwe na muṅwe uri madzangalelo ashu lushaka ṱumana tshoṱhe na vhudziki ha Afrika, vhuthihi na mvelaphanḓa     Milaedza.
tgt_text: Ukubhiyozelwa minyaka le kweNyanga ye-Afrika noSuku lwe-Afrika oluza kuba ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-25 kuCanzibe kuza kuqhutywa phantsi komxholo othi: “UNyaka weSondlo: Ukuqinisa ukunyamezela kwesondlo nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwilizwekazi le-Afrika”.

src_text: Ndiliso     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: Mufumakadzi Vho Phindile Xaba (53), vhe vha shuma tshifhinga tshilapfu kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo fhano Afrika Tshipembe na kha mashango seli.
tgt_text: Njengenxalenye yombono wale minyaka izayo njengoko uchaziwe ku-Ajenda 2063 (esisikhokelo sophuhliso lwe-Afrika esifuna ukuba kubekho uphuhliso oluzinzileyo loqoqosho nentlalo kule minyaka ingama-50 izayo), lo mxholo ugxininisa kwizakhono zabantu base-Afrika ikakhulu amanina, abantu abasaqala ukufikisa kunye nabantwana.

src_text: Vho shuma vha sa neti vha tshi itela khwinifhadza shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: Oku kubalulekile kuphuhliso njengoko kuza kukhokelela ekubeni kuphucuke ubomi babantu, bafumane imivuzo ephezulu futhi namazwe abe nengeniso engcono.

src_text: Muambasada Vho Silumko Sokupa (74), vhe vha shuma kha Zhendedzi ḽa Vhutsireledzi ha Muvhuso kha maimo fhambanaho nga tshifhinga tshilapfu tsha musi vha tshi khou shuma kha Tshumelo ya Muvhuso.Phrofesa Vho Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi ḓivheaho na mutumbuli wa Yunithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mveledziso na zwa Vhashumi ya Tshipembe ha Afrika  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu fhira nga fhasi ha khwaṱhisedzo ya ndalukano na ṱanzwiwa dzina ho teaho.
tgt_text: Umsitho omkhulu oza kukhapha imibhiyozo yale Nyanga ye-Afrika yiVeki ye-Afrika yoNxibelelwano, eza kubanjelwa e-Constitutional Hill eRhawutini ukususela ngomhla wama-23 ukuya kowama-27 kuCanzibe..     INyanga ye-Afrika inika ithuba lokuba sikhuthaze umanyano lwama-Afrika kunye nentsebenziswano emandla kule ngingqi kunye nokuzibophelela kwe-Afrika ukuba iza kusengela thungeni linye.

src_text: Dokotela Vho Kesavan Naidoo sa Tshanḓa tsha Mulangi Muhulwane (DDG): Mveledziso ya Tshiimiswa kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele (DCoG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifuna ukukhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuba izinto ezibalulekileyo nezilulutho zeli lizwe zixhomekeke kuzinzo, umanyano kunye nenkqubela ye-Afrika iphela     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Vho Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka sa DDG: Thikhedzo ya Muvhuso Wapo na Ndangulo ya Thusedzo kha DCoG..     Vho Risimati Patrick Mathye sa DDG: Ndangulo ya zwa Maḓi Tshumelo dza Vhuthathazwitzhili kha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS)..     Vho Collin Xolani Zwane sa DDG: Milayo, Vhutevhedza Milayo na Vhukombetshedzi kha DWS.
tgt_text: Amazwi ovelwanoIKhabhinethi ithumela amazwi ovelwano  kusapho nezihlobo zika:Nksz Phindile Xaba (obeneminyaka engama-53) obengumakhwekhwetha owasebenza iminyaka emininzi kumajelo eendaba, eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Vho Melanchton Makobe sa DDG: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Mavhusele na Mashumele  SOC kha Muhasho wa Mabindu Muvhuso     Khabinethe yo tendelana na Dziminisṱa nga ha tholwa hu tevhelaho:.
tgt_text: Ebesebenza ngokuzinikela encedisa kumalinge okuphucula izwe lakuthi.Nozakuzaku uSilumko Sokupha (obeneminyaka engama-74), osebenzele ii-Arhente yoKhuseleko lweLizwe (i-SSA) kwizikhundla ezahlukeneyo ngethuba esebenzela uRhulumente iminyaka emininzi.Njng Francis Wilson (obeneminyaka engama-83), usoqoqosho ebengumpondo-zihlanjiwe kunye nengqanga eyaseka icandelo i-Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit     IzikhundlaZonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala ezemfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuselo.

src_text: Vho Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Khorondangi (CEO) wa Zhendedzi ḽa Mveledziso ya zwa Dzinnḓu (HDA).
tgt_text: UGq Kesavan Naidoo njengeSekela Mlawuli-Jikelele (i-DDG): EzoPhuhliso lweSebe kwiSebe loLawulo lweNtsebenziswano (i-DCoG).

src_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Joy Keledi Masemola sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa  zwa Masheleni  kha HDA..     Dokotela Vho Cornelius Ruiters sa CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: UMnu Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka njenge-DDG: INkxaso yooRhulumente beNgingqi noLawulo lwaManyathelo okuNgenelela e-DCoG.

src_text: Ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo .
tgt_text: Amalinge okuhlangula nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa na livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na madzangano ane khou ḓidzhenisa kha ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo ya zwenezwino ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulela futhi ibamba ngazibini kubo bonke abantu kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba kumalinge ohlangulo nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula zakutsha nje ezenze umonakalo omkhulu kwiindawo ezithile zezwe lakuthi, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya livhuwa madzangano oṱhe ane si vhe muvhuso, madzangano zwa vhurereli, vhadzulapo, vhoramabindu khathihi na madzangano ṱhaḓulo kha zwiimo zwi sa takadzi a ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, mabai, zwishumiswa zwa vhathu vha tshifumakadzi na yunifomo ya tshikolo kha miṱa yo kwameaho uri vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza nga misi.
tgt_text: Iye futhi yabulela nayo yonke imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO), imibutho yezenkolo, uluntu, oosomashishini kunye nemibutho yoncedo ethe yabonelela iintsapho ebezingamaxhoba ezikhukhula ngokutya, iimpahla, iingubo kunye nezinye izinto eziluncedo ukuze ezi ntsapho zikwazi ukuqhawulisa izinto ezincinci zemihla ngemihla..     Iziko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele liyaqhubeleka nokukhokela amaphulo adibanisa onke amaqoqo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalonte kuwo onke amakhaya achaphazelekileyo.
Abantu abangaphezulu kwama-7 000 abaphuma kwizithili ezine ezithwaxwe ngamandla zaKwaZulu-Natal babonelelwe ngeendawo zokufihla iintloko.

src_text: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka khou bvela phanḓa na ṱanganya masia oṱhe muvhuso kha ndingedzo dzayo dza ṋetshedza thuso ya ṱhaḓulo ya zwa vhuthu kha miṱa yoṱhe yo kwameaho.
tgt_text: Sele uqalile umsebenzi wokwakhela amakhaya achaphazelekileyo izindlu zethutyana kumhlaba wombuso ofunyenwe kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Tshumelo dza zwa vhudzulo dzi khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vha fhiraho 7 000 kha zwiṱiriki zwiṋa zwo kwameseaho ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Mushumo kati wa fhaṱa vhudzulo ha tshifhinganyana hu tshi itelwa miṱa yo kwameaho kha mavu ane vha muvhuso a ḓo wanala fhaḽa kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal ane vhathu avho vha ḓo pfulutshela khao.
tgt_text: La makhaya asenokufuduselwa kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha langa masheleni ṱhaḓulo ya tshiwo itshi tsha miḓalo nga nḓila ya fulufhedzea nahone re khagala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yakubethelela ukuzinikela kukarhulumente ekulawuleni ngobunono nangendlela eselubala imali yokunceda kwizikhukhula.

src_text: Muṱolambalelano wa Afrika Tshipembe vha khou ṋetshedza tshumelo dza vhulavhelesi dza ḓadzisa kha idzo dzi re hone nahone uhu kovhelwa hafhu ha masheleni ndi hune ha khou elana na sisṱeme ya muvhuso ya dzudzanya mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: UMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele woMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamaqumrhu aza kubeka iliso kwindlela eza kusetyenziswa ngayo le mali kwaye le mali ixulwe ngokwemigaqo karhulumente yokuhlahla nokwaba imali.
Eza kutsha nje ngesiFo seNtsholongwane i-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika ukuba bazikhusele ukuze bathintele ukunwenwa kwe-COVID-19 emva kokuba iingxelo zakutsha nje zibonakalisa ukuba kweli lizwe lenyuke kakhulu inani labantu abosulelwe yile ntsholongwane kunye nabo banezifo ezinxulumene nexesha lasebusika..     IKhabhinethi isikhumbuzile ukuba masiqhubeleke sizikhusele thina buqu kunye nabanye abantu ngokuthi sihlambe izandla ngesepha okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane rhoqo, sinxibe izifonyo xa singaphakathi kwizakhiwo, singasondelelani nabanye abantu, sivule iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya endlini size sigonye..     Ukugonya isesesona sixhobo sinaso sokulwa i-COVID-19 njengoko kuthintela ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kunye nokubulawa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela thivhela phaḓalala ha COVID-19 nga murahu ha mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dze dza sumbedza uri ho vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha kavhiwa nga malwadze ane vha na vhushaka na khalaṅwaha ya vhuriha fhano shangoni..     Khabinethe yo humbudza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha bvele phanḓa na ḓitsireledza khathihi na vhaṅwe vhathu nga ṱamba zwanḓa kana zwi sanithaiza misi yoṱhe ambara maski musi nga ngomu ha tshifhaṱo sia tshikhala tsho tsireledzeaho vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu vula mafasiṱere itela uri hu dzhene muya khathihi na haelwa.
tgt_text: Akunyanzelekanga ukuba ube nendawo ohlala kuyo enedilesi esesikweni ukuze ugonye.

src_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha yone philelo ya khwinesa kha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 sa izwi tshi thivhela lwalesa valelwa vhuongeloni kana lufu vha tei thoma vha vha na ḓiresi ya vhudzulo uri vha kone haelwa.
tgt_text: Nabani na, futhi nokuba akanayo incwadi-sazisi, angagonywa simahla kumaziko okugonya karhulumente akho kulo lonke eli lizwe..     Phantsi ngobuhlanga!.

src_text: Muthu muṅwe na muṅwe nga vha na ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe kana si na nga haelwa mahala kha vhupo vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe ha muhaelo ha nnyi na nnyi mona na shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izigxibhe kabukhala izenzo zobuhlanga kweli lizwe, eziquka iziganeko ezisematheni sithetha nje, e-Good Hope Seminary High School nakwiDyunivesiti yase-Stellenbosch eNtshona Koloni.

Lo mkhuba mbi unxamnye nemimiselo yomgaqo-siseko eli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi elasekelwa phezu kwayo, equka isidima somntu, ukungacaluli ngobuhlanga, ukungacaluli ngesini, ubulungisa entlalweni, ulingwano kunye nentlonipho..     UMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 nguwo osisikhokelo esisisebenzisayo ukusiphula neengcambu iyantlukwano engakhiyo kunye nezenzo ezingenabulungisa zangaphambili.

src_text: Kha vha fhelise khethululo nga lukanda!.
tgt_text: Abazali bayacelwa ukuba bafundise abantwana babo ukuba babukhabe ubuhlanga, bamkele iintlanga ezahlukeneyo zeli, njengenxalenye yephulo lokwakha isizwe nokukhuthaza ukuhlalisana ngoxolo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou sasaladza tshoṱhe zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo nga lukanda fhano shangoni, hu tshi katelwa na zwiwo zwo vhigwaho fhaḽa Tshikoloni tsha Nṱha tsha Good Hope Seminary na fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: Masisebenzisane sibhentsise imikhuba yobuhlanga naphina apho buthathwa njengento eqhelekileyo ngolo hlobo sitsho phandle ukuba ubuhlanga abamkelekanga kwaphela kweli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi.

src_text: Hezwi zwiito zwo vhifhaho ngaurali zwi lwa na mikhwa ine ya vha hone kha ndayotewa ye shango ḽashu ḽa dimokirasi ḽa ḓitika khayo ine ya katela tshirunzi tsha vhuthu sa vha na khethululo nga lukanda sa khethulula nga mbeu, vhulamukanyi kha zwa matshilisano, ndinganelo na ṱhonifho.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Germany.

IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni olube yimpumelelo lweNgqonyela ye-Federal Republic of Germany, oHloniphekileyo u-Olaf Scholz, eMzantsi Afrika ngomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..     Olu Tyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni lweNgqonyela u-Scholz lwenziwe emva kokuba uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wathi wamema le Ngqonyela, futhi noqhuba iphulo lokuqinisa amatyathanga obudlelwano amazwe engingqi nawehlabathi nawokutsala utyalo-mali olufunwa ngabomvu kweli.

src_text: Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 ndi yone ndededzi yashu musi ro livha kha fhelisa zwiito zwi vhavhaho zwa khethululana na tshayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhingani tsho fhelaho.
tgt_text: Ezi nkokeli zimbini zigwadle iindlela zokuqinisa ubudlelwane kumacandelo afana nelezamandla kunye noguqu-guquko lwemozulu, urhwebo notyalo-mali kunye namacebo okulwa i-COVID-19 kunye nokwanda kwabantu abadinga ichiza lokugonya, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Vhabebi vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa gudisa vhana vhavho uri vha hanedzane na zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda na ṱanganedza zwa fhambana ha vhathu ya nga mvelele dzavho, sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dzashu dzo khwaṱhaho dza lingedza ṱuṱuwedza zwa fhaṱa lushaka na vhuthihi..     Kha ri shumisane, ri bvisele khagala zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda afho hune zwa dzhiiwa sa vhuḓifari ho teaho nahone ri dovhe hafhu ri rumele mulaedza re khagala wa uri zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda zwi na vhudzulo kha shango ḽashu ḽa demokirasi.
tgt_text: Iingxoxo zabo ziquke nezinye izinto ezingundaba-mlonyeni kweli lizwekazi le-Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela, kuquka ungquzulwano olwenzeka e-Ukraine kwakunye nomonakalo oluwenzayo kuqoqosho lwehlabathi kunye nokutya namandla..     I-Germany ayilolizwe likwindawo yesibini ngobukhulu njengehlakani lezorhwebelwano nje kuphela koko likwakwindawo yesithathu ngokwamanani abakhenkethi abangena kweli, likwalilizwe eliphambili kwezotyalo-mali nehlakani eliluncedo kwezophuhliso.

src_text: Vhushaka ha Afrika Tshipembe na shango ḽa Dzheremane.
tgt_text: INkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Tshiofisi a tshimbila zwavhuḓi Mutshantseḽara wa Riphabuḽiki ya Muvhuso wa Feḓeraḽa wa shango ḽa Dzheremane, Muhulisei Vho Olaf Scholz, fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukuqukunjelwa ngempumelelo kweNkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana ebibanjelwe eThekwini ukususela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kowama-20 kuCanzibe.
Amahlakani aphuma bombo zone zehlabathi azimase le nkomfa, ibibanjwe ngentsebenziswano noMbutho weHlabathi wezaBasebenzi (i-ILO).

src_text: Madalo Tshiofisi Mutshantseḽara Vho Scholz’s vha hone nga murahu ha thambo ya Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, vhane vha khou ranga phanḓa fulo ḽa muvhuso ḽa fhaṱa vhushaka havhuḓi ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka, hu tshi katelwa na kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea vhukuma.
tgt_text: Emva kokuba kuxoxwe iindlela ezifanelekileyo ezisetyenziswa ngamazwe ahlukeneyo kunye nokubona iindawo ezinezikroba ezifuna kuthathwe amanyathelo akhawulezileyo afunekayo ukuze ipheliswe ngokukhawuleza le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana kunye nokusetyenziswa kwabantu ngenkani, kuye kwamkelwa umgaqo othi ‘Durban Call to Action’ okulwa le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana..     Ukusetyenziswa kwabantwana ngumkhuba ombi kakhulu kwaye kubabeka emngciphekweni abantwana.

src_text: Zwiṅwe zwe vharangaphanḓa avha vhavhili vha amba nga hazwo ho vha nḓila dza khwaṱhisa tshumisano kha masia fanaho na fulufulu khathihi na tshanduko ya kilima, mbambadzo na vhubindudzi hu tshi katelwa na maga u lwa na COVID-19 khathihi na ṱhoḓea ya khaelo.
tgt_text: Ukwenza oku kukuxhaphaza abantwana kwaye kubenza bangakwazi ukuya esikolweni futhi baxhamle namanye amathuba okuziphuhlisa.

src_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha sedza na kha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha dzhango ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi nga angaredza, hu tshi katelwa na khuḓano ya ngei Ukraine khathihi na masiandaitwa ayo kha ikonomi ya ḽifhasi na wanala ha zwiḽiwa na fulufulu..     Shango ḽa Dzheremane ḽi tou vha fhedzi muvhambadzelani wa vhuvhili muhulwanesa na ḽino ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, ḽi dovha hafhu ḽa vha tshiko tsha vhuraru tshihulwanesa tsha vhaendelamashango vha bvaho seli ha malwanzhe, mubindudzi muhulwanesa na mushumisani kha zwa mveledziso..     Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi.
tgt_text: Wonke umntwana eMzantsi Afrika unelungelo elingenakuthathwa mntu lokuba akhuselwe ekubeni lixhoba lokuxhatshazwa ngokusetyenziswa..     Ilungelo lokufumana imfundo esisiseko likuMgaqo-siseko kwaye ngokoMthetho weziKolo zoMzantsi Afrika, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 84 wowe-1996), “wonke umzali makavumele wonke umfundi ophantsi kwakhe ukuba aye esikolweni ngosuku lokuqala lokuvulwa kwezikolo xa eneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala ade abe neminyaka eli-15 ubudala okanye afikelele kwibanga lesithoba, nokuba yeyiphi efike kuqala kwezi”..     NgokoMthetho waBantwana, wowe-2005 (uMthetho uNombl 38 wowe-2005), “akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba asebenzise, afune uncedo, anike okanye aqeshe umntwana njengomsebenzi”     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa zwavhuḓi ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban nga ḽa 15 swika 20 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Ukuvuma ukutyikitya isiVumelwano seHlabathi sokuKhusela Bonke Abantu Ukuba baNyanyalaliswe ngeNkani (i-ICPPED).

src_text: Vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho mona na ḽifhasi vho dzhenela muṱangano uyu we wa fariwa nga tshumisano na Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi ḽa Ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe ePalamente i-ICPPED ukuze kuqwalaselwe umba wokuvuma koMzantsi Afria ukutyikitya esi sivumelwano.
I-ICPPED sisivumelwano esibophelela amazwe ehlabathi seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) nesimalunga nokunyhashwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokuba banyanyalaliswe ngenkani.

src_text: Nga murahu ha ambedzana nga ha maitele avhuḓi ane shumiswa nga mashango fhambanaho bvisela khagala vhuṱudzeṱudze vhune ha vha hone khathihi na maga tshihaḓu ane ṱoḓea itela ṱavhanyedzisa zwa fheliswa ha zwiito zwa shumiswa ha vhana na shumiswa nga nḓila ya khombekhombe, ho swika he ha ṱanganedzwa thendelano dze dza ḓivhiwa sa ‘Durban Call to Action’ hu tshi itelwa lwa na samba heḽi ḽa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha tshi itwa vhashumi.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sikuchaza ukunyanyalaliswa komntu ngenkani, njengokuxhilwa, ukubanjwa, ukuvalelwa okanye nawaphi na amanyathelo anokukhokelela ekubeni umenzi wobubi angavumi ukuba uyalazi apho likhoyo ixhoba okanye ayifihle le ndawo likuyo.

src_text: Zwa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha itwa vhashumi ndi zwiito zwi vhavhaho vhukuma kha tshitshavha nahone zwi vhea vhana kha nyimele dza khombo vhukuma.
tgt_text: Sakuba esi sivumelwano sivunyiwe ukuba sibe yinxalenye yemithetho yeli, uMzantsi Afrika uza kulindeleka ukuba unike ingxelo kwi-UN rhoqo emva kweminyaka emibini ngendlela oqinisekisa ngayo ukuba esi sivumelwano siyasebenza.

src_text: Zwi dzhiiwa sa zwiito zwa tambudza nahone zwi khakhisa vhana uri vha si kone wana pfunzo khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa aluwa.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sicacisa amanyathelo ekufuneka amazwe awutyikityileyo awalandele ukuthintela ukunyanyalaliswa ngenkani kwabantu kumazwe wabo..     INgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe fhano Afrika Tshipembe na pfanelo dzine ha tei dzhielwa dzone dza tsireledzwa kha zwiito zwa shumiswa nga nḓila ya tambudzwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe iNgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu kwiBhunga lamaLungelo oLuntu leZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNHRC).
I-UN Universal Periodic Review iza kuhlaziya le ngxelo ekupheleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Pfanelo ya wana pfunzo ya mutheo hone kha Ndayotewa yashu nahone ya nga Mulayo wa Zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, wa ṅwaha wa 1996 (Mulayo 84 wa 1996), “mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe tea ita uri mugudi muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha nga fhasi ha ndango yawe dzhene tshikolo tou bva kha ḓuvha ḽa thoma ḽa tshikolo kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi  khou fara miṅwaha ya sumbe ngaḽo vhuya swikela ḓuvha ḽa tshikolo ḽa fhedzisela kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi uyo khou fara miṅwaha ya 15 kana gireidi ya vhuṱahe, kana zwenezwo zwine zwa ḓa thoma” ya nga Mulayo wa Vhana, wa ṅwaha wa 2005 (Mulayo 38 wa 2005), “a hu na muthu ane tea shumisa wana ṋetshedza kana thola ṅwana tshi itela mu shumisa sa mushumi”     Tsheo dza Khabinethe ṱanganedza Thendelano dza Dzitshaka dza nga ha Tsireledzwa ha Vhathu vhoṱhe kha zwiito zwa Ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga Khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo (ICPPED) .
tgt_text: Oko watyikitya isiVumelwano samaLungelo oLuntu se-UN, uMzantsi Afrika sele uphononongwe izihlandlo ezithathu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha ICPPED kha Phaḽamennde uri hu sedzwe fhungo ḽa ṱanganedza thendelano dzenedzo nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Wagqibela ukuphononongwa ngenyanga yoMsintsi ngowama-..

src_text: Hedzi ndi thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dzine dza tou vha mbofho ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dzi sedzaho kha zwa kandekanywa ha pfanelo dza vhuthu nga zwiito zwa ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga nḓila ya khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inika iinkcukacha ngomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nezindululo ezivunyiweyo ezili-187 zophononongo lowama-.
Iinkcukacha zithatywathwe kulwazi oluqinisekisiwe, amasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo, amaziko axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu efanelekileyo.

src_text: Thendelano dzi ṱalutshedza zwa ngalangala nga nḓila ya khombekhombe sa zwithu zwi katelaho thubiwa fariwa hoṋelwa tshiṱokisini hu si na senga kana nḓila iṅwe na iṅwe ine ya nga ita uri avho vhaiti vha zwiito zwenezwo vha hane ṱanganedza kana vha dzumbe fhethuvhupo hune zwipondwa zwenezwo zwa zwiito zwenezwo zwa vha hone..     Musi zwo no tendelwa uri zwi vhe tshipiḓa tsha milayo yashu, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo lavhelelwa ṋetshedza muvhigo nga murahu ha miṅwaha mivhili kha vha UN sumbedzaho uri ndi zwifhio zwine ḽa khou ita nga ha thendelano dzenedzo..     Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa Afrika Tshipembe wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yonelisekile ngumsebenzi osele wenziwe mayelana nezi zindululo kwakunye nazezo ndawana zisaphethweyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu kha vha Khoro ya Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iza kupapashwa esidlangalaleni emva kokuba ingeniswe kwi-UN ngenyanga yeThupha kowama-.

src_text: Tsenguluso ya Ḽifhasi ya nga murahu ha Tshifhinga ya vha ha UN ḓo sengulusa muvhigo ngavhuya ṅwaha uno tou bva tshe ḽa saina Thendelano dza Pfanelo dza Vhuthu dza UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽo no senguluswa luraru, he tsenguluso ya fhedzisela ya itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi..     Muvhigo uyu sumbedza zwiswa nga ha themendelo dza 187 dzo ṱanganedzwaho bva kha mushumo wa sengulusa wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi.

src_text: Ho dzhiiwa makumedzwa bva kha data dzi fulufhedzeaho, mafhungo bva kha mihasho yo teaho, zwiimiswa zwi tikedzaho demokirasi na ndayotewa ya shango khathihi na madzangano vhadzulapo teaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuvumile uMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi ukuba uqalise ukusetyenziswa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha themendelo khathihi na kha ayo maṅwe masia ane khao mushumo wa kha ḓi bvela phanḓa.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacisa amacebo okukhusela nokonga amanzi.

src_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa kha nnyi na nnyi zwenezwo musi wo no ḓivhadzwa kha vha UN nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Uqinisekisa ukuba imisebenzi yemigodi yezoqoqosho iyahambelana nephulo leli lizwe elikhuthaza ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngobunono.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacise indima kunye noxanduva lwala maqoqo mathathu karhulumente ngokumayelana nomba wamanzi emigodini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa 2022 uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zicetywayo ziza kusombulula iingxaki ezinxulumene nezohlwayo ezinikwa abo bangcolisa amanzi futhi ziza kwenza kube lula ukunyanzelisa ukuba kuhanjwe ngalo mgaqo uthi iqumrhu elingcolisileyo malibhatale.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ṋetshedza nḓila dza tsireledza na vhulunga kushumisele kwa maḓi ita ndinganyelo vhukati ha mishumo ya zwa ikonomi henefho kha migodi na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṋetshedza nḓila dza kushumisele kwa maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu fhano shangoni ḽashu..     Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mbekanyamaitele iyi ya ita, ndi bvisela khagala mishumo na vhuḓifhinduleli vhukati ha masia mararu muvhuso nga ha mafhungo kwamaho maḓi migodini.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uyahambelana noMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho uNombl 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: Tshanduko dzine dza khou dzinginywa dzi ḓo tandulula khaedu dza ṋetshedza ndaṱiso kha vhatshikafhadzi khathihi na ita uri zwi leluwe shumisa maitele uri mutshikafhadzi tea badela.
tgt_text: INgxelo ngesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo bveledzwa hu tshi tevhelwa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: Muvhigo nga ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma umsebenzi osele wenziwe ngamasebe karhulumente awahlukeneyo okusebenzisa esi sicwangciso-sikhokelo samkelwa ngowama-2019 ukuba siqaliswe ukusetyenziswa, njengenxalenye yezikhokelo zawo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphanḓa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Vhupuḽani, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.
tgt_text: Amasebe amaninzi sele eqalise imigaqo-nkqubo eza kuba neenkqubo ezingundoqo eziza kugxila kumanina, ulutsha kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo.
IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubekwe iinkqubo ezingqingqwa zokuhlola nokunika iingxelo, ingakumbi kwamanye amasebe la angekaniki zingxelo..     INgxoxo zoLutsha zika-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Khabinethe yo takalela mvelaphanḓa khulwane ye ya itwa nga vhunzhi ha mihasho ya muvhuso kha zwa dzhia muhanga uyu we wa ṱanganedzwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa wa vho vha tshipiḓa tshayo tsha mashumele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NMYD eza kubanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka.
I-NMYD yokuqala iza kubanjwa ngomhla wesi-7 ukuya kowama-20 kweyeKhala.

src_text: Vhunzhi ha mihasho swika zwino yo no thoma dzudzanya mbekanyamaitele dzayo dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ranga phanḓa mbekanyamushumo khulwane dzine dzo livhiswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: Eli liphulo likaMongameli lokunika ulutsha lweli Lizwekazi ithuba lokubamba iingxoxo ezakhayo ngemiba echaphazela lona..     Ezi ngxoxo – eziza kusekelwa kwimbalasane yeli ehlonitshwa kwihlabathi jikelele uMongameli wangaphambili uNelson Rolihlahla Mandela – ziza kuqala iingxoxo-mpikiswano eziza kukhuthaza ukubaluleka kweenkokeli ezinyanesekileyo e-Afrika..     Ziza kunika abantu abatsha ithuba lokuba bafundisane ngeenkcubeko zabo ezahlukeneyo nezityebileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi na vhiga ho khwaṱhaho, nga maanḓa kha miṅwe ya mihasho ine i athu ṋetshedza mivhigo yayo.
tgt_text: Eli linge liza kukhuthaza nobudlelwano obushushu phakathi kwabantu abatsha beli lizwekazi.

src_text: Fulo ḽa Nyambedzano dza vhukati ha Vhaswa ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: ISebe lamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo liza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngenkqubo yalo msitho apha ekuhambeni kwexesha..     INgxelo yoNyaka wama-2021/22 yokuHlola uMsebenzi wokuXhotyiswa kwamaNina noLingwano ngokweSini, uPhuhliso loLutsha nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza zwa uri NMYD vho ḓo vha hone ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe bva zwino nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo yonyaka wama-2021/22 yokuhlola umsebenzi wokuxhotyiswa kwamanina nolingwano ngokwesini, uphuhliso lolutsha nokulwelwa kwamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: NMYD ya thoma ḓo vha hone bva nga ḽa 7 swika ḽa 20 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inyathela imiba ephambili emalunga nokukhuthazwa kolingwano, umgangatho wengqesho kunye nobunini kunye nokuthatha inxaxheba kwaba bakhankanyiweyo kwimisebenzi yamasebe kunye namaqumrhu karhulumente..

src_text: Hedzi ndi ndingedzo dza Phresidennde dza ṋea vhaswa vha Dzhango ḽino tshikhala tsha ḓidzhenisa kha nyambedzano dza fhaṱa dza nga ha mafhungo ane vha kwama.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibhalwe kusetyenziswa isicwangciso-sikhokelo socwangciso, uhlahlo-mali, uhlolo, uvavanyo kunye nophicotho olusekelwe kwisini esamkelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowama-     ImiThetho eYilwayo.
UMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini.

src_text: Hedzi nyambedzano, dzine dza ḓo ḓitika kha ḽizhakanḓila ḽashu ḽi ḓivheaho ḽifhasini Phresidennde washu wa kale Vho Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, dzi ḓo mbo ḓi thoma na zwenezwo hu tshi itelwa ṱuṱuwedza maitele vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na mikhwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..     Dzi ḓo ṋea vhaswa tshikhala tsha kovhana nga ha vhufa ho ḓalaho zwinzhi vhukuma vhune ha sumbedza mvelele dzavho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini upapashwe ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Hedzi ndingedzo dzi ḓo dovha hafhu dza khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha muthu nga muthu vhukati ha vhaswa vha ḽino dzhango.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ufuna ukuphucula impilo nokhuseleko lwabasebenzi-mgodini, kuquka nezi ndawo kwembiwa kuzo izimbiwa.

src_text: Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwa mbekanyamushumo ya vhuṱambo uvhu ngavhuya.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kulo Mthetho ukhoyo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 29 wowe-1996).

src_text: Muvhigo wa Vhulavhelesi ha Mashumele nga Ṅwaha wa ṅwaha wa 2021/22 kha zwa Maanḓafhadza Vhafumakadzi na Ndinganyelo ya Mbeu, Mveledziso ya Vhaswa khathihi na Ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zitsha zinika ingcaciso malunga nesigama esithile salo Mthetho, zenza ngqingqwa imithetho elawula impilo nokhuseleko zize ziwenze uhambelane nemithetho yehlabathi elawula impilo nokhuseleko emigodini, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa vhulavhelesi ha mashumele wa nga ṅwaha nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.
Muvhigo uyu sala murahu zwithu zwa ndeme kha ṱuṱuwedzwa ha ndinganyelo, maimo kha zwa mishumo khathihi na vhuṋe na shela mulenzhe ha zwigwada izwi kha mishumo ya mihasho na mabindu muvhuso.
tgt_text: UMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko.

IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko ukuze uluntu luhlomle nokuba uMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, akhuphe isaziso esineenkcukacha ngesi silungiso sifuna ukwenziwa kuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Muvhigo uyu wo dzudzanywa ho sedzwa zwa vhupuḽani ha mugaganyagwama une wa dzhiela nṱha zwa mbeu, zwa vhulavhelesi, vhusengulusi na muhanga wa Muvhalelano we wa ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kwiCandelo 6(1) loMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996, elibhengeza ngokusesikweni ukuba iilwimi ezisemthethweni ezili-11 zoMzantsi Afrika zezi: Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhulu, isiNgesi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kunye nesiZulu.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso ziza kubeka uLwimi lweZandla loMzantsi Afrika (i-SASL) njengolwimi olusemthethweni lwe-12 kweli lizwe kwaye ziza kucacisa igalelo lwalo njengenxalenye yenkcubeko futhi zibethelele namalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika, kuquka nabo bakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: ISebe leMfundo esiSiseko sele layamkela i-SASL njengolwimi lwenkobe     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelelwa khwinisa mutakalo na tsireledzo ya vhashumi vha migodini, hu tshi katelwa na vhupo honoho vhune zwa migodi zwa khou bveledzwa khaho.
tgt_text: IVeki yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Mulayo wa Mutakalo na Tsireledzo ya Migodini, wa 1996 (Mulayo 29 wa 1996) une wa vha hone zwazwino.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuphawula iVeki yeSizwe yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana ukususela ngomhla wama-29 kuCanzibe ukuya kowesi-4 kweyeSilimela phantsi komxholo othi: ‘Masikhusele Abantwana ngeXesha le-COVID-19 Nasemva Kwawo”.

Kule veki, kuza kugxininiswa kakhulu kumba oxake isizwe wokukhulelwa kwamantombazana asafikasayo, ingxaki leyo ethe yathatha unyawo ngethuba le-COVID-19 kuba amantombazana asafikasayo amaninzi athi afumana abantwana ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubanjiswane ngabazali, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho yenkolo kunye noluntu ngokubanzi kuliwe le ngxaki yokukhulelwa kwamantombazana aselula..     INgqungquthela yezoQoqosho yeHlabathi (i-WEF).

src_text: Khwiniso idzi dzo shandukiswaho ndi dzine dza bvisela khagala maṅwe maipfi kha Mulayo khwaṱhisa muhanga wa zwa milayo ya mutakalo na tsireledzo khathihi na ita uri elane na maitele khwinesa ḽifhasini ane elana na zwa tsireledzo migodini..     Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022  .
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuthatha inxaxheba kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland ukususela ngomhla wama-22 ukuya kowama-26 kuCanzibe 2022, phantsi komxholo othi: “Sisebenzisana, Masibuyisele ukuThembana”.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi nahone Minisṱa wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha nga ṋetshedza nḓivhadzo ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa khwiniso iyo ine ya khou dzinginywa kha Ndayotewa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyakwazi ukubaluleka kweli thuba lokuba yinxalenye yabo bagwadla izisombululo nokwabelana nehlabathi ngeengxaki nawo ojamelene nazo.

Ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezwe lakuthi kule ngqungquthela kunceda igama lelizwe lakuthi elihlonitshwe nangakumbi kwihlabathi njengelizwe elinamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali, futhi kuza kusinika nethuba lokwazisa ihlabathi ngombono wethu ngendlela eliya kuyo eli lizwe kwaye siza kuthetha nangezinto ezintsha ezenzekayo kwizwe lakuthi..     INyanga yoLutsha.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Khethekanyo 6(1) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996, ine ya sumbedza uri nyambo dza 11 dza tshiofisi dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe, ndi Tshibeli, Tshisuthu, Tshitswana, Tshiswati, Tshivenḓa, Tshitsonga, Tshivhuru, Luisimane, Tshindevhele, Tshithoza na Tshizulu..     Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo ita uri hu vhe na ṱanganedzwa ha Luambo lwa Tswayo dza Zwanḓa lwa Afrika Tshipembe (SASL) sa luambo lwa tshiofisi lwa vhufumimbili (12) nahone ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza ṱanganedzea ha mvelele ya luambo lwonolwo khathihi na khwaṱhisa pfanelo dzi linganaho kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe, hu sa sedzwi uri vha na vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yeNyanga yoLutsha yowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza indlela yokuziphilisa nokomelela kolutsha okuzinzileyo ukwenzela ikamva elingcono”.

src_text: Muhasho wa Pfunzo dza Mutheo wo no ḓi ṱanganedza SASL sa luambo lwa hayani     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Umsitho osesikweni woSuku loLutsha oza kubanjelwa eMpuma Koloni.

src_text: Vhege ya Tsireledzo ya Vhana.
tgt_text: Lo ngunyaka wama-46 emva kwezidube-dube zabafundi zomhla we-16 kweyeSilimela 1976 ezazise-Soweto apho abantu abatsha bathi baqhankqalazela ukunyanzeliswa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo ukuba bafunde ngolwimi lwesiBhulu.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya Tsiredzo ya Vhana bva nga ḽa 29 Shundunthule swika ḽa 4 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Kha ri Tsireledze Vhana nga tshino tshifhinga tsha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 na nga Murahu”..     Kha yeneyo vhege, hu ḓo lavheleswa nga maanḓa kha mafhungo kwamaho shango ḽoṱhe, ane vha vhifha muvhilini ha vhaswa, lwe ha wanala hu tshi vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhe vha vha na vhana nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo ḓiṋea maanḓa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Besebenzisa la moya mnye wawuboniswe ngabafundi ngenyanga yeSilimela ngowe-1976, iKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubantu abatsha beli lizwe ukuba balwe ingxaki yabantu abatsha abangenamisebenzi ngokuthi bathathe inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zophuhliso ezifana nokufunda umsebenzi usemsebenzini kunye nawokuqeqeshwa emsebenzini..     Urhulumente uqulunqe iinkqubo zokuncedisa kumaphulo okuqesha ulutsha nawokudala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo zexeshana.

Amashishini ayakhuthazwa ukuba aqeshe abantu abatsha abaninzi ngokuthi adalele ulutsha amathuba..     Inkqubo yolutsha yale nyanga yeSilimela yonke iquka izinto ezininzi eziquka ukuphehlelela iphulo lolutsha olungamatshantliziyo, ukusekwa kweNkqubo ye-NYDA Brand Ambassador kunye namaphulo okuvuselelwa kweNkonzo yeSizwe yoLutsha (i-YES) kulo lonke eli.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na ndingedzo dzo khwaṱhaho vhukati ha vhabebi, vhadzulapo, zwigwada zwa vhurereli khathihi na zwitshavha nga angaredza dza itela thusa shandukisa izwo zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhane vha khou vhifha mivhilini..     Muṱangano wa Ikonomi wa Ḽifhasi (WEF).
tgt_text: UMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo uza kunika ingcaciso egcweleyo kungekudala ngeenkqubo epheleleyo.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha WEF ine ya khou ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Davos-Klosters, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 22 swika 26 Shundunthule 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U shumisana vhuedzedza Fulufhelo”.
tgt_text: Yonke imisitho yolutsha kulindeleke ukuba ithobele imiqathango yezempilo ye-COVID-.
INgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzhiela nṱha tshikhala tsha vha tshipiḓa tsha thandululo nahone ḽi kovhana nḓivho ine ḽa vha nayo kha muṱangano uyu wa ḽifhasi vha hone ha shango ḽashu kha muṱangano uyu wa WEF na zwone ndi zwa ndeme kha bveledza phanḓa dzina ḽa shango ḽashu sa hone fhethu havhuḓisa ha ita zwa vhubindudzi kovhana na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga ha bono ḽa vhumatshelo hashu khathihi na bvisela khagala dziṅwe mveledziso dzine dza khou itea ngomu kha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Urhulumente, ebambisene neNdlu yeSizwe yeeNkokeli zoMthonyama, uza kubamba iNgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 apho baza kuxoxa ngemiba enxulumene nobunini-mhlaba..

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa.
tgt_text: Le miba iquka inkqubo yokukhutshelwa komhlaba woluntu usuka kuMbuso uye kubanikazi bawo abafanelekileyo, into leyo ibalulekileyo kumaphulo okuphuhlisa abantu basemaphandleni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya ṅwaha wa 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U ṱuṱuwedza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dzine dza nga vha dza tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha khwine”.
tgt_text: Ukungabi namaphepha afanelekileyo obunikazi mhlaba kwindawo eziphantsi koluntu akunyhashi nje kuphela amalungelo okuba ngabanikazi balo mhlaba bahlala kuwo koko kunciphisa amathuba wabo okuphucula iipokotho zabo     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa tshiofisi ḽi ḓo pembelelwa ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuvuyisanaIKhabhinethi ithumela amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle:kuNksz Leanne Manas, umsasazi we-SABC Morning Live, othe wawongwa nge- Knight of the French National Order Merit ngoLwesibini, umhla we-17 kuCanzibe 2022, ngegalelo lakhe kwicandelo lezobuntatheli, elezamajelo eendaba nakwamanye amaphulo okunikela ngamalizo.

Amazwi ovelwanoIKhabhinethi ithi malilale ngenxeba usapho nezihlobo zika:Mnu Mpho Moerane (52), owasekuba nguSodolophu wesiXeko saseRhawutini, kunye netshantliziyo lezopolitiko elaziqala ezopolitiko kwasebuntwaneni kunye nobesebenzela abantu baseRhawutini.

src_text: Houno ndi ṅwaha wa vhufuiṋarathi (46) wa pembelelwa ha ḓuvha ḽa mvutshelano ya matshudeni ye ya vha hone nga ḓuvha ḽa 16 Fulwi 1976 fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto he vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou gwalabela zwa kombetshedzwa guda nga luambo lwa Tshivhuru nga muvhuso wa khethululo nga lukanda..     Nga muya wonoyo muthihi fanaho na uḽa wa ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 1976, Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhaswa vha shango ḽashu ya uri vha lwe na khaedu ine ya khou engedzea ya shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa nga shela mulenzhe kha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso dzi fanaho na mbekanyamushumo dza vhugudisamishumo khathihi na dza ṋea vhagudi tshenzhemo.
tgt_text: Phambi kokuba onyulwe njengoSodolophu, wayesebenza njengeLungu leKomiti kaSodolophu (i-MMC) elijongene neeNkonzo zokusiNgqongileyo neziSeko zoPhuhliso.Gq Deborah Fraser (56), imvumi yomculi wenkolo eyaphumelela iimbasa eziliqela nebisandula ukuwongwa ngesiDanga sobuGqirha, i-Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music yi-Christian Leadership Academy.Gq Namane Magau (70), obesisifundiswa esifunde sayityekeza futhi elilungu elihlonitshiweyo leBhodi yeTrasti yeBhunga leSizwe loMzantsi Afrika likaGawulayo (i-SANAC).Mnu Mike Schüssler (60), usoqoqosho odumileyo woMzantsi Afrika nobengumakhwekhwetha kweli candelo futhi enika ingxelo zohlalutyo ezityebileyo ngemeko yoqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika.Mnu Jamie Bartlett (56), umlinganisi woMzantsi Afrika kamabonakude nomdlali weqonga odumileyo nowawongwa ngothotho lweembasa, futhi nobesaziwa ngokudlala indima yokuba ngu-Mike O’Reilly kwi-Isidingo neyokuba ngu-David Genaro kwi-Rhythm City.

IKhabhinethi nayo njengoMongameli Ramaphosa ithi tutwini kurhulumente kunye nabantu base-United Arab Emirates (i-UAE) emva kokusweleka koHloniphekileyo, uMntan’egazi, uSheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), uMongameli wase-UAE      Izikhundla Zonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala ezemfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuselo.

src_text: Muvhuso wo bveledza mbekanyamushumo dza tikedza zwa tholiwa ha vhaswa khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi.
tgt_text: UMnu Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla njengeGosa eliyiNtloko yesiGqeba soLawulo le-Construction Industry Development Board..     UMnu Shabeer Hamid Khan njengoMcwangcisi-zimali-Jikelele kuNondyebo weSizwe.

src_text: Mabindu na one khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri kunge vhaswa nga vhunzhi kha zwa mishumo nga sika zwikhala zwinzhi zwa vhaswa..     Mbekanyamushumo ya vhaswa ya ṅwedzi woṱhe wa Fulwi katela vhuṱambo ho fhambanaho bva kha zwa rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa zwa vhurangaphanḓa ha vhaswa rwela ṱari Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhaambasada vha Pfungavhuṋe ya NYDA khathihi na vhuṅwe vhuṱambo vhunzhi ha Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka mona na shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: UNksz Mendoe Ntswahlana njengeGosa eliyiNtloko lezeNtengo kuNondyebo weSizwe.
IKhabhinethi iyavumelana nokuqeshwa kwaba bangezantsi kwizithuba ebezikwiBhodi yabaLawuli ye-Central Energy Fund     UMnu Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    uNksz Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ezoqoqosho .

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mveledziso dza zwezwino dzi vhuedzaho shango dzo tetshelwaho khwaṱhisa nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya nga figara dza vhushayamishumo dza zwezwino dzi bvaho kha Tshitatisitiki Afrika Tshipembe, vhushayamishumo ho tselafhasi bva kha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele indaba ezincumisayo zakutsha nje ezimalunga namanyathelo esizwe okungenelela ngeenjongo zokukhwezela uhlumo loqoqosho.

src_text: 3 phesenthe kha kotara ya vhuṋa ya 2021 ya kha.
tgt_text: Ngokweengxelo zakutsha nje zeZiko leeNkcukacha-manani zoMzantsi Afrika (i-StatsSA), inani labantu abangasebenziyo lehlile lisuka ku-.

src_text: 5 phesenthe kha kotara ya thoma ya.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yesine yowama-2021 laya kutsho ku-.

src_text: Tshikalo tsha vhushayamishumo tshe tsha vha tsho gonyelanṱha tsho tselafhasi kha kotara ya vhuvhili nga tevhekanya.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala yowama-.

src_text: Mbuyelo khulwane ya mishumo yo vha kha tshitshavha na tshumelo dza matshilisano, mveledziso na mbambadzo..     Zwibveledzwaguṱe zwapo kha kotara ya thoma ya 2022 zwo engedzea nga.
tgt_text: Inani labantu abangasebenziyo bebonke lehlile kwiikota ezimbini zilandelelana.

src_text: 9% zwa isa muelo wa ikonomi yashu kha tshiimo tsha musi hu saathu vha na dwadze ḽa Corona.
tgt_text: Amacandelo adale eyona misebenzi mininzi leleenkonzo zoluntu nentlalontle, elemizi-mveliso kunye nelorhwebo.

src_text: Kha kotara, sekhithara ya zwa mveledziso yo vha yone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha ikonomi nga gonyelanṱha ha zwibveledzwa zwa pheṱhiroḽiamu na dzikhemikhaḽa, zwiḽiwa na zwinwiwa, khathihi na metaḽa zwa mitshini..     Mbuelo hei yo gonyelaho nṱha nyana sumbedza uri ikonomi yashu tshe yo khwaṱha nahone shela mulenzhe ha Pulane ya Mvusuluso na Mbuyedzedzo ya Ikonomi zwi kho shuma zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: Imveliso yonyaka yelizwe (i-GDP) kwikota yokuqala yowama-2022 ikhule ngo-.

src_text: Khabinethe kho ita khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha tikedze mabindu po na nḓowetshupo nga renga zwibveledzwa na tshumelo dzapo.
tgt_text: 9% into leyo eyenze ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lubuyele kwela nqanaba lalikulo phambi kwalo bhubhane siphuma kuye.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽa S&P Global kha vusulusa mbonalo ya vhupimi ha tshikolodo Afrika Tshipembe - bva kha tshiimo tsha vhukati ya kha tshiomo tshi fulufhedzisaho.
tgt_text: Kule kota, icandelo lemizi-mveliso lilo eliqhube kakuhle kakhulu nelithe landisa imveliso yepetroli neekhemikhali, ukutya neziselo, kunye nesinyithi kunye noomatshini.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽo dovha hafhu ḽa khwaṱhisedza vhupimi ha zwikolodo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu kha kharentsi yapo na ya mashango nnḓa kha BB minas na BB respectively.
tgt_text: Lo mnconwana siwubonayo ubonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lusemi ngeenyawo kwaye amanyathelo okungenelela afana nesiCwangciso soKwakha Ngokutsha nokuVuselela uQoqosho (i-ERRP) ayaqalisa ukwenza umahluko.

src_text: Tshiimo tsha kutshilele .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kuye wonke umntu ukuba axhase amashishini kunye nemizi-mveliso yalapha ekhaya ngokuthi athenge iimveliso kunye neenkonzo eziveliswe apha ekhaya..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo se-arhente ehlela isakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti, u-S&P Global ngokuthi ayitshintshe indawo ebebeka kuyo uMzantsi Afrika ngokwesakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti – isuke kwimeko ezinzileyo iye kwimeko encumisayo.

src_text: Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) khathihi na nndwa dza ḽifhasi dzi no khou endelela zwo kwama tshiimo tsha kutshilele nga nḓila si yavhuḓi ḽifhasiḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: U-S&P Global usibeke kwizinga ngokwesakhono sokubhatala amatyala exesha elide abalwe ngezimali zangaphandle waze wasibeka ku-BB minus naku-BB kweletyala elibalwe ngemali yalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe na vhone vha khou farea zwavhuḓi nga gonya ha mitengo ya zwivhaswa, zwiḽiwa na zwishumiswa zwa vhuṱhogwa..     Roṱhe ri fanela shumisana, na thusana itela vhulunga zwiko zwashu kha tshifhinga tshino tshi konḓaho.
tgt_text: Iindleko zokuphila.

src_text: Muvhuso khou lwa nga nḓila dzoṱhe tshi ṋetshedza muṅwe na muṅwe masheleni ndiliso, nga maanḓa vha shayaho..     Bannga ya Vhukati ya Afrika Tshipembe yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe, yo khwaṱhaho nahone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi khou thusa nga pilela lushaka kha tshanduko ya mitengo si yavhuḓi nga ita uri vhe kha tshiimo tsho tendelwaho; ho sedzwa zwine maṅwe mashango khou ṱangana nazwo..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsheo yo dzhiwaho nga vha Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka tendelana na zwa fhungudzwa ha Mbadelo dza Zwivhaswa(GFL).
tgt_text: Ubhubhane weSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19) kunye nongquzulwano oluqhubayo kwihlabathi zenze iindleko zokuphila zenyuka kakhulu kwihlabathi liphela.
