src_text: GFL yo fhungudzwa nga  50 kha litha bva vhukati ha Lambamai na Shundunthule ḓo dovha hafhu ya gonyelanṱha bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwi swika ḽa 6 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Abemi boMzantsi Afrika bathwaxwa ngamaxabiso okunyuka kwamafutha ezithuthi, ukutya kunye nezinye izinto ezisisiseko.
Kufuneka sibambisane, sincedane sange ubutyebi beli lizwe ngala maxesha anzima.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya Khomishini ya zwa Miṱaṱisano lavhelesa tshoṱhe mitengo ya zwiḽiwa zwa vhuṱhogwa, nga maanḓa ṋetshedzo ya uri mabindu tea imelela zwa gonyisa ha mitengo..     Foramu ya vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan.
tgt_text: Urhulumente wenza konke okusemandleni ukuzama ukunika uncedo kumntu wonke, ingakumbi abantu abasweleyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza zwezwino dza Foramu ya Vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan, he ha tendelanwa kha mbekanyamushumo dzi shumisanaho zwavhuḓi kha nḓowetshumo dzo vusuludzwaho, thekhinoḽodzhi dza zwiendedzi zwi shumisaho muḓagasi na gesemaḓi yo vusuludzwaho..     Foramu yo tendelana kha ita maṱano nga shumisa vhudavhidzani ha muyani hu nḓila ya sumbedza zwikhala zwi re Afrika Tshipembe kha mabindu manzhi Japan, mveledziso dza vhukoni kha nḓowetshumo dza zwa sikwa ha mimoḓoro yapo, zwikhala zwa mveledziso dzi bveledzaho mishumo khathini na fhana tshenzhemo dza zwa thekhinikhaḽa.
tgt_text: IBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika esebenza kakuhle, ezinzileyo futhi nezimeleyo ifaka isandla izama ukuncenda isizwe singathwaxwa ngamandla kukunyuka kwamaxabiso ngokuthi igcine izinga lokunyuka kwamaxabiso lilawuleka; lingaphantsi kakhulu kweli lamanye amazwe..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo sikaNondyebo weSizwe sokwandisa kwexesha lokungatsalwa kwerhafu yawo onke amafutha ezithuthi, i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

src_text: Japan ndi ḽinwe ḽa mashango vhashumisani kha zwa mbambadzo nahone ndi ḽone ḽi re phanḓa kha zwa vhubindudzi kha sekithara dzi re na tshivhalo Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwa mimoḓoro ya kha zwa mitshini ya migodini yo khwiniswaho, na bva kha vhubindudzi ha zwa vhulimi ya kha tshumelo dza zwa masheleni..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Nethiweke ya Zwivhambadzelwannḓa ya Vharema yo thomiwaho nga Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano, hu itela ṱanganya mamaga ndangwa nga vharema ane zwa zwino khou vhambadzelannḓa zwibveledzwa zwapo kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: I-GFL yophulwe nge-R. 50 ilitha ngenyanga kaTshazimpunzi noCanzibe, kwaye iza kuphinda ingatsalwa ukususela ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeKhala..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yasamkela isigqibo seKhomishini yezoKhuphiswano sokubeka phantsi kweliso elibukhali amaxabiso okutya, ingakumbi ela solotya linyanzelisa amashishini ukuba anike izizathu ngokunyusa amaxabiso ezinto.

src_text: Nethiweke iyi ḓo bveledza khovhano ya mafhungo, tshenzhemo na nḓivho ya vhukoni, nahone bveledzea nga vhukoni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya vha nḓowetshumo dza Vharema..     Fulufulu tsireledzwa ha fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu zwo maanḓafhadzwa vhukuma nga murahu ha ṋetshedzwa ha Yunithi 4 ya zwa vhubindudzi ngei Tshiṱitshini tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga ṋetshedzwa uhu ho sumbedza swikelelwa ha tshipikwa tsha ndeme kha ndingedzo dza Eskom dza lingedza kwiṋisa sisiṱemu ya fulufulu nahone ḓo engedza maanḓa muḓagasi nga 800 megawadzi (MW) kha giridi ya fulufulu..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nzhele uri fhaṱiwa ha yunithi nṋa kha dza rathi dzi khou fanelaho khunyeledzwa kha thandela ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza engedzwa ha dzhenerasheni ntswa kha giridi, zwo itwaho uri zwi swikelelwe nga murahu ha ṱanganedza tsheo ya tendela vhabveledzi vha fulufulu vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe uri na vhone vha bveledzise muḓagasi.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan.

src_text: Muvhuso wo saina ḽińwalo ḽa thendelano ya ḓo renga 150 MW ya khaphasithi ya fulufulu bva kha vharengisi vha fulufulu ḽi konaho vusuludzwa nga huswa, vha Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan yakutsha nje, ethe yavumelana ngenkqubo yomsebenzi ende equka ukusebenzisana kumaphulo okwakha imizi-mveliso engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, ubuchwepheshe beemoto ezihamba ngombane kunye nehaydrojini engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya Broad-Based Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iphinde yavumelana ukuba kubanjwe umboniso oza kuqhutywa ngonxibelelwano lwevidiyo oza kubonisa ngamathuba akhoyo eMzantsi Afrika kumashishini ase-Japan, uphuhliso lwezakhono kwicandelo lezithuthi lalapha kweli, amaqela ajongene namathuba akhoyo kwicandelo lemizi-mveliso kunye nokwabelana ngolwazi olumayelana nobuchwepheshe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya B-BBEE ntswa kha ḽino shango yo khethwaho nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: I-Japan lelinye lamazwe abalulekileyo esirhweba nawo kwaye lelinye lamazwe atyala imali eninzi kumacandelo amaninzi eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwelezeemoto ukuya koomatshini bale mihla basemgodini, kwezolimo ukuya kwiinkonzo zezimali.

src_text: Khoro iyi yo vhumbwa nga zwigwada zwo fhambanaho zwa vhathu vha bvaho kha zwa vhubindudzi, yunioni dza mbambadzo, madzangano ḓitikaho nga lushaka khathihi na vha zwa pfunzo, Itsho tshigwada tshi ḓovha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha tsivhudza muvhuso kha maga u shandukisa ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa kwe-Black Exporters Network liSebe lezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano (i-DTIC), eza kudibanisa amashishini abantu abantsundu aqhuba ushishino lokuthumela kumazwe ehlabathi iimveliso zeli.

src_text: Naho honovha na tshanduko khulwane kha shandukiswa ha maitele muvhuso wa tshiṱalula kha Ikonomi, hu tshe na zwinzhi zwine zwa khou fanela itwa siani ḽa zwa ndangulo khwinisa zwikili khathihi na vula zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa vhoramabindu vha mafumakadzi na vhaswa.
tgt_text: Lo mbutho uza kunceda la mashishini akwazi ukwabelana ngolwazi, ngemingeni agagana nayo kunye nobuchule, kwaye wakhele kumsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe yiNkqubo yooSomashishini Abantsundu.

src_text: Miḓalo.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Masheleni bvaho kha muvhuso u thusa kha mavunḓu kwameaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo khou thusa nga nḓila yavhudi.
tgt_text: Umbono wethu wokuqinisekisa ukuba sinombane owaneleyo uye wasondela ekubeni ufezekiswe emva kokuba kuye kwanikezelwa ngokusesikweni kukaYunithi 4 weZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile, eliseMpumalanga.

src_text: Muvhuso wo kona ṋetshedza tshumelo ya nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, maḓi kunaho na madzulo kha vhathu vho xelelwaho nga mahaya khathihi na lugisa themamveledziso dzo vhaisalaho.
tgt_text: Ukunikezelwa kwale Yunithi kubaluleke kakhulu kumalinge ka-Eskom okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo kwezombane kwaye le Yunithi iza kugalela umbane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-800 kwiziko lophehlo-mbane lesizwe..     IKhabhinethi ivile nokuba sele ugqityiwe umsebenzi wokwakha iiyunithi zokuphehla umbane ezine kwezintandathu kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile.

src_text: Mushumo muhulwane nḓilani wa vhuedzedza tshumelo dza fhasisa sa nḓisedzo ya maḓi, muḓagasi, mabunga khathihi na kulumaga mashika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukongezwa kweYunithi entsha yokuvelisa umbane kwiziko lombane lesizwe, into leyo ethe yenzeka ngenxa yesigqibo esathathwayo sokuvumela abavelisi bombane abazimeleyo ukuba bavelise umbane.

src_text: Masheleni swikalo R189, 217 miḽioni khou shumiswa kha khwiṋisa Mbekanyamushumo ya Madzulo songo Tendelwaho zwi tshi khou itelwa khwiṋisa nzulelo dza vhadzulapo vha fhethu hu songo tendelwaho..     Masheleni mańwe hafhu swikaho R733, 086 miḽioni ṋetshedzwa nga vha Ndiliso ya Madzulo Vhathu hu itela thusa kha fhaṱiwa fhethu huswa ho tendelwaho dzula vhathu.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usanda kutyikitya isivumelwano sokuthenga umbane oyi-150 MW kwa-Scatec ASA, inkampani evelisa umbane ohlaziyekayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza na livhuwa thikhedzo bvaho kha Shango ḽa Qatar zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, dzidzhenereitha, zwikunakisi zwa maḓi, madennde khathihi na nḓisedzo ya mishonga ya alafha.
tgt_text: IBhunga labaCebisi ngokuXhotyiswa Banzi kwabaNtsundu ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Ndambedzo iyi ḓo thusa vhadzulapo vha swikaho 4 000 vhane zwa zwino vhana madzulo vha khou dzula sentharani dza muvhuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukonyulwa kweBhunga labaCebisi le-B-BBEE nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thuso ya zwa vhuthusavhathu bva kha shango ḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa khathihi na maḓi kunaho zwi ḓo newa avho vho welwaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mveledziso dza zwa Matshilisano.
tgt_text: Eli bhunga lenziwe ngabantu abahlukeneyo abaphuma kwezoshishino, kwimibutho yabasebenzi, kwimibutho yoluntu kunye nakumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, abaza kwenza umsebenzi wokukhokela urhulumente kwimizamo yakhe yokwenza iinguqu kuqoqosho.

src_text: 1    Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya Matshilisano tsho ṋetshedzwaho nga vha Tshumisano ya Mveledziso dza Nḓowetshumo (IDC) vho ṱangana na ofisi ya Presidennde khathihi na vha dtic.
tgt_text: Nangona umde umgama osele uhanjiwe ukulungisa umonakalo owenziwa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo wokuba uqoqosho lube sezandleni zegcuntswana, kusekuninzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukwandisa inani labantu abantsundu kwizikhundla zolawulo, ukuphuhlisa izakhono kunye nokwandisa amaqumrhu ekuthengwa kuwo ukuze kunikwe amanina antsundu kunye nolutsha amathuba..     Izikhukhula.

src_text: Thikhedzo iyi ḓo bveledzisa zwikhala zwa mishumo kha vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 hune vha ḓovha vha khou shumela zwitshavhani zwa mahayani.. 2    Thikhedzo iyi ḓo ṋetshedza thusa ya ndondola mutakalo kha zwitshavha, zwiḽiwa na dzikhishi dzi ṋetshedzaho sobo dza pfushi ṱuṱuwedza zwa ńwala na vhala ṋetshedza dzi mbekanyamushumo dzi tsivhudzaho vhathu nga ha tsireledza mupo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhaswa.
tgt_text: Amalinge aqhubayo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo kumaphondo ebechatshazelwe zizikhukhula ezimandla enza umahluko obonakalayo.

src_text: Tshikwama tsho tshi ḓo tikedza zwitshavha zwi swikaho 26 honeha hu si na ndavhelelo ya mbuyelo ya masheleni.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uwukhokelise phambili umba wokunikezela ngokutya, amanzi kunye neendawo zokufihla iintloko ebantwini abaphulukene namakhaya abo kunye nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo ezonakeleyo.

src_text: Zwa Vhugevhenga na Tshanḓanguvhoni.
tgt_text: Uyaqhuba, sithetha nje, umsebenzi omkhulu wokubuyisela kwimo yesiqhelo iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezifana namanzi, umbane, ugutyulo kunye nokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma..     Imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa fariwa ha vhathu vha tshivhalo vha khou ṱumanywaho na zwa tswa wanala na masheleni hombokiwaho khathihi na maitele tshanḓanguvhoni.
tgt_text: 217 iyasebenza ngoku kwiNkqubo yokuPhucula iiNdawo ezingamaTyotyombe ngeenjongo zokuphucula ubomi babantu abahlala kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Hu tshi katelwa na vhashumi vhakale vha muvhuso vhe vha vha vha kha vhuimo ha nṱha, vhańwe vha hone vho livhana na mulayo nga mulandu wa kandekanya Mulayo wa Vhulanguli ha Masheleni Lushaka, wa 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Enye imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Kha farwa ho hu katelwa na farwa ha mushumi wa Muhasho wa zwa Muno ngei sentharani ya dzula vhafhalali ya Desmond Tutu wanalaho Pitori nga murahu ha hweswa mulandu wa ṱanganedza masheleni tshanḓanguvhoni bva kha muṅwe wa vhabvannḓa - izwo zwi tou vha tsumbo ya uri huna muthu ane avha nṱha ha mulayo nahone huna tshikhala tsha vhashumi vha sa fulufhedzei kha ofisi dza muvhuso..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza muvhigo wa farwa ha vhanna vhavhili ri vha vhuye ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vha divhiwaho sa MaGupta, madzina avho ndi Rajesh na Atul.
tgt_text: 086 ibekelwe isiBonelelo soPhuhliso lweziNdlu ukuze incede ukwakha iindawo ezizinzileyo nezihlangeneyo zokuhlala abantu.

src_text: Izwi ndi nga murahu ha muvhigo wa zwezwino wo ṱahiswaho wa uri vho fariwa ngei Dubai kha ḽa UAE he zwa ḓivhadzwa nga Dzangano ḽa Mapholisa kha Vhugevhenga ḽa Dzitshaka (Interpol).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalamkela uncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela kwilizwe lase-Qatar ebelikukutya, iimpahla, iijenereyitha, oomatshini bokucoca amanzi, iintente kunye namayeza.

src_text: Avho murathu na mukomana vha khou ṱodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga murahu ha ṱumanywa na vhugevhenga ha dzhia ndaulo ya muvhuso, vhufhura khathihi na vha na masheleni tshandanguvhoni.
tgt_text: Esi sipho siza kuxhanyulwa ngabemi abangama-4 000 abasahlala okwethutyana kumaziko oluntu.

src_text: Nyambedzano vhukati ha mazhendezi mihasho mulayo vhukati ha shango ḽa UAE na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe dzi khou bvelaphanḓa farwa havho hu sumbedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha ulwa na vhugevhenga khathihi na tshanḓanguvhoni hu si na nyofho kana tshiḓivhano farwa ha avho vhanna zwi sumbedza ri nḓila dza kutshimbidzele kwa zwithu dzi khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha vhona ri vhakandekanyaho mulayo vha khou livhanyiswa na wo nahone huna muthu re nṱha ha mulayo..     Khabinethe yo sasaladza maitele mavhi u nyadza ikonomi na shango ḽashu nga murahu ha zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha thambo dza muḓagasi ngei kha Yunithi 1 ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Eskom vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwalamkele noncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela e-United Arab Emirates obelukukutya kunye namanzi okunceda amaxhoba ezi zikhukhula bezi thwaxe eli kwezi veki ziphelileyo.

src_text: Ndi lwa vhuṋa izwo zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha zwiṱitshi zwa muḓagasi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga murahu ha musi hu tshi khou tou bva vhigwa zwiṅwe zwiraru zwe zwa tshinyadzwa vhegeni dzo fhiraho.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dza zwezwino dzi tou vha tsumbo ya ri hu tshe na mushumo muhulwane une lushaka lwa fanela ita ri lushaka lu kone tsireledzea.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa ngokusesikweni kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi yi-Industrial Development Corporation (i-IDC) isebenzisana ne-Ofisi kaMongameli kunye ne-DTIC.

src_text: Zwiito zwa vhugevhenga zwi khou bvelelaho zwi ri sumbedza ri nḓila ya fhungudza vhugevhenga ndi vhuḓifhinduleli hashu roṱhe sa lushaka - ri tshi katela mapholisa, vharangaphanḓa vha madzangano poḽotiki, vhorambindu, vhashumi khathihi na vhadzulapo - roṱhe nga tou angaredza ri fanela ulwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga..     Khabinethe khou fulufhela ri gwama ḽe ḽa ṋetshedzwa vha Minisiṱiri wa Mapholisa itela thusa zwiṱitshi zwa mapholisa zwine zwa vha na tshivhalo tsha nṱha kha milandu ingaho mabulayo tshipiwa khathihi na mińwe milandu zwi ḓo thusa ri zwitshavha zwa vhathu zwi tsireledzee.
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kunika abantu abatsha abanokude bafikelele kuma-50 000 amathuba emisebenzi ezizingxungxo eluncedo ekuhlaleni neyenziwa kwasekuhlaleni.. 2    Ezi zingxungxo ziza kuquka ukuncedisa kwicandelo lezempilo nonakekelo loluntu, ukuncedisa kwezokutya nesondlo kumaziko abonelela abantu abangathathi ntweni ngento esiwa phantsi kwempumlo, ukuncedisa kumaphulo okufundisa ukubhala nokufunda, ukutyala imithi namanye amalinge okulwa uguqu-guquko lwemozulu kunye namaphulo okunceda ulutsha.

src_text: Maswamaswa nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kuxhasa imibutho yoluntu kunye nengenzi ngeniso engama-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo humbudza lushaka zwauri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshe hone nahone ri fanela isa phanḓa na maitele oṱhe u ḓitsireledza na tsireledza vhańwe.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Maitele u ḓitsireledza katela ṱamba zwanḓa kana sanithaiza zwanḓa misi yoṱhe dzulela ambara masiki ri dzi pherani dzulela sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe vula mafasiṱere ri hu dzhene muya khathihi na hayeliwa..     Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakubulela ukubanjwa kwabantu abaninzi ngezityholo ezinxulumene nobuqhetseba, ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali kunye norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱangadzedza mulevho, muani na vhuḓikumedzeli zwo dzhiwaho kha Guvhangano ḽi lwaho na maitele zwa Vhuravhele na Dzitshandukiso dzi si ho Mulayoni kha dzhango ḽa Afrika wo farelwaho Malabo, kha Riphabuḽiki ya Equatorial Guinea, nga Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Aba bantu baquka abo babesakuba zizikhulu kurhulumente nakumaqumrhu akhe, futhi abanye babo babekwe amatyala anxulumene nokwaphula uMthetho wokuLawulwa kweziMali zikaRhulumente (i-PFMA), wowe-1999 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowe-1999).

src_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango ḽa Afrika vho lavhelesa zwiwo zwa shushedza, vha sedza nḓila ya khwine ya kufhindulele kha ayo maitele khathihi na ḓiimisela tsireledza mashango ane avha miraḓo ya dzangano ane khou ṱangana na khaedu dza zwa vhuravhele na maitele u vhaiswa..     Vhulwadze ha Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Aba bantu babanjiweyo – abaquka igosa leSebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya kwiziko leembacu, i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre, ePitoli elityholwa ngokuthatha imali yokunyoba kummi wangaphandle – babubungqina bokuba ngenene umthetho awuthengi buso nokuba abasebenzi abanganyanisekanga abafuneki kurhulumente..     IKhabhinethi iyavuyiswa nangumsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokubuyiselwa eMzantsi Afrika kwabafo bakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadza vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwa ri vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakolo vho ḓiimisela tshothe kha lavhelesana na thivhela vhulwadze ha Monkeypox, zwi tshi tevhela dzhena haho kha mashango vhalaho songo ḓoweleaho kha zwa tshoṱelwa nga malwadze.
tgt_text: Oku kulandela ukubanjwa kwabo e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuba uMbutho weHlabathi wamaPolisa oLwaphulo-mthetho (i-Interpol) uye yakhupha umgqaliselo wokuba babanjwe apho babonwe khona.

src_text: Ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe hu saathu vha na muthu na muthihi no ṱolwaho kana kavhiwaho nga uvho vhulwadze, vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakalo kha ḽi no shango vha kati tshoṱhe na lavhelesana na uvho vhulwadze     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Aba bafo bakwa-Gupta bayafunwa ngabakwantsasana eMzantsi Afrika ngokunxulumene nendima ekutyholwa ukuba bayidlala kumkhuba wokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, kuquka ubuqhetseba nokuthutyeleziswa kwemali.

src_text: Vhukwamani na Lushaka nga ha Maga ane nga Dzhiwa kha Ulwa na Zwiito zwi si ho Mulayoni zwa Rengisa Tsimbi dza Kale.
tgt_text: Luyaqhuba uthetha-thethwano phakathi kwee-arhente zogcino-mthetho zoMzantsi Afrika kunye nezase-UAE malunga nokubuyiselwa kwabo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na zwa ri huvhe na nyambedzano dzi katelaho lushaka nga ha khumbelo dzo ṱahisiwaho dza thivhela zwiito zwa rengiswa ha tsimbi dza kale na dza zwino.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwabo kubonakalisa ukuba urhulumente uzimisele ngenene ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo ngaphandle koloyiko nokujonga ubuso bomntu.

src_text: Zwa tswiwa ha tsimbi dza kale na thambo dza khopha kha themamveledziso dza muvhuso zwi kwama nyaluwo ya ikonomi nga nḓila si yavhuḓi..     Khaedu dzine dza vha hone dzi katela kwamea ha nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi na tshumelo dza zwidimela nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwiporo.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwaba bantu kubonakalisa ukuba ziyasebenza iinkqubo namanyathelo okuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo ezihambisa umzimba kwaye zikwabubungqina bokuba umthetho awuthengi buso.

src_text: Izwi zwi kwama vhaṋameli nga vha engedzela thaidzo ya masheleni u tshimbila nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwidimela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iligxibhe kabukhali ilinge lokuzama ukusengela phantsi uqoqosho lweli lizwe nokudelela ilizwe uqobo emva komonakalo ombi owenziwe kwikheyibhuli ekuYunithi 1 kwisiKhululo soPhehlo-mbane sika-Eskom, iMatla esiseMpumalanga.

src_text: Thambo dza muḓagasi dzo ṱhukhukanywaho dzi vhea lushaka kha tshiimo tsha khombo, nga maanḓa vhana vhaṱuku..     Khabinet yo ṋea maanḓa vha Muhasho wa dtic ri vha tshimbidze iyo miṱangano nga tshifhinga tshe vha ṋewa tshone, nahone vha fanela vhudzisa lushaka uri hu fanela itwa mini ri muvhuso kone fhelisa maitele mavhi u tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso dza vhuṱhogwa kha khwaṱhisa ikonomi.
tgt_text: Eli ibilityeli lesine kusenziwa amalinge okonakalisa ngabom isikhululo sophehlo-mbane elilandela amanye amatyeli amathathu alo mkhuba kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo.

src_text: Zwezwo nga murahu, Khabinethe ḓo kona ṱahisa maga khethwaho kha ulwa na yo maitele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-manani zolwaphulo-mthetho zibonakalisa ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bakuthi bakhuselekile.

src_text: Tshumisano ya Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi na Peacekeeping International Symposium (PTPS).
tgt_text: Oku kusikhumbuza ukuba idabi lokulwa amazinga aphezulu olwaphulo-mthetho lelesizwe kwaye nathi sonke – kuquka amapolisa, iinkokeli zezopolitiko, uluntu ngokubanzi, iintsapho, oosomashishini, abasebenzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu – kufuneka sidlale indima yethu ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa fara muṱangano wa vhurathi wa zwa PTPS na vha Khoro ya Sainthifiki na Thoḓisiso ya Nḓowetshumo ngei Piṱori bva nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Fulwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inethemba elikhulu ukuba le mali ibekelwe bucala yi-Ofisi yoMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ilungiselela izikhululo zamapolisa ezinamanani aphezulu abantu ababuleleyo, abadlwenguleyo kunye nezinye izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela iza kunceda kakhulu ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ize yenze zikhuseleke kumntu wonke iindawo esihlala kuzo..     Ezakutsha nge-COVID-.

src_text: Muṱangano uyo khou lavhelelwa dzhenelwa nga vharangaphanḓa vha swikaho 300 vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo swikaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuza wonke umntu ukuba i-COVID-19 ayikapheli kwaye amathuba okuba lande inani labantu abosulelwe yiyo aza kunyuka ngeli xesha lasebusika.
Masiqhubeleke ngokuthatha amanyathelo afanelekileyo okuzikhusela thina kunye nabanye abantu.

src_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo dzhenelwa nga maswole, mapholisa, na vhathu vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN vha tshiitela pfumbudzana nga ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya tshizwino, yo khwinifhadzwaho na mbekanyamaitele dza vhurangeli kha puḽane dza UN.
tgt_text: La manyathelo aquka ukuhlamba izandla rhoqo ngamanzi okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, ukunxiba izifonyo xa ungaphakathi kwizakhiwo, ukungasondelelani, ukuvula iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya kunye nokugonya..     INgqungquthela yeMbumba ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo shumiswa sa fhethu ha ṱahisa mafhungo fhambanaho khathihi na fha zwikhala miraḓo ya UN vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha zwa ḓisa mulalo hu tshi khou shumiswa thekhinoḽodzhi ya puḽane dza ḓisa mulalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhambathiso kunye nezithembiso ezamkelwe kwiNgqungquthela eNkulu ye-AU engezoBunqolobi kunye noTshintsho Olungahambi ngokoMgaqo-siseko e-Afrika ebibanjelwe e-Malabo, e-Republic of Equitorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Muṱatisano wa Lushaka no Fariwa Ṅwaha Muṅwe na Muṅwe wa Vhuṋa wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha Zwikili zwa Ḽifhasi (WSZA).

Muṱaṱisano wa lushaka farwaho ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe  4th  WSZA khou farelwa ngei Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga ḽa 7 swika 10 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ya: “Ratcheting up the Production of 21st Century Artisans”..     Tshipikwa tsha farwa ha uyo muṱangano ndi ṱuṱuwedza zwikili zwa athizene sa izwi ḽi buḓo ḽi shumaho zwavhuḓi khathihi na vula zwikhala zwa vhushumisani kha iḽo buḓo dovha hafhu wa shumiswa sedzuluse zwikalo zwa vhane vho lugelwa nga guda khathihi na kona vhona uri ndi vhafhio vhane vha nga khwinifhadza nga kha tshikhala tsha ṱanganedza vhagudi vhane vha khou ṱoda dzhia athizene sa buḓo ḽavho     MilaedzaNdiliso Khabinethe yo tevhedza Phresindennde Vho Ramaphosa kha rumela ndiliso kha vha muṱa wa Vhuhosini na lushaka lwa vha amaMpondo Kingdom zwi tshi tevhela ri sia shango ha KhosiKhulu Vho Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.1)    Vho Jacob Ganny Mbele sa Muofisiri Mulanguli Muhulwane (DG) wa Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Mineraḽa na Fulufulu2)    Mufumakadzi Vho Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada sa Tshanḓa tsha Muofisiri Mulanguli kha Muhasho wa zwa Mupo Vhusimamiri na Vhureakhovhe3)    Mufumakadzi Vho Susan Mafanedza Masapu sa Mutsivhudzi kha Mulayo Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Mulayotewa.
tgt_text: Iinkokeli ze-Afrika zahlola izinto eziyingozi ezihleli zijinga, zaqwalasela amanyathelo athatyathwayo ukusabela kwezi zinto zaze zazibophelela ukuba ziza kuqinisekisa ukuba ukhuseleko lungqingqwa kumazwe angamalungu e-AU onganyelwe yingxaki yobunqolobi nabavukeli-mbuso.

src_text: 4)    Mufumakadzi Vho Doris Tshepe sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Vhuṱaṱisani.5)    Dokotela Vho Alex Mahapa sa Mueletshedzi wa tshifhinga tshoṱhe kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.6)    Muimeleli Vho Rams Ramashia sa Mueletshedzi nga zwifhinga kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Tshanduko ya Kilima.
tgt_text: Ukutshintsha kweMozulu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza madalo kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Alok Sharma, Phresidennde wa Muṱangano wa nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima wa Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) wa vhu 26 bva nga ḽa 19 swika ḽa 21 Fulwi 2022 khathihi na tsenguluso yavho ya uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽo sumbedza vhuḓikumedzeli vhu re khagala kha zwa shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMnu Alok Sharma, eMzantsi Afrika nongu Mongameli weNgqungquthela yeZizwe eziManyaneyo (i-UN) yama-26 yoTshintsho lweMozulu.

src_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho vha tshipiḓa tsha vhaṅwe vharangaphanḓa musi vha tshi ḓivhadza tshumisano ya ḓivhazwakale vhukati ha shango ḽashu na mivhuso ya mashango fanaho na ḽa France, Germany, United Kingdom, United States, hu tshi katelwa na European Union ya tikedza tshanduko pfadzaho ya ya kha ikonomi ine ya vha na muhasaladzo wa khaboni ya fhasi khathihi na tshitshavha tshi konḓelelaho tshanduko ya kilima.
tgt_text: Ukusuka ngomhla we-19 ukuya kowama-21 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, kananjalo lwamkelwe ngezandla ezishushu uvavanyo lwakhe oluziphumo zalo zithe uMzantsi Afrika ubonakalise ukuzinikela okungathandabuzekiyo kutshintsho lwamandla acocekileyo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo shuma vhukuma kha ita ndugiselo dza shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho khathihi na ya kha zwiko zwa fulufulu ḽo kunaho zwine zwa fana na haiḓirodzheni yo kunaho, bayomasi, fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha muya, fulufulu ḽa masana ḓuvha na fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha maḓi, na zwiṅwe zwinzhi zwi vusuludzeaho.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka wama-2021, uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wazimanye nezinye iinkokeli ekubhengezeni intsebenziswano eyaba yimbali kunye norhulumente waseFransi, eJamani, e-United Kingdom nowaseMelika, kwakunye neManyano yaseYurophu, ukuxhasa utshintsho olunobulungisa kuqoqosho lwekhabhoni ephantsi kunye noluntu olukwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa fulufulu ḽo vanganaho ndi zwone zwine zwa ita uri hu vhe na ndinganyiso vhukati ha zwiko zwa fulufulu hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisedza nḓisedzo ya fulufulu ḽi fulufhedzeaho uri hu kone swikelwa ṱhoḓea dza fulufulu dzine dza khou engedzea nga luvhilo fhano shangoni shumiswa ha khaelo dza Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubusebenza nzima ekulungiseleleni inguqu yokuvelisa amandla acocekileyo kunye nenyathelo lokucoca imithombo yamandla efana nehidrojeni ecocekileyo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla elanga kunye nombane ophehlwa ngamanzi, nekuzezinye izinto ezinokuhlaziywa kabutsha ukuze kuveliswe amandla ombane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwihulwane ha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga COVID-19 zwe zwa rekhodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho nahone khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vho teaho uri vha bvele phanḓa na haelwa, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo thusa kha thivhela lwala lwo kalulaho valelwa vhuongeloni na lufu.
tgt_text: Le ngxubevange yamandla ivumela ulungelelwaniso phakathi kwemithombo yamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba ilizwe lifumana amandla awoneleyo nangekho ethe-ethe nakwaziyo ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zamandla ezikhulayo zelizwe.

src_text: Hafu ya vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha vhaaluwa vha Afrika Tshipembe vho no wana phimamushonga ya khaelo nthihi ya COVID-19 swika zwino.
tgt_text: Ukuthathwa kwesitofu sokugonyela intsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Muvhuso khou dzudzanya shumisa masheleni khadzimiso ya nzwalelo dza fhasi ane kha ḓi tou bva tendelwa nga vha Bannga ya Ḽifhasi kha renga dziṅwe phimamushonga dza khaelo ya COVID-19 dza ḓadzisa khathihi na vhona uri lushaka lwo tsireledzwa nga nḓila yo teaho kha kavhiwa hune ha nga vha hone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukwehla okumandla kosulelo lwe-COVID-19 eMzantsi Afrika kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo kwaye ikhuthaze bonke abantu abafanelekileyo ukuba baqhubeleke nokugonya, kuba oku kuthintela ukugula okumandla, ukulaliswa esibhedlele kunye nokufa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha zwa ndangulo ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19, nga maanḓa mvelaphanḓa ine ya khou itwa musi ho sedzwa zwa vhuyela tshoṱhe kha maitele ḓoweleaho zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.
tgt_text: Isiqingatha sabo bonke abantu abadala baseMzantsi Afrika ukuza kuthi ga ngoku sele befumene ithamo elinye ubuncinane lokugonyela i-COVID-.

src_text: Minisiṱa wa zwa Mutakalo, Dokotela Vho Joe Phaahla, vha ḓo netshedza zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓadzisa.
tgt_text: Urhulumente ujonge ukusebenzisa imali-mboleko enenzala ephantsi esandula kuvunywa yiBhanki yeHlabathi ukuze athenge izitofu zogonyo ze-COVID-19 kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba isizwe sikhuseleke ngokwaneleyo kusulelo olungenzeka lubekhona.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwaqwalasele imiba enxulumene nophuhliso lolawulo lobhubhani we-COVID-19, ingakumbi kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ekubuyeleni ngokupheleleyo kwimisebenzi yesiqhelo yentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe nge vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzi tsha Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka nga Ḽavhuṋa, 16 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U bveledza mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo havhuḓi.” Muya wa mafulufulu na konḓelela we wa sumbedzwa nga vhaswa mona na shango ḽashu, nangoho ndi zwithu zwine zwa tea fhululedzwa na dzhiiwa sa fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha khwine.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uGq Joe Phaahla, uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngalo mba.

src_text: Musi ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa Lushaka tshi khou swika magumoni, kha ri khwaṱhise nungo dzashu itela uri vhaswa vha kone swikela vhunzhi ha mbekanyamushumo dza thikhedzo dzine dza netshedzwa nga muvhuso khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa dzhenela havho kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho..   Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwane, wo dzhenelela kha khaedu iyi nga ita uri matshudeni vho phasaho digirii dzavho vhane vha sa shume vha wane tshenzhemo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo dza Ngudo na Vhugudelamushumo dza Muvhuso dzo livhiswaho kha Vhagudiswa vho fhedzaho Digirii dzavho.
tgt_text: Usuku loLutsha lweSizwe.

src_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa shumisa Tshikwama Tsha sika Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano (SEF) khathihi na vusuludza maga u sika mishumo vha tshiimiswa tsha Tshumelo ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYS) lune tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha zwiimiswa izwi tsha ḓo kunga vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 kha ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuzimanya kwabo kwizikhumbuzo zoSuku loLutsha lweSizwe, ebelibhiyozelwa ngoLwesine, umhla we-16 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuphila okuzinzileyo nokomelela kwabantu abatsha ukuze babe nengomso elingcono.”.

src_text: Haya maga ha nga ḓo tou ṋetshedza fhedzi tshenzhemo ya mushumo ine ya ṱoḓea ngaurali, fhedzi ḓo dovha hafhu khwaṱhisedza ndeme ya vha vhadzulapo vha re na ṱhogomelo.
tgt_text: Njengoko siyisonga iNyanga yoLutsha lweSizwe, masiqinise iinzame zethu zokuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayafikelela kwiinkqubo ezininzi zenkxaso ezibonelelwa ngurhulumente kwaye siququzelele ukuthatha kwabo inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: Vha SEF vha shumisana na madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso (dzi NGO) ngeno vha NYS vha tshi shumisa vhaswa kha tshumelo dzi vhuedzaho tshitshavha mona na shango.
tgt_text: INkonzo kaRhulumente, njengoyena mqeshi mkhulu, isabele kulo mceli mngeni ngokunika ithuba  abafundi abaphumelele izidanga abangaphangeliyo lokufumana amava ngeNkqubo ye-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

src_text: Vhuendi.
tgt_text: Urhulumente ukwaphumeza iNgxowa-mali yeNgqesho yoLuntu (i-SEF) kunye namanyathelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi eNkonzo yoLutsha yeSizwe (i-NYS) aza kutsalela abantu abatsha abangama-50 000 kuqoqosho ngalinye.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya Shuma ya Nṱha dza 11 yo livhiswaho kha fhelisa thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na tholwa ha vhadzulapo vha mashango nnḓa sa vhareili vha maṱiraka.
tgt_text: La manyathelo akasayi kubonelela ngamava omsebenzi afuneka kakhulu nje kuphela kodwa azokwazi nokomeleza ixabiso nokuziva ungummi obalulekileyo elizweni.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ye ya bveledzwa nga Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisiṱa ya nga ha Vhuendi ha Badani na Vhuendedzathundu (IMC) vha tshi shumisana na vha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhuendi ha badani na vhuendedzathundu ṱuṱuwedza zwa khwaṱhiswa ha ṱhoḓea dza visa khathihi na tevhedzwa ha milayo ya zwa vhashumi.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nemibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO) ngelixa i-NYS yona ibhalisa ulutsha kwiinkonzo ezinceda uluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: IMC yo vhumbwa hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na migwalabo ya vhareili vha maṱiraka vha Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ezothutho.

src_text: Migwalabo na thivhiwa ha dzibada zwi kwama matshimbilele vhathu na thundu nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, zwa tshuwisa vhabindudzi vha mashango nnḓa nahone zwa ndemesa, zwa kwama ikonomi na nḓila dza nḓisedzo dza thundu na tshumelo dza ndeme dzine dza shumisa magondo eneo kwameaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso sokuSebenza esizakumiselwa kwiinkalo ezili-11 ezizakujongana nokuvalwa kweendlela kunye nokuqeshwa kwabemi bamazwe angaphandle njengabaqhubi beelori.

src_text: Ṱhahelelo ya maḓi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso, sathi saphuhliswa yiKomiti yabaPhathiswa beNdlela noThutho (i-IMC) ngentsebenziswano nabachaphazelekayo kushishino lwendlela nothutho, sikhuthaza phakathi kwezinye izinto ukunyanzeliswa kweemfuneko ze-visa kunye nokuthotyelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa NMB kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha u thivhela Ḓuvha ḽa sa vha na Shotha na Ḽithihi ḽa Maḓi sa izwi vunḓu ḽi tshi khou livhana na ṱhahelelo khulwane ya maḓi ye ya thoma bva nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasekwa ukuze ijongane nokwanda kokuvalwa kweendlela kunye noqhanqalazo lwabaqhubi belori baseMzantsi Afrika abangonwabanga.

src_text: Vha DWS vha khou shumisana na vunḓu kha thoma shumisa maga tshifhinga tshipfufhi, tsha vhukati na tshilapfu itela tandulula na fhungudza thaidzo ya masiandaitwa gomelelo ane nga vha hone.
tgt_text: Uqhanqalazo kunye nokuvalwa kwendlela kuchaphazela kakubi ukuhambahamba kwabantu neemoto, kwale loyikisa abatyali-mali bamanye amazwe, eyona mpembelelo embi ngakumbi  ikuqoqosho kunye nokubonelela ngeenkonzo eziyimfuneko ezisebenzisa iindlela  ezichaphazelekayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya kwengweledza vhadzulapo vha NMB uri vha tevhedze milayo yo vhewaho ya fhungudzwa ha maḓi nga masipala wapo itela vhona uri hu khou dzulela vha na nḓisedzo yo teaho ya maḓi.
tgt_text: Ukunqongophala kwamanzi kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Nga angaredza, kushumiselwe kwa maḓi ku tea fhungudzwa ya kha ḽithara dza 50 miḽioni nga ḓuvha bva kha tshikalo tsha zwino tsha ḽithara dza 280 miḽioni nga ḓuvha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele ungenelelo lweSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo (i-DWS) kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-NMB eMpuma Koloni ukunqanda iimini ezoma nko (Day Zero)  njengoko eli phondo lijongene nokunqongophala okumandla kwamanzi kususela ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
tgt_text: Ngoko ke i-DWS isebenzisana nephondo ukuphumeza amanyathelo exesha elifutshane, eliphakathi nelide ukulungisa nokuthomalalisa impembelelo esenokubakhona yembalela.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha zwenezwino ha muofisiri wa Muhasho wa Muno ane shuma fhaḽa kha ofisi ya Benoni nge wanala ṋetshedza phasipoto ya vhufhura kha mudzulapo wa shango ḽa Bangladesh.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yabongoza abahlali base-NMB ukuba babambelele kwizithintelo zamanzi ezibekwe ngoomasipala basekhaya ngelo kuqinisekisa ukugcinwa kwamanzi.

src_text: Muofisiri, Mufumakadzi Vho Sibongile Simelane, vho ṋewa beiḽi ya masheleni linganaho R5 000 ngei Khothe ya Madzhisiṱiraṱa ya Benoni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Kukonke, ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi kufuneka kucuthwe ngezigidi zeelitha ezingama-50 ngosuku, ukusuka kwinqanaba langoku lezigidi zeelitha ezingama-280 ngosuku ukuya phantsi kwizigidi zeelitha ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Mudzulapo wa Bangladesh, Vho Fahim Kazi, vho farwa musi vha tshi khou lingedza ṱuwa kha ḽino nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022 vha tshi khou shumisa dzina ḽa, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Muhasho wa zwa Muno (DHA) kha ḓi tou bva humisela murahu shangoni ḽawe mutambi wa matambwa bvaho kha ḽa Lithuania, Mufumakadzi Vho Ieva Andrejevaite vhe vha lingedza shumisa milayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yone ya ndangulo ya zwa vhufhalali ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi luka mafhungo mazwifhi uri vha khou ṱoḓa ita khumbelo ya ṋewa vhudzumbamo nga mulandu wa “nndwa ine ya khou bvela phanḓa ngei kha ḽa Ukraine”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukubanjwa kwakutsha nje kwegosa leMicimbi yezeKhaya elisebenza kwi-ofisi yase-Benoni elenzele ummi wase-Bangladeshi incwadana yokundwendwela yobuqhophololo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza mushumo une wa khou itwa nga vha Yunithi ya lwa na Zwiito zwa Vhuaḓa ya DHA.
tgt_text: Igosa, uNksz Sibongile Simelane, unikwe ibheyile ye-R5 000 kwinkundla kaMantyi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibini umhla wama-21 kweyeSilimela ngo-.

src_text: Yo khoḓa na ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo zwavho vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhiga zwiito zwenezwo zwa vhugevhenga.
tgt_text: Yena ke Ummi wase-Bangladeshi, uMnumzana Fahim Kazi, wabanjwa ngethuba ezama ukubaleka alishiya ilizwe ngomhla we-12  kuCanzibe ngo-2022 ebaleka enegama elithi 'Lebogang Ndlovu'.

src_text: Zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha rengisa ṱhalusavhuṋe dzavho zwi na masiandaitwa vhavhaho vhukuma kha tsireledzo ya shango na tshiimo tshaḽo tsha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.
tgt_text: ISebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya (i-DHA) lisanda kubuyisela emva ekhaya umdlali we-Lithuanian, uNksz Ieva Andrejevaite, owayefuna ukusebenzisa kakubi ulawulo lweembacu lwaseMzantsi Afrika ngokuxela amampunge ebali lokufuna ukufaka isicelo se-asylum ngenxa "yemfazwe yase-Ukraine".

src_text: Muvhuso ḓo bvela phanḓa na lwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho na muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane ḓidzhenisa kha zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwine zwa fhedza zwi tshi nyadzisa milayo yashu ya zwa vhupfuluwi, hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwa wuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe lisebe i-DHA kwicandelo lalo lwedesika elwa norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa ha zwenezwino ha mudededzi wa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban Mufumakadzi Vho Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37), vhe vha gwevhiwa miṅwaha miraru vhe nga fhasi ha vhulavhelesi ha vhululamisi na miṅwaha miṋa vho valelwa dzhele, tshigwevho itshi tshoṱhe tshi tshi ḓo fhahewa lwa miṅwaha miraru, ngei Khothe ya Dzingu ya Umlazi kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga mulandu wa pfuka Mulayo wa Khetho dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa ṅwaha wa 2000 (Mulayo 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Iqhwabela izandla kwaye ikhuthaza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokuzixela izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezinjalo.

src_text: Sa mudededzi kha tshikolo tshe tsha vha tshi khou shumiswa sa tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo nga tshifhinga tsha Khetho dza Masipala nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021, Mufumakadzi Vho Gabuza vho ḓivhona mulandu wa vhufhura ha khetha lwa tshivhalo tshi linganaho 24 kha Khetho dza Masipala ngeno huṅwe khetha ha tshiṅwe tshivhalo tshi linganaho 12 vho hu ita kha Khetho dza Wadi.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho semthethweni zabemi boMzantsi Afrika abathengisa izazisi zabo zineziphumo ezimbi kakhulu kukhuseleko lwelizwe kunye nobuhle bentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Uhu wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa hu nyadzisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha Khomishini ya zwa Khetho ya Afrika Tshipembe ha dzhenelela nga tshifhinga khathihi na shumisa maitele ndangulo ya masiandaitwa.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uza kuqhubeka esebenza ngqwabalala ngakuye nabani na obandakanyeka kwizenzo ezingekho mthethweni ezijongela phantsi imithetho yethu yokufudukela kwelinye ilizwe, ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukukhetha.

src_text: Hezwi zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha khwaṱhisedzo khulwane ya sisiṱeme dza khetho, dzine bva zwenezwo dzo no mbo ḓi khwaṱhisedzwa nga ḓivhadzwa ha Tshishumiswa zwa Ndangulo ya Vhakhethi tshine tsha kona thivhela zwa voutha luvhili.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukugwetywa kwa kutsha nje kukatitshala waseThekwini, uNksz Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ogwetywe iminyaka emithathu phantsi kweliso loluleko kunye neminyaka emine ethothoza etrongweni, yaxhonywa yonke iminyaka emithathu, kwiNkundla yeNgingqi yaseMlazi KwaZulu-Natal – ngokutyeshela uMthetho woNyulo looMasipala kuRhulumente weNgingqi, wama-2000 (uMthetho wama-27 ka-2000).

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri khetho ndi dzone thikho ya dimokirasi yashu nahone dzi tea tsireledzwa nga nungo dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: Njengomfundisi-ntsapho kwisikolo esasisetyenziswa njengesikhululo sokuvota ngexesha loNyulo lukaMasipala kweyeDwarha ngowama-2021, uNksz Gabuza ubuvumile ubuqhophololo owabenza kwiivoti ezingamashumi amabini anesine, eziquka i-12 zoNyulo looMasipala kunye ne-12 zoNyulo lweeWadi.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa vhu 12 (MC12) wa Dzangano ḽa Mbambadzo ḽa Ḽifhasi (WTO).
tgt_text: Oku kugwetywa kunye nesigwebo kubonisa ngokucacileyo ukuzinikela kweKomishoni yoNyulo yaseMzantsi Afrika ukuba ingenelela kwangethuba kwaye iyakwazi nokuthatha amanyathelo anqala emva kweziphumo zophando.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza WTO MC12 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Geneva, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 12 swika ḽa 17 Fulwi 2022, nga maanḓa tsheo ya uri mashango teaho nga fhelisa ṱhanziela dza khaelo ya Covid-19 swika nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Kwakhona oku kukwasisiqinisekiso sokuba qatha kweenkqubo zonyulo, ezithe zaqiniswa  ngokuziswa kweSixhobo soLawulo lwabavoti i-Voter Management Device esithintela ukuvota kabini.

src_text: Tsheo nga ha uri hone izwi zwi nga vha zwo tea pfukiselwa kha dzilafho na vhuṱhaṱhuvhi ha COVID-19 yo humiselwa murahu lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya rathi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba unyulo lusisiseko sentando yesininzi yethu kwaye kufuneka lukhuselwe nangaziphi na izindlela.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha ḽone ḽe ḽa ranga phanḓa khuwelelo ya uri vha WTO vha fhelise zwa pfanelo dza ndaka dza vhubveledzi dzine dza vha hone kha khaelo dza COVID-19 lune hezwi zwa ḓo ita uri hu vhe na swikela khaelo nga nḓila linganaho khathihi na ita uri mashango re na vhukoni ha bveledza khaelo dzenedzi ite ngauralo.
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-12 yabaPhathiswa (i-MC12) yoMbutho woRhwebo weHlabathi (i-WTO).

src_text: Muṱangano wo dovha hafhu wa ḓikumedzela kha zwa maitele re khagala nahone katelaho vhoṱhe itela shandukisa mishumo yawo yoṱhe khathihi na tendelana kha nyanḓano dza zwa mbambadzelano hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dzi fanaho na dza mutakalo ta phimo ya sabusidi ya zwa vhureakhovhe imiswa ha mbambadzo ya zwa makwevho inthanethe na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo ze-WTO MC12 ebibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, ingakumbi isigqibo sokuba amazwe afanelekileyo angalisebenzisa igunya lawo lokurhoxisa  ilayisenisi eziwathintela ekuziveliseleni isitofu se-COVID-19 de kube ngowama-.

src_text: Mvelaphanḓa kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mupfuluwo wa ya kha Khasho ya Didzhithala (BDM).
tgt_text: Isigqibo esimalunga nokwandisa oku kunyango lwe-COVID-19 kunye noxilongo salibaziseka kangange sithuba seenyanga ezintandathu.

src_text: Khabinethe kha ḓi tou bva wana maswamaswa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya BDM nahone yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho kha dzheniswa ha dzi- set-top box sa tshipiḓa tsha mupfuluwo wa bva kha anaḽogo ya kha khasho ya didzhithala.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubukhokela ikhwelo lokuba i-WTO iwarhoxise amalungelo obunini obubodwa abotshelelwe kwizitofu zokugonya ze-COVID-19 oku kuza kuqinisekisa ukufikelela ngokulinganayo kumayeza okugonya kunye nokuvumela amazwe anamandla okuvelisa izitofu ukuba akwenze oko.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza nḓila ine izwi zwa khunyeledzwa ha BDM zwa vha zwa tshihaḓu ngayo itela vhofholola sipekithiramu tshine tsha ṱoḓea kha zwa vhudavhizani ha ṱhingokhwalwa khathihi na kha miṅwe mishumo elanaho na zwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza mafhungo na vhudavhidzani..  Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhudavhidzani na Thekhinoḽodzhi dza Didzhithala Vho Khumbudzo Ntshavheni vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na vhoramafhungo matshelo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwana itela ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo.
tgt_text: Le nkomfa izibophelele kwinkqubo evulelekileyo nebandakanyayo yokuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo kwaye ivumelene nomqulu wezivumelwano zorhwebo ezijongana namacandelo afana nezempilo, ukumisela imida kwinkxaso-mali yokuloba, ukumiselwa korhwebo nge-intanethi kunye nokuqinisekisa ubukho bokutya     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka.
tgt_text: Inkqubela-phambili kwiNkqubo yokuFudukela kuSasazo lobuxhaka-xhaka beDijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka wa vhuvhili uri anḓadzwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene uhlaziyo ngeNkqubo ye-BDM yaze yayiqaphela nenkqubela-phambili esele yenziweyo ngokufakela iibhokisi ezixhunywayo njengenxalenye yokufudukela kusasazo lwe-analogu ukuya kwidijithali.

src_text: Muvhigo ṋetshedza maswamaswa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Puḽane ya Mashumele ya Lushaka ya Vhana kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2019 swika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yagxininisa ukungxamiseka kokuba kuqukunjelwe i-BDM yokukhulula inkqubo efunekayo kuthungelwano losasazo, kunye nezinye iinjongo ezinxulumene nobuchwephesha bonxibelelwano.

UMphathiswa wezoNxibelelwano nobuChwepheshe beDijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngomso (uLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela)..     INgxelo yoNyaka yeSimo seSizwe saMalungelo oMntwana.

src_text: Muvhigo bvisela khagala mvelaphanḓa yo rekhodiwaho kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2020 swika dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala masia ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu, ane ha katelwa tsireledzo ya vhana khathihi na tshayandingano ine ya khou endelela vhukati ha vhashai na vhapfumi kha vhenevha vhana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe iNgxelo yoNyaka yesibini engeSimo seSizwe kumaLungelo abaNtwana.

src_text: Muvhigo dovha hafhu wa sumbedzisa nga ha uri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo kwama hani vhana nga tshenetsho tshifhinga..  Maga u dzhenelela ane khou thoma shumiswa nga muvhuso livhiswa kha bveledza pfanelo dza vhana sa zwe dza sumbedziswa zwone kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibonelela ngohlaziyo ngokufezekiswa kwesiCwangciso seSizwe  saBantwana kwisithuba esiphakathi kweminyaka yama-2019-..

src_text: Maga aya dovha tikedza vhuḓifhinduleli ha shango kha Thendelano dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Ṅwana dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UNCRC) khathihi na Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo na Mutakalo wa Ṅwana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iqaqambisa impumelelo ebhalwe phantsi yexesha eliphakathi kweminyaka yama-2020-.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi dza UNCRC na ACRWC vhuvhili hadzo..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha vha na vhukwamani na mihasho ya muvhuso khathihi na vhunzhi ha vhashumisani vho teaho bva kha vhuimo ha lushaka ya kha ha mavundu.
tgt_text: Ikwaqaqambisa iinkalo ezisathe gqolo zingumceli mngeni, kubandakanywa ukhuseleko lwabantwana kunye nokuqhubekeka kokungalingani phakathi kwabahlwempu nezinhanha ngokubhekiselele ebantwaneni.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano ine ya vha: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwabonisa indlela ubhubhani we-COVID-19 ochaphazele ngayo abantwana ngeli xesha.

src_text: Muvhigo wo Ṱanganywaho wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Misi nga Misi wo livhiswaho kha UNCRC.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela aphunyezwa ngurhulumente ajolise ekufezekiseni amalungelo abantwana, njengoko kucacisiwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi kha vha UNCRC.
tgt_text: Lama nyathelo akwaxhasa izibophelelo zelizwe kwiiNgqungquthela ze-UN malunga namaLungelo oMntwana (i-UNCRC) kunye noMqulu wase-Afrika wamaLungelo kunye neNtlalontle yoMntwana (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Muvhigo uyu khou vha hone nga murahu ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuvhili we wa ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC nga ṅwaha wa..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa ya nga Tshiteṅwa tsha vhu 44 tsha UNCRC nahone katela mawanwa na themendelo dze dza itwa bva kha muvhigo wa fhedzisela.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika watyikitya  kwi-UNCRC kunye ne-ACRWC.

src_text: Vha UNCRC vho rumela mawanwa na themendelo dzavho vha tshi itela shango nga ṅwaha wa..  Nzudzanyo ya muvhigo uyu yo itwa nga murahu ha vhukwamani na mihasho yoṱhe khathihi na vhashumisani vho teaho mona na shango.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana namasebe karhulumente kunye neqela labathathi-nxaxheba abafanelekileyo kwinqanaba lesizwe nelephondo.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa musi wo no ranga ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kufakwa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Muvhigo wa lushaka nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhena Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeXeshana eDityanisiweyo yoMzantsi Afrika yesithathu ukuya kweyesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha muvhigo wa thoma wa lushaka wa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha vha khetheanyo ya Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ya UN (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukunikezelwa kweNgxelo yeXeshana lesithathu ukuya kwelesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: UN-Habitat yo ṱanganedza Adzhenda yayo Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha Muṱangano wayo wa nga ha Dzinnḓu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ha Tshifhinga Tshilapfu nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ilandela iNgxelo yexeshana yesibini eyayithiwe thaca kwi-UNCRC ngowama-..     Ingxelo iqulunqwe ngokungqinelana neSiqendu 44 se-UNCRC, kwaye ikwabandakanya imigqaliselo kunye nezindululo ezenziwe kwingxelo yokugqibela.

src_text: Mashango ane vha miraḓo vha khou lavhelelwa ṋetshedza mivhigo ya nga ha mvelaphanḓa nga one aṋe nga tou funa hao.
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yayithumele imigqaliselo kunye neengcebiso zayo kweli lizwe ngo-..     Olu qulunqo lwenziwe ngodliwano-ndlebe nawo onke amasebe afanelekileyo nabachaphazelekayo kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo tikedza zwa ṱanganedzwa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ḽa dovha hafhu nga tshenetsho tshifhinga ḽa thoma i shumisa nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya Muhanga wa Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni wo Ṱanganelaho (IUDF) wa shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kwaziswa eluntwini emva kokuba yondlelwe kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Heyi mbekanyamushumo ya IUDF ndi ine yo livhiswa kha tshimbidza mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha vhupo ha dziḓoroboni vhu katelaho vhoṱhe ha tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone vhune ha dzulea..  Uyu muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na vhukwamani kha masia muvhuso wa lushaka, wa mavundu na muvhuso wapo hu tshi katelwa na dziNGO dzo teaho.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeSizwe emalunga nokuphunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu.

src_text: Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Vhaswa yo Ṱanganelaho (IYDS).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kwengxelo yokuqala yesizwe yoMzantsi Afrika emalunga nokuPhunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu ye-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa thoma shumiswa ha IYDS.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamkele iNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkomfa yayo yeZindlu kunye noPhuhliso oluZinzileyo lweDolophu kweyeDwarha  ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Heyi ndi yone puḽane yo itaho uri hu vhe na Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka ya miṅwaha ya vhukati ha 2020 swika bvisela khagala mishumo, thandela ya mbekanyamushumo dzine dza tea itwa nga vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho bva kha madzangano vhaswa dovha hafhu ya sedza kha zwa fhungudza dovhololwa hu sa fheli ha maga u dzhenelela ha muvhuso khathihi na tsivhudza nga ha nḓila ine tshitshvha na sekhithara dza phuraivethe vha nga tikedza ngayo vhaswa kha uri vha kone swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone.
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu kwakulindeleke ukuba angenise iingxelo zenkqubela-phambili ngokuzithandela.

src_text: Nzudzanyo puḽane iyi ndi ine ya katela mihumbulo yo fhambanaho ine ya bva kha sekhithara dza tshitshavha dzo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uxhase ukwamkelwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu waza emva koko wayizalisekisa ngeNkqubo-sikhokelo yelizwe eDityanisiweyo yoPhuhliso lweDolophu (i-IUDF).

src_text: Mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ijolise ekukhokeleni uphuhliso lweendawo zokuhlala ezisezidolophini ezibandakanyayo, ezikwaziyo ukuzimela nekuhlalekayo kuzo..     Ingxelo yenkqubela-phambili yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana norhulumente wesizwe, wephondo nowengingqi, kunye neeNGO ezifanelekileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso esiHlangeneyo soPhuhliso loLutsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe zwi ṋetshedza mutheo wa ndeme wa nyaluwo na mveledziso ya ikonomi nahone ndi zwa ndeme kha matshilo vhathu..   Heyi Nḓivhadzamulayotibe bveledza themendelo dzo itwaho nga Phanele ya Vhaḓivhi vha Maimo Nṱha ye ya tholwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela sengulusa mbekanyamaitele dzashu dzine dza vha hone zwazwino, milayo na maitele nga ha mafhungo elanaho na tshaka dza zwithu zwi tshilaho nga fhambana hazwo..   Muvhigo wo themendela uri hu bveledzwe mbekanyamaitelenyangaredzi ya nga ha ndondolo ya mupo na kushumisele kwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kwa zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa ḽino shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele i-IYDS ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siphumeza uMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha weSizwe wowama-2020-.

src_text: Ndondolo ya mupo ndi ya ndeme kha fulo ḽa shango ḽa ita hu vhe na nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo nga ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: Ichaza amanyathelo, iiprojekthi kunye neenkqubo eziza kwenziwa ngabathathi-nxaxheba abohlukeneyo abavela kumaqumrhu olutsha.

src_text: Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha.
tgt_text: Ikwajongene nokuncitshiswa kokuphindwa kongenelelo lukarhulumente kwaye ikhokele indlela uluntu kunye necandelo labucala abanokuxhasa ngayo abantu abatsha ekufikeleleni kumathuba.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Ukuqulunqwa kwesi sicwangciso kubandakanye amagalelo ahlukeneyo avela kumacandelo ngamacandelo oluntu.

src_text: Puḽane idzi ndi dze dza livhiswa kha ṱoḓa lingedza shandukisa na ita uri nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha vhe yo dzudzanyeaho.
tgt_text: IPhepha leNgcaciso eYilwayo yoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lingedza shela mulenzhe kha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa nga nḓila ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iluvumile uyilo lwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo ngoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha kanzhi ndi nḓowetshumo ine yo ngo dzudzanyea nahone shuma nga nḓila ya zwipiḓapiḓa.
tgt_text: Iintlobo-ntlobo zezityalo nezilwanyana zaseMzantsi Afrika zibonelela ngesiseko esibalulekileyo sokukhula koqoqosho nophuhliso, kwaye zikwa balulekile nakubomi babantu.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ine ya khou dzinginywa ṋetshedza nḓila dza uri thome shumiswa dzine dza vha dzone dzine dza ḓo ita uri vhe yo dzudzanyeaho khathihi na khwaṱhisa sekhithara sa yone muṋetshedzi wa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa khathihi na vha sekhithara ya nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya nga thusa kha sika zwikhala zwa mishumo  Milayotibe.
tgt_text: Eli Phepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo lenza ukuba zisebenze izindululo ezenziwe liGqiza leeNgcali elikwiNqanaba eliPhezulu elalonyulwe ngowama-2019 ukuba lihlole imigaqo-nkqubo yethu yeli xesha, imithetho kunye nezenzo kwimiba enxulumene neentlobo zezilwanyana ezidumileyo.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza ya Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo icebise ngokuqulunqwa komgaqo-nkqubo obanzi wolondolozo nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwezityalo nezilwanyana zelizwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza wa Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamennde itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kuphunyezwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Khwiṋiso idzi dzo livhiswa kha shandukisa Mulayo wa zwa Sialala na Vhurangaphanḓa ha MaKhoi-San, wa ṅwaha wa 2019 (Mulayo wa vhu3 wa 2019), we wa thoma shuma bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.
tgt_text: Ulondolozo lubalulekile kwiphulo lelizwe lokukhawulezisa ukukhula koqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-qhinga esimalunga nenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamenndeni itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa  kwesiCwangciso-qhinga esisayilwayo seNyama yenyamakazi ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Musi wo no ṱanganedzwa, Mulayotibe ḓo shandukisa Mulayo wa Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi ya Ndayotewa Kha Vhuthororisi na Zwi elanao nadzo, 2002 (Mulayo wa vhu 22 wa 2004).
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sijonge ukuvumela ngokusesikweni kunye nokuguqula ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu wo fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na tshitshavha angalalaho nga murahu ha musi wo ṱanganedzwa nga khabinethe nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.
tgt_text: Sikwafuna ukufaka isandla ekuqinisekeni kokuba khona kokutya ngendlela ezinzileyo.

src_text: Tshanduko idzi ndi dzine dza khou ḓo lingedza ita uri hu vhe na elana vhukati ha zwishumiswa zwa fhano hayani zwa lwa na zwiito zwa vhutherorisi na maga ḽifhasi a vhetshelwa lwa na zwiito zwenezwo.
tgt_text: Ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi ubukhulu becala lishishini elingekho sikweni elisebenza ngendlela engafaniyo.

src_text: Tshanduko idzi dzo dovha hafhu dza sedza kha zwiteṅwa zwe zwa wanala zwi sa elani na ndayotewa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sicetywayo sibonelela ngesicwangciso somiliselo esiza kumisela ngokusesikweni kwaye someleze eli candelo njengababoneleli bokutya kunye necandelo lohlumo loqoqosho elinokunceda ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi     Umthetho osayilwayo.

src_text: Sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho thendelano dza Khoro ya Tsireledzo ya UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kombetshedzea shumisa milayo ya mashangoḓavha ine ya lingedza khwaṱhisa maga u fhelisa vhutherorisi ha ḽifhasi nga angaredza   Vhuṱambo vhu ḓaho.
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo oLungisiweyo weMicimbi yezeMveli wowama-.

src_text: Muṱangano wa vhu14 wa mashango Brazili, Russia, India, China na Afrika Tshipembe (BRICS).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMicimbi yezeMveli  wowama-2022 ePalamente ukuze uqhubeke nokuqhutywa.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ranga phanḓa shela mulenzhe ha Afrika Tshipembe kha Muṱangano wa Vharaphanḓa vha mashango BRICS wa vhu14 une wa ḓo farwa nga vidio ye ya tshimbidzwa nga vha muvhuso wa vhathu wa Riphabuḽiki ya China bva nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 23 swika nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukuhlaziya uMthetho wobuNkokheli beMveli nobu-Khoi-San, wowama-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wama-2019), oqale ukusebenza ngomhla woku-1 kuTshazimpuzi ngowama-.

Umthetho osaYilwayo Wokukhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumene nabo wama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuKhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo wama-2022 ukuba iqhutywelwe phambili.

src_text: Zwa vha hashu muraḓo wa BRICS zwi khou bvela phanḓa na vhuedza shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: Wakuba wamkelwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kuhlomela uMthetho okhoyo ngoku woKhuseleko lweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ekuchasene nabanqolobi neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo, wama-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wama-2004).

src_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho 17% ya thundu dzi vhambadzelwaho nnḓa dza Afrika Tshipembe dzo livhiswa kha mashango BRICS, ngeno 29% ya zwiṱunḓwa zwashu nga angaredza zwo vha zwi tshi bva kha mashango aya.
tgt_text: Emveni  kokuba uvunyiwe lo mthetho usayilwayo yiKhabhinethi kuCanzibe wama-2021, uye waba kwinkqubo yokubonisana noluntu ngokubanzi.

src_text: Ndeme ya mbambadzo iyi khou bvela phanḓa na engedzea lwe thanganyelo ya mbambadzo yoṱhe ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango BRICS ya swika henefha kha R702 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021, zwine zwa vha engedzea bva kha R487 biḽioni ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukulungelelanisa iindlela zokusebenza zeli lizwe zokulwa nobunqolobi kunye nemilinganiselo yehlabathi esele ibekiwe.
Kwakhona kuphinde kwajongwana  namagatya ayethe athathwa njenga magatya angekho kumgaqo-siseko yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Tshumisano vhukati ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya BRICS kha masia fhambanaho fana na mutakalo na khathihi na mbambadzo yo engedzeaho yo ita uri hu vhe na nyaluwo kha nḓowetshumo yashu yapo ya dovha ya ita uri hu vhe na vhuelwa kha miraḓo yoṱhe ya BRICS.
tgt_text: Nanjenge lizwe elityikitye kwiBhunga loKhuseleko le-UN, uMzantsi Afrika ubophelelekile ukuba ube nemithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ezama ukomeleza amanyathelo okulwa nobunqolobi behlabathi     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Vhubindudzi hashu kha thandela dza mveledziso ya themamveledziso khathihi na nungo dzashu dza fhungudza vhukonḓi ha musi hu tshi itwa zwa mabindu ndi zwithu zwo livhiswaho kha lingedza engedza mbambadzelannḓa ya kha vhashumisani na riṋe vha BRICS.
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-14 yase-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China noMzantsi Afrika (i-BRICS).

src_text: Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi tsha Vhuriha.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kukhokela uMzantsi Afrika ekuthatheni inxaxheba kwiNkomfa ye-14 yeeNkokheli ze-BRICS ebanjwe yiRiphablikhi yase-China ukusuka ngoLwesine, umhla wama-23 ukuya kuLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela ngowama-..     Ubulungu bethu be-BRICS busaqhubeka bunceda ilizwe.

src_text: Tshikolo tsha zwa Mavhusele tsha Lushaka (NSG) tshi ḓo vha na vhuṱambo ha vhuraru ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi hu tshi itela Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa Polotiki ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 27 Fulwi swika nga ḽa 1 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka uphelileyo ngaphezulu kwe-17% yempahla ethunyelwa ngaphandle yaseMzantsi Afrika ithunyelwe kwamanye amazwe e-BRICS, kwaye ngaphezulu kwama-29% empahla engene kweli lizwe isuka kula mazwe.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uho vhu ḓo dzhenelwa nga Dziminisṱa bva kha mashango ngaho Côte d'Ivoire, South Sudan na Afrika Tshipembe; hu tshi katelwa na vhalangivhahulu vha bvaho ngei Lesotho, Zambia, Riphabuḽiki ya Congo (DRC), Tanzania na Ghana.
tgt_text: Ixabiso lolu rhwebo liyaqhubeleka nokukhula, urhwebo loMzantsi Afrika lulonke namanye amazwe e-BRICS lufikelele kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-R702 ngowama-2021, lusuka kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama- R487 zonyaka wama-.

src_text: Vhoṋeḓorobo vha Afrika Tshipembe, khathihi na miraḓo ya komiti dza vhoṋeḓorobo na khorotshitumbe dza hone, na vhone vha ḓo dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu..  Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa politiki bva kha mashango fhambanaho na vhone vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ḓo kovhana mihumbulo na ngudo dzi bvaho kha nyimele dzo fhambanaho dze vha ṱangana nadzo kha mishumo yavho ya ḓuvha na ḓuvha.
tgt_text: Ukusebenzisana phakathi kwamalungu e-BRICS kwiinkalo ezahlukeneyo ezifana nezempilo kunye norhwebo olwandisiweyo kukhulise ishishini lethu lasekhaya, kwaye kwanceda onke amalungu e-BRICS.

src_text: NSG yo dzudzanya mbekanyamushumo ya ṅwaha hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe nga ṅwaha wa 2020, sa tshipiḓa tsha thikhedzo yayo kha zwa vhuḓikumedzeli ha muvhuso ha fhaṱa shango ḽine ḽa khou shumaho zwavhuḓi dovha hafhu ya lingedza shomedza miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe kha masia mararu muvhuso nga vhurangaphanḓa ho khwaṱhaho na vhukoni ha zwa vhulavhelesi itela uri vha kone ṱola hafhu khaedu dza zwa mavhusele dzine dza khakhisa maitele zwa katelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali lwethu kwiiprojekthi zophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo kunye neenzame zokunciphisa imiqathango esetyenziswayo xa sisenza ushishino lujolise ekwandiseni ukuthunyelwa kwempahla kumazwe angaphandle angamahlakani ethu e-BRICS.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: ISikolo esiqhutywa ngexesha laseBusika soLawulo loQoqosho.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela ḽa houno ṅwaha ḽine ḽa ḓo vha nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 18 Fulwana 2022 ḽi ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe ine ya ri: “Kha vha ite zwine vha nga kona nga zwine vha vha nazwo, henefho hune vha vha hone” tou vha khuwelelo re khagala ya uri vhathu vha tikedze khathihi na shela mulenzhe kha fulo iḽi nga ṋetshedza maga u dzhenelela tshifhinga tshilapfu ane ḓo fhedza nga vha na zwivhuya zwi sa gumi.
tgt_text: ISikolo sikaRhulumente seSizwe (i-NSG) siza kubamba iNkqubo yaso yesithathu yaseBusika yoLawulo lwezoQoqosho yaBaphathi bezoPolitiko eRhawutini ukusuka ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela ukuya kowoku-1 kweyeKhala kulo nyaka wama-.

src_text: Maṅwe maga u dzhenelela ane nga vha tshifhinga tshilapfu ndi Mbekanyamushumo ya Nyambedzano dza Vhaswa ya Vho Nelson Mandela na Vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na Mikhwa ine yo sedzesa kha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme zwi kwamaho vhaswa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na mona na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Iza kube izinyaswe ngabaPhathiswa abavela e-Côte d'Ivoire; i-South Sudan noMzantsi Afrika; kunye nabaLawuli-Jikelele abavela e-Lesotho, e-Zambia, e-Democratic Republic of Congo, e-Tanzania nase-Ghana.

src_text: Khalaṅwaha ya Muthelo.
tgt_text: Oosodolophu boMzantsi Afrika, kwakunye namalungu eekomiti zosodolophu namabhunga alawulayo, nabo baza kuba yinxalenye yesi sikolo..     Abaphathi bezopolitiko abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo kulindeleke ukuba babelane ngezimvo kunye nezifundo kwiimeko ezahlukeneyo abazifumanayo kwimisebenzi yabo yemihla ngemihla.

src_text: Khalaṅwaha ya rumela muthelo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ḓo vula bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwana swika 24 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: I-NSG iyile inkqubo yonyaka yamalungu esigqeba ngo-2020, njengenxalenye yenkxaso yayo ekuzinikeleni  kukarhulumente ekwakheni urhulumente okwaziyo ukusebenza.

src_text: Vhatheli vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa rumela maṅwalo avho zwa mithelo kha eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kana kha MobiApp ya vha Tshumelo dza Mbuelo dza Afrika Tshipembe (SARS..   Uno ṅwaha SARS ḓo bvela phanḓa na tsenguluso dza zwa muthelo dzine dza tou dzula dzo itwa nga khomphiyutha dza mutheli muṅwe na muṅwe, hedzi ndi fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo dzine dza dzula dzo ḓadziwa itela leludza maitele u rumela fomo dza muthelo.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, ijonge ukuxhobisa abalawuli abakumanqanaba amathathu karhulumente ngobunkokeli nobuchule bokubeka iliso ukuze bakwazi ukuphonononga  imingeni yolawulo ethintela ubandakanyo kunye nohlumo kwezoqoqosho oluzinzileyo.

src_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021 vhatheli vha fhiraho miḽioni tharu vho swika he vha senguluswa nga nḓila yeneyi ine fomo dzavho dza dzula dzo ḓadzwa nga khomphiyutha.
tgt_text: USuku luka-Nelson Mandela lweHlabathi.

src_text: Zwa rumela fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo nga tshifhinga nahone dzo dzudzanyea nga nḓila yo teaho zwi tou ita fhedzi uri mutheli wanale tshi khou tevhedza milayo yo teaho ya zwa muthelo, zwi dovha hafhu zwa thusa muvhuso kha ṋetshedza tshumelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha dzi ṱoḓesa  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe khou rumela milaedza ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Muhaṱuli Vho Owen Lloyd Rogers nga murahu ha tholwa havho sa Muhaṱuli wa Khothe ya Ndayotewa ya Afrika Tshipembe.Khabinethe khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khou rumela mulaedza wa tamela Phresidennde wa kale Vho Thabo Mbeki Ḓuvha Ḽavhuḓi ḽa Mabebo musi vha tshi khou fara miṅwaha ya 80, ḽe vha ḽi pembelela nga ḽa 18 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Kulo unyaka uSuku luka-Nelson Mandela lweHlabathi  oluzakube lungoMvulo, umhla we-18 kweyeKhala ngowama-2022 luza kubhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo wehlabathi jikelele othi: “Yenza onako, ukwenza ngoko onako, naphi na apho ukhoyo”.

src_text: Vho Mbeki vho vha na bono ḽa vhumatshelo havhuḓi nahone ha mvelaphanḓa kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.
tgt_text: Likhwelo elicacileyo lokuba abantu baxhase kwaye bathathe inxaxheba kwiphulo ngokufaka igalelo kungenelelo oluzinzileyo olunefuthe elizakuhlala lihleli.

src_text: Vhalangi vhane vha si vhe miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe vha Bodo ya Maanḓalanga Ndangulo ya zwa Vhufhufhi ha Muyani ya AfrikaTshipembe:Vho Ernest Khosa;Mufumakadzi Vho Bulelwa Koyana;Vho Surendra Sooklal; naMufumakadzi Vho Rejoice Edith Phewa..  Miraḓo ya Ofisi ya bula Zwikolodo zwa DzinnḓuMufumakadzi Vho Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Catharina Maria Van der Sandt;Vho Errol Vincent Magerman;Muimeleli Vho Mandla Dludlu;Vho Matsobane Gabriel Mello;Mufumakadzi Vho Palesa Mawasha;Mufumakadzi Vho Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton;Mufumakadzi Vho Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga;Vho Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; andVho Zuko Ncemane.
tgt_text: Olunye ungenelelo oluzinzileyo yiNkqubo yaminyaka le yeNgxoxo yoLutsha kunye neNkqubo yobuNkokheli bokuziphatha egxile kwimiba engumxholo ephathelene nolutsha eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezintsha malunga neSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha nanga haelwa khathihi na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi khou ita uri shango ḽi kone fhelisa zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwiswa zwa kavhiwa nga tshifhinga tsha luṱa lwa vhuṱanu lwa dwadze iḽi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyababulela bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika abathe bakhetha ukuzigonya nokuthobela imiqathango ye-COVID-19 into leyo ebangele ukuba eli lizwe likwazi ukunqanda ukunyuka kwamanani abantu abasolulelwa okokuqala yi-COVID-19 ngethuba lomsinga wesihlanu walo bhubhane.
Noko kunjalo, kufuneka singayekeleli umxakatho njengoko i-COVID-19 isagquba.

src_text: Naho zwo ralo ri tei ḓikanganyisa sa izwi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshi kha ḓi tou vha hone tshoṱhe henefha vhukati hashu.
tgt_text: Nangona eli lizwe likuphelisile ukunxitywa ngokunyanzelekileyo kwesifonyo esidlangalaleni, abantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo kunye nabo bagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeleke nokunxiba izifonyo.

src_text: Naho hu na uri shango ḽi kha ḓi tou bva fhelisa zwa ambara maski nga khombekhombe musi muthu fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi, vhathu vhane vha vha na maṅwe malawadze nga thungo hu tshi katelwa na avho vhane vha khou lwala, vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha bvele phanḓa na ambara maski yavho.
tgt_text: Futhi kufuneka siqhubeleke nokuhlamba izandla okanye nokuzifefa ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, futhi singasondelelani zize neendawo esikuzo zibethe umoya..     Ugonyo lixhadi esinalo elikuphela kwalo eliqinisekisiweyo zinzululwazi lokulwa i-COVID-19 kwaye iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza bonke abantu abangagonywanga ukuba baye kugonya ngokukhawuleza baze bona abo sele begonyiwe baye kufumana ichiza elisimahla lokomeleza amajoni omzimba kumaziko akufutshane okugonya.

src_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na ṱamba kana sanithaiza zwanḓa zwashu sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati hashu na vhaṅwe vhathu khathihi na vhona uri fhethu hune ra vha hone hu khou dzhena muya nga nḓila yo teaho.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.
IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo malunga nezintsha ngokunwenwa kwesifo se-Monkeypox kweli lizwe emva kokufunyanwa komntu wesibini onesi sifo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha wone philelo yo khwaṱhisedzwaho nga vhorasaintsi ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nahone Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ye vha haelwe hu si na tshilengo khathihi na uri vhathu vho haelwaho vha tea wana dziṅwe khaelo dzavho dza khwaṱhisedza henefho kha vhupo ha muhaelo vhu re tsinisa navho nga mahala.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bafunywenwe banesi sifo kungokunje bazivalele bodwa kumawabo kwaye kusalandelelwa kubo bonke abantu abadibene nabo ukukhangela ukuba ingaba bakhona na abanye abantu abosulelwe sesi sifo.

ISebe lezeMpilo kunye neZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) basebenzisana noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi (i-WHO) ukujonga amathuba okunwenwa kwesi sifo kweli njengoko isitsho iMigaqo yezeMpilo yeHlabathi.

src_text: Maruḓa ṱhoho.
tgt_text: Intsholongwane ye-monkeypox ayosuleli lula, yosulela xa abantu bethe basondelelana kakhulu besenza izinto ezifana nokuphuzana, ukucofa-cofana okanye ukubamba-bambana amalungu omzimba anamaqhakuva esi sifo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedzwa zwidodombedzwa zwiswa nga ha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha phanḓalala ha vhulwadze ha Maruḓa ṱhoho fhano shangoni nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha zwenezwino ha tshiwo tsha vhuvhili tsha vhulwadze uvhu fhano shangoni.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazimpawu ze-monkeypox abayisasazi le ntsholongwane..     IKhabhinethi icebisa abantu ababonakalisa iimpawu zomkhuhlane ezithi zilandelwe ngamaqhakuva angathi ngamadyunguza ukuba baye kwiziko lezempilo elikufutshane ukuze baxilongwe baze banyangwe.

src_text: Vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga vhulwadze uvhu vha khou khethelwa thungo na vhaṅwe vhathu henefho mahayani avho nahone hu khou dovha hafhu ha ṱoḓuluswa na avho vhe vha vha na vhukwamani navho itela wanulusa vhaṅwe vhane na vhone vha nga vha vho swika he vha pfukelwa nga vhulwadze uvhu..     Vha Muhasho wa Mutakalo na vha Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka vha khou vha na tshumisano na vha Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi itela ita ṱhoḓisiso nga ha khombo ya pfukiselwa ha vhulwadze uvhu fhano hayani hu tshi tevhedzwa Milayo ya zwa Mutakalo ya Dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha enyenzeke kwibhari yaseMonti.

src_text: Vairasi ya maruḓa ṱhoho i tou phaḓalala nga tou ralo nahone kanzhi pfukela nga murahu ha musi ho vha na vhukwamani ha tsinisa vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili fana na mamana kuvhatedzana kana farafara zwipiḓa zwa muvhili zwine zwa vha na dzintho dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha embi eyenzeke e-Enyobeni eMonti kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni ngeCawe, umhla wama-26 kweyeSilimela 2022 apho kusweleke abantu abatsha abangama-21, ilishiye eli lizwe lidandathekile.

src_text: Vhathu vhane vha si vhe na tsumbadwadze dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho vha nga si swike hune vha nga phaḓaladza vairasi yeneyo kha vhaṅwe vhathu..     Khabinethe yo eletshedza vhathu vhane vha vha na tsumbadwadze dzi fanaho na mutetemelo, tsumbo dzi fanaho na mukhushwane nga angaredza dzine dza tevhelwa nga munyavhili une wa fana na mapone uri vha ḓivhonadze kha tshiimiswa tsha ndondolamutakalo tshi re tsinisa na ha havho itela uri vha kone ṱolwa khathihi na ilafhwa.
tgt_text: Ayinakulinganiswa intlungu azibona ekuyo la makhaya ashiywe ngabantwana bawo kabuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi ithi akuhlanga lungehliyo kwiintsapho eziphantsi kwelifu elimnyama kwaye ibulela wonke umntu othe wanikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalontle kwezi ntsapho zisentlungwini.
Iyaxhalabisa into yokuba iimveku ezineminyaka eli-13 zivunyelwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yentselo zize zivunyelwe nokuba zisele utywala.

src_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela thaveni ya fhaḽa East London.
tgt_text: Sicela uluntu ukuba nalo luncedise ludlale indima yalo ngokuthi luqinisekise ukuba abantwana bakhuselekile ngalo lonke ixesha..     Abantwana abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwe-18 abavumelekanga ukuba bangene kwiithaveni, izimokolo, iipotsoyi zotywala nasezibharini.

src_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu shushaho vhukuma tshe tsha bvelela Thaveni ya Enyobeni ine ya vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya East London vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 26 Fulwi 2022 he khatsho ha lovha vhaswa vha swikaho 21, tsho shusha shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Oosomashishini botywala abafunyaniswe besophula nawuphi na kule mithetho baza kubekwa ityala zize iilayisenisi zabo zotywala zithathwe.

src_text: Zwi konḓa vhukuma lingedza humbula nga ha vhuṱungu vhune vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhana nga nḓila yeneyi ya makhaulambilu ngaurali vha khou vhu pfa..     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhayo ya dovha hafhu ya livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe kha thikhedzo yavho ya zwa vhuthu ye vha ṋetshedza kha miṱa iyi ine ya khou lila nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tshi konḓaho ngaurali zwi pfasesei zwavhuḓi uri ndi ngani fhethu afho ho vha ho tendelwa na vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 13 uri vha dzhene vha nwe mahalwa.
tgt_text: Iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yeeNkokeli zamaZwe aTyebileyo asi-7 (i-G7).

src_text: Ri khou ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha zwoṱhe ya uri zwi shele mulenzhe kha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea misi yoṱhe.
tgt_text: UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthabathe inxaxheba kwiNgqungquthela yeeNkokheli ze-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, e-Germany, ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela.
