UMongameli – othathe inxaxheba kwiintlanganiso ebezigwadla imiba enxulumene nemozulu, ezamandla, ezempilo, amaphulo okuqinisekiswa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwihlabathi kunye nolingwano ngokwesini – ebemenywe yiNgqonyela u-Olaf Scholz, ebinguye ebesingathe le Ngqungquthela.

src_text: Vhana vha miṅwaha re fhasi ha 18 vho ngo tendelwa dzhena ngomu dzithaveni, zwipotoni, phabuni na mavhengeleni u rengisa mahalwa.
tgt_text: I-G7 liqumrhu lezopolitiko loorhulumene abahlukeneyo eliquka i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Vharengisi vha mahalwa vhane vha ḓo wanala vha tshi khou pfuka muṅwe wa iyo milayo vha tea farelwa mulandu wa vhugevhenga nahone ha dovha ha dzhiwa na ṱhanziela dzavho dza rengisa.
tgt_text: ImiGaqo eYilwayo yeCandelo lezoMthetho (i-LSC eYilwayo).
IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe i-LSC eYilwayo ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Mvelelo dza Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7).
tgt_text: Iinjongo zale migaqo kukukhokela amaphulo okwenza iinguqu kwicandelo lezomthetho ukuze zonke iintlanga zeli lizwe zikwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo ngokulinganayo.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho shela mulenzhe kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7) we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Bavaria, kha ḽa Germany nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 27 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Le migaqo iza kuqinisekisa nokuba kuswekwa iqumrhu eliza kuvelisa iingcali zezomthetho eziqeqeshwe zacokiswa futhi nezinezakhono ezigqibeleleyo.

src_text: Phresidennde – vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha madzulo u shuma he khaho ha vha hu tshi khou ambiwa nga mafhungo kwamaho kilima, fulufulu, mutakalo, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe nga angaredza khathihi na mafhungo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, vho vha vho rambiwa nga murangaphanḓa wa shango ḽe vhuṱambo uvhu ha vha ho farelwa khaḽo, Mutshantseḽara Vho Olaf Scholz..     Muṱangano uyu wa G7 ndi foramu ya zwa polotiki ya vhukati ha mashango ngaho Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom na ḽa United States     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqulunqa le-LSC iYilwayo ibikhokelwa liBhunga leCandelo lezoMthetho, eliliqumrhu elisemthethweni elisekwe ngokweCandelo 4 loMthetho weCandelo lezoMthetho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 28 wowama-2014) likhokelwa nguMthetho woPhuhliso oluBanzi lwabaMnyama ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE), wowama-2013 (uMthetho uNombl 46 wowama-2013).

src_text: Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC).
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wowama-2013 ugunyazisa uMphathiswa wezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuba akhuphe imigaqo yokuziphatha ngokufanelekileyo ngokumayelana nokuphuhliswa kwabamnyama ngezoqoqosho kumacandelo athile.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha.
tgt_text: Amalungu ecandelo lezomthetho kungokunje awanayo imigaqo yokuziphatha yecandelo ezakuwakhokhela kumalinge okulungisa nokungalingani nokungaxhamli ngokulinganayo kwicandelo lezomthetho.

src_text: Zwipikwa zwa idzi khoudu ndi ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya sekhithara ya zwa mulayo itela swikela zwa imelelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe ya nga mirafho ya vhathu vha ḽino shango.
tgt_text: I-LSC eYilwayo iza kupapashwa kwiGazethi kaRhulumente iintsuku ezingama-60 ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luhlomle..     Iingxelo zonyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi.

src_text: Khoudu iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mveledziso ya tshiimiswa tshine tsha ḓo bveledza vhaṋetshedzi vha tshumelo dza zwa mulayo vho pfumbudzwaho nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone vha re na vhukoni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izivumile iingxelo zikanyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi zesithuba esisuka kwinyanga yeDwarha yowama-2021 ukuya kweyoKwindla wowama-.
Ezi ngxelo ziyinxalenye yesiCwangciso-sikhokelo esiQiqisiweyo saPhakathi koNyaka (i-MTSF) sowama-2019-.

src_text: Zwa bveledzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) zwo vha zwo rangwa phanḓa nga vha Khoro ya Maitele zwa Mulayo, ine ya vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa mulayo tshe tsha vhumbwa hu tshi tevhedzwa Khethekanyo 4 ya Mulayo wa Maitele zwa Mulayo, wa 2014 (Mulayo 28 wa 2014) ya dovha ya ṱuṱuwedzwa nga Mulayo wa Maanḓafhadzwa ha Vharema ho Angalalaho kha zwa Ikonimi (B-BBEE), wa 2013 (Mulayo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: I-MTSF yowama-2024 sisicwangciso sokuphumeza kunye nesikhokelo sokuhlola ukuze kufezekiswe izinto ezikhokeliswe phambili zalo mbuso uthathe iintambo zolawulo ngowama-2018 zesiCwanciso soPhuhliso seSizwe (i-NDP): uMbono wama-..     Ezi ngxelo zigxininisa kwimiba ephambili esixhenxe karhulumente, eyile (1) iiNguqu kwezoQoqosho nokudalwa kwemisebenzi; (2) ezeMfundo, izakhono nezempilo; (3) Ukuhlawulwa kwezibonelelo-mali zentlalo ngokuthi kusetyenziswa iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezisemgangathweni nezithembekileyo; (4) Ukuhlaliswa kwabantu abahlukeneyo endaweni enye, ukuhlaliswa koluntu kunye norhulumente wengingqi; (5) Ukuhlalisana ngoxolo kweentlanga ezahlukeneyo nokhuseleko loluntu; (6) umbuso onezakhono, othembekileyo nokhokelisa phambili uphuhliso; kunye (7) ne-Afrika kunye nehlabathi elingcono, kunye namanye amanyathelo okungenelela alo mbuso wathatha imikhala yolawulo ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi iyayibulela inkqubela eyenziwe kwezo ndawo zithile ngokweenjongo ebezibekiwe zeli xesha kubhekiswa kulo.

src_text: Mulayo wa B-BBEE wa 2013 na mbetshelwa ya uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano vha kone ṋetshedza khoudu dza maitele avhuḓi dza nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema kha zwa ikonomi kha sekhithara dzo teaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangendawo ezifuna ukuba kungenelelwe ukuze kulungiswe ezi zinto zibangele ulibaziseko ebeziphazanyiswe ngubhubhane we-COVID-..     AbaPhathiswa baza kubamba iindibano noonondaba ukuba banikwe iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngeengxelo zabo bacacise nezo ndawo zifuna ukuba kungenelelwe     Umsitho ozayo.

src_text: Miraḓo ya buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo swika zwino vha athu vha na khoudu ya sekhithara ine ya vha yone ine ya vha eletshedza kha zwa tandulula thaidzo dza sa eḓana na tshayandingano kha buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo.
tgt_text: INkomfa yooSomashishini Abamnyama abaRhweba namaZwe angaPhandle (i-BIEC).
I-BIEC yokuqala iza kubanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eRhawutini ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-20 kweyeKhala.

src_text: Heyi Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) ḓo anḓadzwa kha Gurannḓa ya Muvhuso lwa maḓuvha 60 itela uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi..     Muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya mashumele ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ya tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021 swika Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Le nkomfa iza emva kokusekwa ngokusesikweni ngurhulumente ekuqaleni kulo nyaka kweQumrhu looSomashishini Abamnyama abaRhweba Namazwe Angaphandle, elixhasa oosomashishini abamnyama ukuze bakwazi ukukhangela amazwe amatsha abanokurhweba nawo, bakwazi nokufumana inkxaso-mali kunye neendlela zokuzithengisa     Umyalezo.

src_text: Mivhigo iyi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha Muhanga wa Puḽane dza Tshifhinga tsha Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTSF) wa bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuvuyisanaIKhabhinethi ithumele amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle:kwi-Springboks, ngokuphumelela abethe i-Wales ngomzuzu wokugqibela kumdlalo ubutakisa iintlantsi wokuqala wemidlalo yovavanyo emithathu e-Loftus Verveld ePitoli ngoMgqibelo, umhla wesi-2 kweyeKhala.

src_text: MTSF dza tshifhinga tsha bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa 2024 ndi dzone puḽane dza shuma khathihi na muhanga wa vhulavhelesi hu tshi itelwa swikela Puḽane ya mveledziso ya Lushaka: Zwipikwa zwa Bono ḽa 2030 zwa ndangulo ya muvhuso wa vhurathi.
tgt_text: kwi-Banyana Banyana, ngokuphumelela bebetha i-Nigeria ngamabini kwelinye ngoMvulo, umhla wesi-4 kweyeKhala 2022, kumdlalo wawo wokuqala we-Women’s Africa Cup of Nations ebanjelwe e-Morocco     IzikhundlaZonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala ezemfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuselo.

src_text: Mivhigo yo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha zwipikwa zwa sumbe zwa muvhuso, zwine zwa vha (1) Tshanduko ya Ikonomi na sikwa ha mishumo; (2) Pfunzo, zwikili na mutakalo; (3) khwaṱhisa muholo wa zwa matshilisano nga shumisa tshumelo dza fhasisa dzine dza vha dza maimo nṱha nahone dzi fulufhedzeaho; (4) ṱanganywa ha fhethu, vhudzulo ha vhathu na muvhuso wapo; (5) Vhuthihi ha vhadzulapo na zwitshavha zwo tsireledzeaho; (6) shango ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni, maitele mikhwa yavhuḓi na mvelaphanḓa; khathihi na (7) Afrika ḽa khwinesa hu tshi katelwa na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe khathihi na dzhenelela ho teaho ha ndangulo ya muvhuso ya vhurathi..     Khabinethe yo dovha ya ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwipikwa zwo tiwaho zwa tshifhinga tshine tsha vha nga fhasi ha tsenguluso.
tgt_text: UGq Nyameko Barney Pityana njengoSihlalo we-National Lotteries Commission..     U-Adv Rory Voller njengoMkhomishinari we-Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.

src_text: Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga a ḓivhadzwa nga muvhuso u tandulula thaidzo dza fulufulu dzine shango ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.

src_text: Maga aya angalalaho ngaurali ndi one ane ḓo vula nḓila dza fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi shandukisa sekithara ya muḓagasi khathihi na swikela zwa nḓisedzo ya fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.
In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..

src_text: Sa ndingedzo dzashu dza tikedza netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi khathihi na thusa shango ḽashu kha vhuleme vhune ḽa khou ṱangana naho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, ri tea fhungudza tshivhalo tsha muḓagasi une shango ḽashu ḽa shumisa nga megawati dza 600 kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miraru ḓaho..   Miṱa nga shela mulenzhe kha vhulunga fulufulu nga dzima zwishumiswa zwoṱhe zwo fungwaho zwine zwa si vhe zwa ndeme khathihi na izwo zwi shumisesaho fulufulu nga zwifhinga zwa musi hu na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya muḓagasi.
tgt_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.
Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Fulo ḽa Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho nga fhasi ha Fulo ḽa Vulindlela ḽo livhiswaho kha fhelisa vhukonḓi vhune ha vha hone kha sekhithara dza zwa fulufulu, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo, maḓi na zwa vhuendelamashango hu tshi itelwa vusulusa ikonomi.
tgt_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.

src_text: Ho no swikelwa tshandukiso dza zwa milayo dza ṱahe kha dza 26, hune dziṅwe tshandukiso dza milayo dzi swikaho 11 dza khou vhonala hu tshi khou vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi khadzo.
tgt_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Magundo no swikelwaho ndi ane katela zwa engedzwa ha vhuhulwane ha ḽaisentsi dza bveledza muḓagasi une wa ḓo dzheniswa kha netiweke khulwane ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, zwa shandukiswa ha khamphani ya muvhuso ya Maanḓalanga Vhuimangalavha ha Lushaka ya Transnet ya kha vha khamphani ya zwa makwevho yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe phaḓaladzwa ha mutevhe wo shandukiswaho wa zwikili zwa ndeme khathihi na thoma shumiswa ha sisteme ya e-Visa kha mashango 14, hu tshi katelwa na mimaraga miswa mihulwane ya zwa vhuendelamashango sa shango ḽa China, India, Kenya na Nigeria..   Khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedza vhaiswa nga zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu zwa tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi vha malo zwine zwa kha ḓi tou bva itea ngei Krugersdorp kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.

src_text: Hezwi zwiito zwivhi ngaurali khathihi na tambudzwa ha vhafumakadzi ndi zwine zwa khakhisa vhudziki na vhuthihi vhune ha vha hone zwitshavhani zwashu.
tgt_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fhululedza vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha fara nga ṱavhanya vhunzhi ha vhahumbulelwa kha vhugevhenga uvhu ha tshiṱuhu ngaurali..   Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha ya uri zwi shumisane na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo nga kovhana navho mafhungo maṅwe na maṅwe kana vhiga zwiito zwi soliseaho.
tgt_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.

src_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu zwi vhe fhethu ho tsireledzeaho kha vhana na vhafumakadzi..   Mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa Afrika Tshipembe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha lwa na vhaiti vha zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi nga fhasi ha mulayo.
tgt_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.

src_text: Kha vha vhige zwiwo zwoṱhe zwine zwa elana na GBVF kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tshi re tsini navho kana vha tou founela kha nomboro ya mahala ya Fhelisa Zwiito zwa Vhugevhenga ya: 0860 01 0111, Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiito zwa GBVF ya Lushaka kha: 0800 428 428 kana kha Nomboro ya Luṱingo ya Thuso ya Fhelisa Khakhathi dza zwa Mbeu ya: 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: Women’s Month.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi une wa pembelelwa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule ndi une khawo ha fhululedzwa vhafumakadzi vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha nndwa ya mbofholowo khathihi na vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vhoṱhe zwitshavhani zwashu.
tgt_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..
This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi wa ṋaṅwaha ndi une wa khou fhululedzwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Pfanelo dza Vhafumakadzi kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi khathihi na Maanḓafhadzwa Fhaṱa hafhu nga nḓila ya Khwine hu tshi itelwa Konḓelela ho Khwinifhadzeaho ha Vhafumakadzi”..   Vhafumakadzi vha fhiraho 20 000 vhe vha gwalaba vho livha ngei Union Buildings, ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule 1956 vho shela mulenzhe kha ita uri zwa ndinganyiselo nga mbeu na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi zwi dzulele vha tshone tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso wa demokirasi wa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.
Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.

src_text: Maga aya vhuhali vhafumakadzi avha vha dzhia ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi nga angaredza uri na vhone vha ḓiwane vha tshi khou dzhia maimo nṱha Phaḽamenndeni, kha muvhuso na ngomu kha zwitshavha zwa havho nahone rikhou bvela phanḓa na khwaṱhisa mvelaphanḓa iyi tou bva tshe ra wana mbofholowo nga ṅwaha wa.
Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha Marikana.
tgt_text: Marikana commemoration.

src_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Ṱhangule 2022, muvhuso khathihi na shango ḽoṱhe nga angaredza wo vha na ḓuvha ḽa humbula nga ha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa Marikana kha ḽa North West nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.

src_text: Vhuṱungu he vhashumi vha vhu pfa, miṱa yavho khathihi na lushaka nga angaredza vhu ḓo dzulela vha tshipiḓa tsha ḓivhazwakale yashu swikela zwenezwo.
tgt_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..
The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Mvusuluso ya Marikana yo no thoma shuma itela fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi itela khwinisa matshilo zwitshavha zwa fhaḽa Marikana.
tgt_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.

src_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho, muvhuso wo badela masheleni ndiliso linganaho R176 miḽioni kha miṱa ya zwipondwa ngeno hu na uri milandu yo salaho ine ya kha ḓi vha khothe tshi khou lavhelelwa khunyeledzwa mafheloni ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.

src_text: Ho vha na nnḓu dza tshivhalo ntswa kana dze dza tou vusuluswa dze dza ṋetshedzwa kha tshilikadzi dza fhaḽa Marikana ngeno hu na dziṅwe dzine dza ḓo fhela fhaṱwa uno ṅwaha.
tgt_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.

src_text: Thandela ya zwa dzinnḓu ya masheleni linganaho R700 miḽioni ḓo ita uri vhashumi vha migodini vha kone ṋetshedzwa madzulo khwine.
tgt_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..

src_text: Hu khou ṋetshedzwa hafhu na themamveledziso ya zwa matshilisano ya ndeme ine ya ḓo thusa kha khwinifhadza nyimele dza kutshilele kwa zwitshavha zwa vhupo vhune ha vha na zwa migodi.
tgt_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.
South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM) kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.

src_text: Nga murahu ha tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Imbizo dza Phresidennde dza nga ha DDM tharu dzo fhiraho dze dza farelwa fhaḽa North West, Free State na Mpumalanga nga fhambana hadzo, Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng re kha ḽa Gauteng wone wo fara imbizo yawo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 12 Ṱhangule..   Nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A huna tsaleli”, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa ha vhaofisiri vhahulwane vha bvaho kha mivhuso yapo, wa vunḓu na wa lushaka.
tgt_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.

src_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwiimiswa na sekhithara dzavho dzo fhambanaho, vho swika he vha kuvhangana vha tshi itela uri vha kone lwa na engedzea ha tshikalo tsha vhushai khathihi na vhuheḓana vhune ha khou vhangwa nga nyimele dzine dza si vhe dzavhuḓi dza ikonomi.

tgt_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

src_text: Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng tsho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya ita uri Vhupo ha Ikonomi yo Khetheaho ha Vaal River (SEZ) vhu kone shuma, vhune ha vha vhupo vhu re na khonadzeo khulwane ya ita uri dzingu iḽi, vunḓu kana shango ḽi dovhe hafhu vha fhethu hune khaho ha nga itwa zwa nḓowetshumo.
tgt_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..

src_text: SEZ ya fhaḽa Vaal River khou dzudzanya uri hu vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo vha na sekhithara dza ndeme dzi tevhelaho: Vaal River Smart City ntswa; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight khathihi na sekhithara yo vusuluswaho ya bveledza tsimbi.
tgt_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..

Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde.
tgt_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.

src_text: 1   Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde we wa farelwa fhaḽa Ekurhuleni, kha ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 4 swikela ḽa 5 Ṱhangule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱuṱuwedza Vhuthihi ha zwa Matshilisano hu tshi Itelwa Shela Mulenzhe kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi nga Zwitshavha”, wo ṱanganya vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho bva kha masia fhambanaho itela uri vha shumisane na muvhuso muhumbulo muhulwane wa tandulula khaedu dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi khathihi na kuvhanganya zwishumiswa zwo teaho hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya zwitshavha..    Muṱangano wo dzhiela nṱha mivhigo ya nyambedzano bva kha mavunḓu ṱahe ine ya amba nga ha khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo, dzi katelaho swikela masheleni, mafhungo zwa milayo, tshandukiso ya sekhithara ya zwa matshilisano muhumbulo wa ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka ha tshumisano vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa tandulula khaedu dzi elanaho na vhushai, tshayandingano na shayea ha mishumo.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na vhadzulapo ya uri vha shele mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha ita uri ri kone fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine, sa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa kha Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka: Bono ḽa   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki.
tgt_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo sedzesa kha zwa vhutsila ha vhona nga maṱo, vhuvhaḓi na nyolo, ha vhona nga maṱo na thetshelesa nga nḓevhe khathihi na nyanḓadzamafhungo dza vhukati ha vhavhili; nyolo na tshumelo dza zwa vhusiki, mabepha na minyanya hu tshi katelwa na muzika, nyanḓadzamafhungo dza nyanḓadzo na khanḓiso.
tgt_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi ḓo dzhenelela kha sekhithara dzenedzi ho livhiwa kha fhaṱa sekhithara ya zwa vhusiki yo shandukiswaho ine ya dzhielwa nṱha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nahone ya dovha ya vha ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini ḓo dovha hafhu ya shuma yo livha kha ita uri nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhusiki ya Afrika Tshipembe kone swikela mimaraga yapo na ya dzitshaka.
tgt_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.
Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.

src_text: Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele yo Dzudzanyululwaho ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.
tgt_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khwinifhadzwa ha Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.
tgt_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.

src_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi kanzhi ndi dze dza itwa kha khethekanyo ya zwa khadzimiso ya uno muhanga.
tgt_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).

src_text: Dziṅwe dza khwinifhadzo dzine dza khou dzinginywa ndi ḓivhadzwa ha tshifhinga tsha khadzimiso dza masheleni dza tshifhinga tshilapfu tshine tsha ḓo elana na tshifhinga tsha shumisea ha dziṅwe dza ndaka dzenedzo dzine dza khou avhelwa masheleni ayo.
tgt_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso kha sia ḽa zwa khadzimiso dza masheleni dza mimasipala..   Khethekanyo 230 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 maanḓafhadza mimasipala uri ite khadzimiso dza masheleni hu tshi itelwa uri kone engedza masheleni ayo ane ya shumisa kha londa ndaka dzayo kana ane shumiswa kha mbadelo dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Muhanga wa thoma wo tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋea ṱhalutshedzo kha Ndima ya 6 na ya 13 ya Mulayo wa zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.

src_text: Hedzi khwinifhadzo dzo tendelwaho ndi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhahadzimisi vhanzhi vhane vha hadzimisa mimasipala masheleni fhedzi dzi ḓo ḓi bvela phanḓa na tevhedza maitele ndeme ane langa khadzimiso dza ha masipala.
tgt_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.
The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dze dza rekhodiwa nga kotara ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa ha ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara.
tgt_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.

src_text: Hezwi zwo vha itela shandukisa maitele kale mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga fhano shangoni dza vha dzi tshi bviswa nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..

src_text: oyu ṅwedzi une wa ḓo rangela bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga une wa khou dzinginywa ndi wa Ṱhangule 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya thoma na ṅwedzi wa Ḽara 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya vhuvhili.
tgt_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara ya vhuraru na kotara ya vhuṋa dzi ḓo bviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi na wa Shundunthule 2023 nga fhambana hazwo fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD).
tgt_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tshe tsha vha tsho ḓivhadzwa nga murahu ha miḓalo tshinyadzaho ye ya vha hone ngei vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha na ḽa KwaZulu-Natal..   Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tsho fhelelwa nga tshifhinga nga ḽa 18 Ṱhangule 2022 nga murahu ha musi tsho swika he tsha engedzwa nga ḽa 18 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Uhu engedzwa ha tshifhinga ho vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho ranga dzhielwa nṱha ṱhoḓea ya bvela phanḓa na engedza maga tshiimo tsha shishi ane vha hone zwazwino ane khou dzhiiwa nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso itela fhelisa na tandulula masiandaitwa mutsho wo kalulaho kha mavunḓu kwameaho.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.
The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: Khabinethe yo tenda zwauri nyimele ine ya vha hone zwazwino i tsha ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na maga songo ḓowelelaho sa izwi zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na vhadzulapo zwi tshi ḓo bvela phanḓa na ita uri hu vhe na ṱhaḓulo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa, mbuedzedzo na phaṱhululo    ilayotibe.
tgt_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa 2020 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri sedzuluswe hafhu.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza uyu Mulayotibe nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na tshitshavha khwinifhadzwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu ḓo ita uri hu kone swikelwa zwa vhuṋe ha mavu ho tsireledzeaho ya nga mulayo kha Khethekanyo 25(6) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza kuvhanganywa ha mbalombalo ya nga murafho, mbeu, lushaka na vhudzulapo ha muthu onoyo ane vha na pfanelo dza zwa mavu fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.

src_text: Hedzi mbetshelwa dzi ḓo ita uri hu vhe na mivhigo ya muvhalelano wa zwa mavu ine ya vha ya vhukuma khathihi na ṱhoḓisiso dza tshifhinga tshi ḓaho dzine dza elana na zwa shandukiswa ha vhuṋe ha mavu.
tgt_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.
The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi ḽa Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa NWRIA wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha fuṱahe (90).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou dzinginya uri hu vhumbiwe NWRIA ine ya ḓo vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhupuḽani, zwa masheleni khathihi na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ya shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ine ya vha hone zwazwino.
tgt_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).

src_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo vhona uri hu khou vha na nḓisedzo ya maḓi ine ya nga bvela phanḓa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu, yo linganaho nahone ine ya fulufhedzea zwi tshi elana na ṱhoḓea ya ndayotewa ya kona swikela wana maḓi khathihi na vhupo ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu re na mutakalo.
tgt_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo vhumbiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu ya 2 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni Muvhuso, wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga  Thaneḽe ya Trans-Caledon..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa Phaḽamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khwinisa Mulayo wa Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni, wa 2007 (Mulayo 12 wa 2007)..   Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo langa maanḓa mimasipala musi tshi ta mithelo ya mveledziso musi zwi tshi ḓa kha khumbelo dza mveledziso ya mavu dze dza rumelwa kha mimasipala.
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: Hedzi khwiniso dzi ḓo ita uri mimasipala thome badelisa mithelo iyi nga nḓila pfalaho re khagala nahone yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe uyu nga ṅwaha wa 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani na tshitshavha..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni, wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni.
tgt_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso ya Milayo ya sumbe, ine ya vha (1) Mulayo wa Tshikwama tsha Phentsheni ya Zwiimiswa zwi Elanaho, wa 1963 (Mulayo 41 wa 1963); (2) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1976 (Mulayo 84 wa 1976); (3) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso wa 1996; (4) Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Masheleni na Gwama, wa 1997 (Mulayo 99 wa 1997); (5) Mulayo wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya Mavu na Vhulimi, wa 2002 (Mulayo 15 wa 2002); (6) Mulayo wa Mishumo ya zwa Muvhalelano, wa 2005 (Mulayo 26 wa 2005) na (7) Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Mishumo ya Muvhalelano wa 2021 (Mulayo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.

src_text: Uhu khwiniswa hune ha khou dzinginywa hu katela, nga fhasi ha Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1996 katelwa ha muthu ane wa dzula nae lwa tshoṱhe kha mbuelo dza bva murahu nga ḽa 27 Lambamai.

Khwiniso dza milayo ya phentsheni dzi ḓo ita uri vhafarisi vha kone swikela mbuelo dzavho dza phentsheni na zwenezwo nga murahu ha musi mbingano yo no fhaladzwa ḓadzisa kha zwa bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha Minisṱa wa Gwama na kha zwa muvhalelano, khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza shandukisa maanḓa komiti ya khombetshedzo afho hune muṱolambalelano ṱanganedza uri ita vhukhakhi.
tgt_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Mulayotibe wo phaḓaladzwa hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa.
tgt_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri dzudzanyiwe hafhu.
tgt_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi Mulayotibe une wa vha na zwipiḓa zwinzhi une wa khou khwinisa Milayo ya zwino ine ya vha  Mulayo wa Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, wa 2001 (Mulayo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Mulayo wa Madzangano sa Shumeli Malamba, wa 1997 (Mulayo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Ndaka ya Vhufarandaka, wa 1988 (Mulayo 57 wa 1988); (iv) Mulayo wa Dzikhamphani, wa 2008 (Mulayo 71 wa 2008) na  Mulayo wa Milayo ya Sekhithara ya zwa Masheleni, wa 2017 ( Mulayo 9  2017).
tgt_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.

src_text: hwiniso idzi ndi dzine dza khou fhindula kha vhuṱudzeṱudze he ha bviselwa khagala nga tshifhinga tsha tsenguluso ya shango musi ḽi tshi vhambedzwa na maṅwe ye ya itwa nga vha Tshigwada tsha Shuma tsha Mishumo ya zwa Masheleni (FATF).
tgt_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.

src_text: Muvhigo wa tsenguluso iyi ya vhoṱhe wo ita themendelo dza 40 dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi shume nga nḓila ine ḽa khou tevhedza maga ḽifhasi u fhelisa zwiito zwa dzumbetshedzwa ha masheleni khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa masheleni kha zwiito zwa vhutherorisi..   Afrika Tshipembe ḽo wanala ḽi tshe ḽo salela murahu kha masia   Hoyu Mulayotibe amba nga ha masia 14 kha ayo a bviselwa khagala.
Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa FATF bva nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of.
Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine zwa si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine ya si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone dzudzanywa hafhu.
tgt_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.

src_text: Mulayo uyu wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi siho Mulayoni, wa 1992 (Mulayo 140 wa 1992) ita uri magwa na phaḓaladzwa ha zwithu zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe zwe zwa bulwa nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 1 na Sheduḽu 2 ya uno Mulayo zwi vhe vhugevhenga..   Khwiniso idzo dzi lavhelesa na kha sa tea ha Khethekanyo 63, ye ya wanala sa tshimbilelani na ndayotewa kha ḽa uri Minisṱa ṋewe pfanelo dza khwinisa sheduḽu hu songo vha na kwama maitele zwa mulayo.
tgt_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.

src_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2020, Khothe ya Ndayotewa yo ḓivhadza uri Khethekanyo 63 ya Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi wa 1992 u khou tshimbilelana na ndayotewa ya fhedza nga imisa zwa sa tea hawo swika nga ḽa 17 Nyendavhusiku 2022 itela ṋetshela Phaḽamennde tshikhala tsha khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze uho    Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.
tgt_text: South Africa will host the Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 in Cape Town between 9 and 11 September.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fara mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 ngei Ḓoroboni ya Kapa vhukati ha ḽa 9 na ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: The showcase event is held for the first time on the African continent and will see 24 men’s and 16 women’s teams from across the world competing  Messages.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu ha misumbedzo vhu khou ḓo farelwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tou thoma nahone hu ḓo vha na thimu dza vhanna dza 24 na dza vhafumakadzi dza 16 bva ḽifhasini nga angaredza dzine dza ḓo vha dzi tshi khou ṱaṱisana kha vhuṱambo uvhu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela mulaedza wayo wa fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: ●  Thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana, nge vha ita ḓivhazwakale khathihi na fhenya kha muṱaṱisano wa tou thoma wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Tshiphuga tsha Afrika tsha Vhafumakadzi (WAFCON), kha mutambo wa bola ya milenzhe kha makhaulatshele WAFCON ya 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Rabat, kha ḽa Morocco nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 23 Fulwi.
tgt_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: Banyana Banyana, for making history and winning South Africa’s first ever Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), at the 2022 WAFCON finals held in Rabat, Morocco on Saturday, 23 July.

src_text: Nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi, vho dovha hafhu vha kona swikela dzhenela mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha ṅwaha ḓaho tsha bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi tsha FIFA ine ya ḓo farwa khathihi nga shango ḽa Australia na ḽa New Zealand bva nga ḽa 20 Fulwi swika 20 Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: At the same time, they qualified for next year’s FIFA women’s World Cup to be jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand from 20 July to 20 August.

src_text: ●  Vha Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe, nge vha thuba mendele ya 27 kha mitambo yo fhambanaho musi vha tshi khou shela mulenzhe kha Mitambo ya Commonwealth ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Birmingham, England bva nga ḽa 28 Fulwana swika ḽa 8 Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Team South Africa, for winning 27 medals in various disciplines at the 2022 Commonwealth Games held in Birmingham, England from 28 July to 8 August.

src_text: Vho fhedza vho wana vhuimo ha vhuṱahe nga angaredza, vhe na mendele ya musuku ya sumbe, ya ṱahe ya siḽivhere na ya fumithihi ya burontsi.●  Thimu ya Vhafumakadzi ya Springbok, nge vha kunda thimu ya Spain kha mutambo wavho wa thoma kha wa ndingo mbili dza Women’s Winter Series fhaḽa Emirates Airline Park kha ḽa Johannesburg.●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ndavi Nokeri (23), nge vha ambadzwa khare ya vha Ralunako wa Afrika Tshipembe muswa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Themamveledziso ya Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Obu bubungqina bokuba xa sinosebenzisana sisonke sisebenzise amandla ethu ahlangeneyo, singayoyisa imingeni ejongene noqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sasaladza tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso nga vhadzuli vha Togaat ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha migwalabo ya khaedu ya ṱhahelelo ya  maḓi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabemi boMzantsi Afrika njengoko besokola ukuqhubeka nobomi babo ngenxa yeendleko zokuphila kunye nentswela-ngqesho ephezulu.

src_text: Khabinethe ita khuwelelo ya vhudziki na vhukonḓeleli sa zwi mushumo kati wa vhuedzedza Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Khabinethe khou pfesesa dinalela ha vhadzuli vhe vha ḓo tea shumisa mathannge maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu bva tshe ha vha na tshiwo tsha miḓalo mathomo uno ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente okhathalayo, sizimisele ukusebenzisana namahlakani ethu kwezentlalo ukwakha ingomso elingcono lomntu wonke.

src_text: Honeha, dzikhakhathi na zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwi fhelisi thaidzo, nahone tshinyadza themamveledzido ya lushaka zwi kwamesa zwitshavha zwa tsinisa.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazimisele ukuxhasa amashishini asekuhlaleni ngokuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo wa.
tgt_text: Iziseko zophuhliso zoluntu.

src_text: Khabinethe ṱanganedza sainwa vha mulayo ha Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2022 (Mulayo 3 wa 2022) nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxekile ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso ngabahlali base-Tongaat KwaZulu-Natal ngexesha loqhankqalazo befuna amanzi.

src_text: Mulayo ṱoḓa khwinisa khaphasithi na phimo ya maitelendavhelelwa muvhuso wapo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo lokuzola kunye nomonde njengoko uqhuba umsebenzi wokubuyisela iMisebenzi yokuCocwa kwaManzi ase-Tongaat.

src_text: Mulayo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso ita uri Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha shume nga vhukoni na khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo dzo khwaṱhaho dza tshumelo kha vhathu, sa pfanelo ya mutheo yo ṅwalwaho kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya..  Mulayo ṱalusa maitele ane tea tevhelwa musi hu tshi tholwa vhathu kha poswo khulwane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabahlali ekuye kwafuneka ukuba basebenzise iitanki zamanzi ukusukela oko kwabakho izikhukula ebutsheni balo nyaka.

src_text: Zwa zwino thivhela vhaofisiri vha tshitshavha vhahulwane uri vha vhe na vhuimo kha zwa poḽotiki kha mahoro zwa poḽotiki.
tgt_text: Nangona kunjalo, ubundlobongela kunye neziphithiphithi azisosisombululo, kwaye ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso kulimaza kuphela uluntu.

src_text: Nga Mulayo uyu hafhu, poswo dza mulanguli wa masipala dzi lavhelelwa kungedzelwa kha lushaka lwoṱhe itela kunga vhunzhi ha vhonkhetheni vho teaho..  Khabinethe na fulufhelo uri tshanduko idzi dzi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri avho vhane vha tholwa kana khethwa kha maimo aneo vha ḓo kona bveledza zwe vha fulufhedzisa itela uri ri swikelele ṋetshedzo ya vhutshilo ha khwine kha vhathu vhoṱhe.

src_text: Vhugevhenga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMthetho oYilwayo weeNkqubo zooMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya, wama-2022 (uMthetho 3 wama-2022) otyikityiweyo nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa vhashumi vha thelisaho zwiṱunḓwa vha Tshumelo ya Muthelo ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha wana  785 kg ya zwidzidzivhadzi zwa crystal meth zwi linganaho R236 miḽioni ya thengiso siho mulayoni ngei OR Tambo International Airport nga Swondaha ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule ṅwaha wa dzumbululwa ha zwidzidzivhadzi izwi zwo ḓo rumela mulaedza wa khaidzo kha zwigwada zwa vhugevhenga ho dzudzanywaho wa uri vhuimangalavha ha dzhena na bva ho tsireledzwa vhukuma nahone vhaofisiri vhashu vha khou shuma nga maanḓa fhelisa zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ujolise ekuphuculeni amandla kunye nemigangatho yeendlela zokuziphatha zikarhulumente wamakhaya.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Khoro nga ha Ṱhoḓisiso ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha (CHE)  kha Miholo ya Ṱhoho dza zwa Pfunzo na Ndaulo Dziyunivesithi (Vice Chancellors) na Vhalanguli vha Vhahulwane Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyinxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente yenziwe ngobuchule kwaye iqinisekise ukubonelela ngeenkonzo okuzinzileyo ebantwini, njengelungelo elisisiseko eliqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika we-..

src_text: Khabinethe yo nyeṱulelwa nga ha mvelelo dza ṱhoḓisiso ya CHE ye ya tiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020 nga Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli, Dokotela Vho Blade Nzimande ṱola ḽeveḽe dza muholo na maitele fanaho zwa khorondangi dza yunivesithi kha miṅwaha fhiraho 15 bva nga ṅwaha wa 2005 swika wa..  Ṱhoḓisiso yo vha ya wana nḓila yo khwaṱhaho konadzeaho na mveledziso ya dziyunivesithi kana sekhithara ya pfunzo ya nṱha kha shango.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uchaza iinkqubo emazilandelwe xa kuqeshwa kwizikhundla eziphezulu.

src_text: Muvhigo uyu sumbedzisa mawanwa mahulwane khathihi na themendelo  dza ndulamiso dzo dzinginywaho.
tgt_text: Ngoku uthintela amagosa aphezulu karhulumente ekubeni abe nezikhundla zopolitiko kumaqela ezopolitiko.

src_text: Themendelo dzi ṋetshedza, vhukati ha dziṅwe, maitele miholo khwaṱhaho nahone ane vha khagala thomiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha vhulavhelesi tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe tsha nga nnḓa ingamela maitele u dzhia tsheo dza miholo dovha ya ṋetshedza khwaṱhiswa ha sisiṱeme dza ela kushumele kha zwiimiswa.
tgt_text: Kananjalo kulo Mthetho ukhoyo, izithuba zoomanejala boomasipala ezingenabantu kulindeleke ukuba zipapashwe kuzwelonke ukutsala iqela elibanzi labagqatswa abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Ngudo yo dovha ya dzhiela nṱha vhuhulu ho fhambanaho ya zwiimiswa izwi na dovha ita ndinganyiso na maitele dzitshaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba abo banyuliweyo okanye abanyulwe kwezi zikhundla baya kukwazi ukuphumeza izithembiso zabo ukuze wonke umntu azuze ubomi obungcono.

src_text: Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli vha khou lavhelelwa haseledza nga ha muvhigo uyu na vhurangaphanḓa ha yunivesithi sa ḽiga ḽa khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo izwi.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha na Vhutumbuli: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi income amagosa eNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika ngokuthimba i-785 kg ye-crystal meth enexabiso lasesitratweni lezigidi ezingama-R236 kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya i-OR Tambo International ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha wama-.

src_text: Tshanduko Ṱavhanyedzaho ya Khaphasithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso na Pfunzo  kha Sekhithara ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha.
tgt_text: Ukubhaqwa kweziyobisi kuya kuthumela isilumkiso esicacileyo kumaqela abophuli-mthetho ukuba amazibuko ethu okungena kunye nawokuphuma akhuselwe kakuhle kwaye amagosa ethu asebenza nzima ukuphelisa naluphi na ulwaphulo-mthetho     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khabinethe tikedza themendelo ya risetshe mbili dzo itwaho eletshedza nga ha maga ane fanela dzhiwa itela ṱavhanyisa tshanduko ya risetshe na khaphasithi ya funza kha zwiimiswa zwa ngudo dza nṱha.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeBhunga leMfundo ePhakamileyo (i-CHE) ngoMvuzo weeSekela-Tshansela zeeYunivesithi kunye naBaphathi abaPhezulu abaLawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Muvhigo wa thoma wo itwa nga Tshigwada tsha Mushumo tsha Dziminisṱa ṱoḓisisa zwithivheli zwi thivhelaho mushumo wa thola fara vhashumi na mvelaphanḓa ya  vhorapfunzo vha vharema Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngeziphumo zophando lwe-CHE olwagunyaziswa ngowama-2020 nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi kunye noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha, uGq Blade Nzimande, ukuze kuphononongwe amanqanaba emivuzo kunye neendlela zabaphathi beeyunivesithi kwisithuba seminyaka eli-15 ukusuka ngowama-2005 ukuya kutsho kowama-..     Uphando ibikukumisela uzinzo, ukusebenza kunye nophuhliso lweeyunivesithi okanye icandelo lemfundo ephakamileyo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Muvhigo wa vhuvhili – wo itwa nga Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhutumbuli na Tshiimiswa tsha Ṱhoḓisiso tsha Lushaka – wo itwa nga Yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe, vhuimeli ha tshiimiswa ho angaredzaho ha yunivesithi dza muvhuso dza 26 kha shango.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ichaza iziphumo eziphambili kunye nezindululo zokulungisa.

src_text: Mivhigo heyi yoṱhe dzinginya zwiṱirathedzhi zwa thusedzo ṱavhanyisa tshanduko kha masia maṱanu ṱanḓavhuwaho, ane vha kha postgraduate pineline; vhudzheneli nga vhashumi; mvelele ya tshiimiswa na maitele; mbekanyamushumo na tshiṱirathedzhi, na zwiko zwi si zwinzhi.
tgt_text: Izindululo ziphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, inkqubo yomvuzo eqinisiweyo kunye nephandle.

src_text: Pfano ya Dzitshaka nga ha Zwiko zwa Dzhenetiki zwa Zwimela zwa Zwiḽiwa na Vhulimi (Pfano).
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kwesigqeba sokujonga sangaphandle kwaye nesizimeleyo ukojonga inkqubo yokwenziwa kwezigqibo zemivuzo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Pfano Phalamenndeni uri sainwe sa thendelano.
tgt_text: Zikwaphakamisa nokuqiniswa kweenkqubo zovavanyo lomsebenzi kumaziko.

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a Pfano, ine ya eletshedza mashango ane vha muraḓo ambedzana na vhona uri hu na tshumiso yo khwaṱhaho ya zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela zwa zwiḽiwa na vhulimi saina Pfano iyi zwi ḓo dovha zwa khwaṱhisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha shango kha ndondolo na kushumisele ko khwaṱhaho kwa zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela, na ṋetshedza thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwa mahayani.
tgt_text: Uphononongo lukwathathele ingqalelo ubungakanani bala maziko kwaye lwenza nokulinganisa lujonga kumazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe (Just Transition) ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa weMfundo ePhakamileyo, iNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kulindeleke ukuba axoxe ngale ngxelo neenkokeli zeyunivesithi njengenyathelo lokomeleza la maziko emfundo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iya kuthi emva koko ipapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho: www.dhet.gov.za..     INguqu eKhawulezayo yoPhando kunye neSakhono sokuFundisa kwiCandelo leMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Muhanga ṋetshedza bono ḽi fanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi linganaho na ḽi konḓelelaho kilima ṱalutshedza masia milayo na mbekanyamaitele zwa swikelela izwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izixhasile izindululo zamaphononongo amabini awayegunyaziswe ukuba acebise ngamanyathelo aza kuthathwa ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu yophando kunye nesakhono sokufundisa kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Muhanga wa tshanduko ḓo kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe Afrika Tshipembe, na ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha tandulula vhushayandingano ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na sika ikonomi vhuedzaho vhoṱhe.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenziwe liQela laBaphathiswa eliSebenzayo elaphanda ngemiqobo ethintela ukuqeshwa, ukugcinwa kunye nokuqhubela phambili kwezifundiswa ezimnyama zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khomishini ya Kilima ya Phresidennde yo tshimbidza maitele vhukwamani vhuhulwane na vhashumisani vha wana thikhedzo yo ṱanḓavhuwaho ya muhanga.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesibini – egunyaziswe liSebe lezeNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kunye neSiseko soPhando lweSizwe – yenziwe yi-Universities South Africa, iqumrhu elimele iiyunivesithi zoluntu ezingama-26 kweli lizwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri tsudzuluwo ya kha ikonomi sa shumisi khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050 fanela tikedza dzangalelo ḽa lushaka, hu tshi katela na mishumo ya khwine ya vhoṱhe,  khwiniso ya vhudzheneli ha tshitshavhani na pheliso ya vhushai.
tgt_text: Zombini ezi ngxelo zinikeze ngamacebo ongenelelo ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu kwimimandla emihlanu ebanzi, esebefumene isidanga sokuqala; ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabasebenzi; inkcubeko kunye nokusebenza kweziko; umgaqo-nkqubo nesicwangciso, kunye nezibonelelo ezingqongopheleyo..     ISivumelwano saMazwe ngaMazwe ngeMithombo Yemfuza yeZityalo zoKutya kunye nezoLimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisani na muvhuso tikedza na ṱanganedza muhanga uyu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePalamente.

src_text: Pulane yo dodombedzwaho ya thoma shumisa muhanga ḓo bveledzwa, nahone ḓo dzheniswa kha vhupulani ha muvhuso na maitele mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: Oku kuya kwenza ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ube yinxalenye yamaqela esi Sivumelwano, nesikhokela amazwe angamalungu ekulondolozeni kunye nasekuqinisekiseni usetyenziso oluzinzileyo lwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo ekutyeni nakwezolimo.

src_text: Garaṱa dza Ḽaisentsi ya reila Ntswa dza Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ukungena kwesi siVumelwano kuya komeleza ukuzibophelela kwelizwe ngokubhekiselele kulondolozo kunye nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo, kwaye sinike inkxaso kuluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓo thoma shumiswa ha Garaṱa ya Ḽaisentsi ya reila ntswa ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo zwa khwine fhira ine ya vha hone zwino.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo soMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Sisiṱeme ya zwino yo shumiswa bva kha ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iSicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Thekhinoḽodzhi bva zwenezwo yo no shanduka nahone zwi vho ḓura ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya ḽaisentsi dzine ndi kale ri khou shumisa dzone kha tshifhinga tsha zwino.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonisa umbono okwabelwana ngawo woMzantsi Afrika olinganayo, nokwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Garaṱa ntswa yo dzinginywaho ḓo ita uri ḽaisentsi ya reila kone shuma na International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Sichaza imigaqo kunye neendawo kumgaqo-nkqubo zokuphumeza oku.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Mbekanyamushumo dza Mishumo ya Tshitshavha dzo Engedzwaho (EPWP).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo senguqu siza kuchaphazela wonke umntu waseMzantsi Afrika, sinike ithuba lokulungisa ukungalingani okwenziwa yimbali kwaye sidale uqoqosho oluxhamlisa wonke umntu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa kha  gazethe mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya EPWP itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.
tgt_text: IKomishoni kaMongameli yeMozulu iqhube inkqubo yothethathethwano ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo yaze yafumana inkxaso ebanzi ngesi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: EPWP ndi iṅwe ya mbekanyamushumo khulwane dza muvhuso yo livhiswaho kha ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya muholo na kha vhushai nga sika zwikhala zwa mushumo wa tshifhinga nyana, nga maanḓa kha vhaswa na vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba inguqu eya kuqoqosho olungenayo ikhabhoni ngowama-2050 kufuneka ixhase iminqweno yophuhliso lwesizwe, kuqukwe imisebenzi endilisekileyo kumntu wonke, ubandakanyo lwentlalo kunye nokupheliswa kwentlupheko.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya mbekanyamaitele ntswa khwaṱhisa mbekanyamushumo na ṋea ṱhaluso kha masia fanaho na zwa miholo, modele wa ndambedzo na tsireledzo ya matshilisano, na livhanyisa EPWP na maitele zwa mushumo ano maḓuvha ṱuṱuwedza vhushumisani vhukati ha muvhuso na sekhithara ya phuraivethe kha khwaṱhisedza uri  EPWP shela mulenzhe zwihulwane vhukuma kha tsiko ya mishumo yavhuḓi na fhungudza vhushai.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuwo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuba axhase aze amkele esi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhutumbuli kha mathomo mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha mona na shango.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso esineenkcukacha zokuphumeza esi sicwangciso-nkqubo siya kuphuhliswa, kwaye sidityaniswe kwinkqubo yocwangciso kunye neyohlahlo lwabiwo-mali karhulumente.

src_text: Khwiniso kha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha leLayisenisi yokuQhuba yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muelo, dizaini na bveledzwa ha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume ukutshintshwa kweKhadi leLayisensi yokuQhuba elikhoyo ngoku lize lifakwe kwelinye elineempawu ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: (Fourth Decimal Coin Series).
tgt_text: Le nkqubo yangoku oko yayisebenza ukusukela ngo-.

src_text: Yo ṱanganedza sisiṱeme ya sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumisa nyambo dza tshiofisi kha tshigwada tsha vhuṋa tsha khoini ya tshifumi.
tgt_text: Ubuchwephesha ukusukela ngoko sebatshintsha kwaye kuya kuxabisa kakhulu ukugcina iziseko zophuhliso ezikhoyo .

src_text: Ipfi ‘Afrika Tshipembe’ ḽi ḓo dzheniswa kha lurumbu luthihi lwa dzikhoini khathihi na ganḓiswa nga nyambo dza tshiofisi dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha elicetywayo liya kwenza ilayisenisi yokuqhuba yeli lizwe ihambelane ne-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving License (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Nyambo tharu dzi ḓo shumiswa kha khoini ya R5; nyambo mbili kha dzikhoini dza R2; 50c, 20c na 10c, R1 ḓo vha nga luambo luthihi.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weNkqubo eYandisiweyo yeMisebenzi kaRhulumente (i-EPWP).

src_text: Nyambo dzoṱhe hedzi dzi ḓo shumiswa nga sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha  kha miṅwaha ya 10 ḓaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente loMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo we-EPWP ukuze uluntu lubonisane ngawo.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamitele yo Ṱanganelaho ya Ndangulo ya Khwaḽithi ya Maḓi (IWQM)  ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: I-EPWP yenye yeenkqubo eziphambili zikarhulumente ezijolise ekuboneleleni ukuthomalalisa intlupheko kunye nokuzisa ingeniso ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi ethutyana, ingakumbi kulutsha kunye nabasetyhini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa kha gazethe ha Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya IWQM itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.
tgt_text: Uyilo lomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha luza komeleza le nkqubo kwaye lunike ingcaciso kwimiba efana nemivuzo, imodeli yenkxaso-mali kunye nokhuseleko loluntu, kwaye lulungelelanise i-EPWP neendlela zokusebenza zale mihla.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo dzinginywaho ḓo dzhena vhudzuloni ha Mbekanyamaitele ya WQM yo thomiwaho nga ṅwaha wa 1991 ine zwazwino yo fhelelwaho nga tshifhinga na tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tshe tsha thoma shuma nga ṅwaha wa..  Mbekanyamaitele iyi sumbedzisa zwigwada zwa milayo zwine zwa ḓo vhumba mutheo wa ndangulo ya khwaḽithi ya maḓi ṋetshedza ndivhanyiso kha milayo yoṱhe elanaho na zwa maḓi khathihi na vhuḓikumedzeli ha ḽino shango kha khaedu ya ḽifhasi kha zwa ṋetshedzo na ndondolo ya maḓi sa tshiko tshi shaeaho.
tgt_text: Luza kukhuthaza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye necandelo labucala ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekudalweni kwemisebenzi endilisekileyo kunye nokuphelisa intlupheko.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwentsi ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kukhuthaza ukusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ekuphunyezweni kweenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: (Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy).
tgt_text: Izilungiso kuLuhlu lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khanḓiso ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwensti ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho itela wana mahumbulwa nga tshitshavha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umyinge, uyilo kunye noqulunqo lonyaka wama-2023 lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Tshipekiṱiramu tsha firikhwentsi ya Radio ndi tshiko tsha mupo tshi sa vusuledzwi tshine tsha vha tsha vhuṱhogwa kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya didzhithala na themamveledziso ya zwa vhudavhidzani.
tgt_text: Ivume inkqubo ejikelezayo qho ngonyaka yokusetyenziswa kweelwimi ezisemthethweni kuluhlu lwesine lweemali ezinkozo.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi yo dzinginywaho yo itelwa tikedza khovhelo ya sipekiṱiramu na ṋea ḽaisentsi ya ṱhingothendeleki dzi shumaho nga netiweke, khasho; ngudo ya saintsi ya zwa vhufhufhi na zwa maḓini; ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso; tswikelelo ya tshitshavha, na dziṅwe nḓowetshumo dzi elanaho na zwenezwi.
tgt_text: Igama elithi “uMzantsi Afrika” liya kufakwa kwelinye icala kwimali eyinkozo ze libhalwe ngazo zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza khovhelo linganaho na ndi nganyiso kha vhushelamulenzhe kha tshanduko ya sekhithara na tswikelelo ya ṱhumo ya didzhithala na kha zwipiḓa zwa nnḓa zwa shango.
tgt_text: Iilwimi ezintathu ziya kusetyenziswa kwi-R5; iilwimi ezimbini kwi-R2; i-50c, i-20c, i-10c kunye ne-R1 ziya kuba ngolwimi olunye.

src_text: Fulo ḽa nanga Nkhetheni wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Khoro ya Dzitshaka ya Mbumbano ya Vhudavhidzani ha kule (ITU)  na Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio.
tgt_text: Zonke ezi lwimi ziya kusetyenziswa ngendlela ejikeleziswayo rhoqo ngonyaka kule minyaka ili-10 izayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nkhetheni nangiwaho wa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Mandla Samuel Mchunu kha Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio ya ITU (Region .
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo oDityanisiweyo woLawulo loMgangatho waManzi (i-IWQM) wowama-.

src_text: Vho Mchunu zwa zwino vha khou shuma sa muraḓo wa bodo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo we-IWQM ukuze uluntu lubonisane.

src_text: Ho khou dzingingwa ḽa uri vha dovhe vha khethiwe kha Khoro ya ITU kha themu ya ṅwaha wa 2023 swika..  Khetho dzi ḓo vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha Khonferentsi ya Vhuimeli ha mashango (Plenipotentiary) ha ITU ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Bucharest, kha shango ḽa Romania bva nga ḽa 26 Khubvumedzi swika nga ḽa 14 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo uya kuthatha indawo yoMgaqo-nkqubo we-WQM ophelelwe lixesha wama-1991 kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sawo esamiselwa ngo-..

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzula ḽo ḓikumedzela kha zwipikwa na ndivho ya ITU ya vala mukano wa zwa didzhithala na ṱumanya vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽifhasi  Vhuṱambo vhu khou ḓaho.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwemigaqo eya kuba sisiseko solawulo lomgangatho wamanzi.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa.
tgt_text: Uzobonelela ngolungelelwaniso kuyo yonke imithetho efanelekileyo enxulumene namanzi kunye nezibophelelo zelizwe ekuboneleleni nasekulondolozweni kwamanzi njengomthombo onqabileyo.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa nga Khubvumedzi uno ṅwaha ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero: “U pembelela Ifa ḽa Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika wa Mvelele wa Afrika Tshipembe”.
tgt_text: Uyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya.

src_text: Khabinethe ṱuṱuwedza Maafrika Tshipembe vhoṱhe pembelela vhufa ha mvelele yashu ho pfumaho na phambano zwine zwa vha na maanḓa u ri ṱanganya sa lushaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo soMgaqo-nkqubo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Ri fanela ḓikumedzela roṱhe kha shumisana itela fhelisa phambano na vhushayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhuḓipfi ha muhumbulo wa ḓihudza nga vha Muafrika Tshipembe  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:Vhathu vhoṱhe vho winaho, vho thubaho mimedala na vhaṱaṱisani vhe vha dzhenela kha 95th Comrades Marathon, une wa ḓivheswa nga pfi “Ultimate Human Race”, nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Iteknoloji yezonxibelelwano esebenza ngamaza omoya sisixhobo sendalo esibalulekileyo kuhlumo loqoqosho lwedijithali yoMzantsi Afrika kunye nakwisiseko sonxibelelwano.

src_text: Mbambe ya vhanna yo winwa nga Tete Dijana (awara dza 5, minetse ya 30, na mithethe ya 38) ane bva Mahikeng ngei Vhukovhela ha Devhula ngeno mugidimi wa shango ḽa Russia Alexandra Morozova (awara dza 6, minetse ya 17, na mithethe ya 47) wina mbambe ya vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo ujonge ukuxhasa ulwabiwo lwamaza omoya kunye nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi ezisisigxina zeselula; zosasazo; zenqwelomoya nezaselwandle; zophando nophuhliso; zokufikelela koluntu, kunye nezamanye amashishini afanelekileyo.

Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ukwajonge ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nolwabiwo olungenamkhethe ukuze lwenze igalelo kwinguqu yeli candelo kunye nakufikeleleka kuqhagamshelwano lwedijithali nakwiindawo ezikude zelizwe.

src_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:Mama Vho Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), Mulwelambofholowo wa kale na mutshimbidzi wa dzangano ḽa vhashumi vhe vha dovha vha vha muṱanganedzi wa National Order of Luthuli nga ṅwaha wa 2004 kha “vhushelamulenzhe ha vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela pfanelo dza vhashumi na swikelelwa ha Afrika Tshipembe ḽa demokirasi ḽi sa khethululi nga muvhala, nga mbeu nahone ḽo vhofholowaho ”.Vhaofisiri vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS)  vhe vha vha vhe vhaṋameli kha bupo ḽa SAPS ḽe ḽa wa ngei Rand Airport, Germiston nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika weManyano yoNxibelelwano lweZizwe ngeZizwe (i-ITU) kunye neBhodi yoLawulo kaNomathotholo .

src_text: Vha SAPS vha khou ita ṱhoḓisiso ya tshivhangi tsha wa ha bupo iḽo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imamkele umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi yeMimiselo kaNomathotholo (kwiNgingqi  ye-ITU.

src_text: Khabinethe tamela mashudu mutshimbidzabupo huvhalesaho uri fhola nga ṱavhanya  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teahoa.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu ulilungu lebhodi esebenzayo ngoku.

src_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Gugulethu Abigail Thimane sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Vhuvheaiṱo kha Sekhithara ya Muvhuso na Mveledziso ya Khaphasithi kha Muhasho wa Vhupulani, Vhuvheaiṱo na ela  Mufumakadzi Vho Kwena Komape sa DDG: Mveledziso ya zwa Ikonomi, Mbambadzo na Vhuvhambadzi kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mvusuludzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Mahayani  Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano.
tgt_text: Kwaye kucetywa ukuba aphinde onyulwe kwiBhunga ye-ITU kwixesha lowama-2023 ukuya kowama-..     Unyulo luya kuqhubeka ngexesha leNkomfa yoNozakuzaku ye-ITU eya kubanjelwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania ukusuka ngomhla wama-26 kweyoMsintsi ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadzwa nga ha vhukoni ha Eskom ha fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi zwine zwa khou dzulela itea tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga Minisṱa wa Mabindu Muvhuso khathihi na ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho swika zwino bva kha Komiti ya zwa Thekiniki ine ya vha nga fhasi ha Komiti ya Lushaka ya nga ha Thaidzo dza Fulufulu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo emfutshane nguMphathiswa wamaShishini kaRhulumente u-Pravin Gordhan malunga namandla ka-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kombane okwethutyana kwaye ikwafumene nengxelo yenkqubela-phambili evela kwiKomiti yobuGcisa yeKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla.

src_text: Hu ḓo dovha hafhu ha vha na dziṅwe nḓivhadzo dzine dza ḓo itwa nga murahu ha khunyeledzwa ha nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho dza nga ha mivhigo iyi.
tgt_text: Ezinye izibhengezo ziza kwenziwa emva kokuqukunjelwa kweengxoxo ezinzulu zezi ngxelo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa vhaisala hayo nga thithisea na kanganyisea hune ha khou vhangwa nga khauwa ha muḓagasi kha vhoramabindu na ngomu miṱani, nga maanḓa musi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga tshifhinga tshine muvhuso wa khou ḓidzhenisa kha maga u tandulula thaidzo iyi a ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukudana ngokuphazamiseka kunye nengxaki ebangelwe kukucima kombane koosomashishini nakumakhaya, ingakumbi okwenzeka ngeli xesha urhulumente eqalisa ukusebenza kwizithembiso ezazenziwe  nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-.

src_text: Vhubindudzi.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa zwa Vhumagi ḽa Sandvik Khomanani, fhaḽa Kempton Park, ḽe ḽa vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dza zwa vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R350-miḽioni dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha Muṱangano wa zwa Vhubindudzi wa Afrika Tshipembe (SAIC) we wa farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe..     Tshifhaṱo itshi tshiswa tsha muelo linganaho 62 000 square-metre ndi tshine tsha ṱanganyisa fhethu huthihi mishumo ye kale ya vha tshi itwa kha mamaga maṱanu fhambanaho nahone tshi na vhashumi vha swikaho.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali.

src_text: Ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mamaga ha Sandvik mahulwanesa nahone musalauno ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni ha bveledza magandakanda u shuma migodini hu tshi shumiswa 60% ya zwibveledzwa zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza madalo zwa vhulavhelesi nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi rwelwa ṱari tshiimiswa tsha zwa vhumagi tsha Hesto Harnesses fhaḽa Stanger, hune ha vha KwaDukuza nga ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusungulwa kwe-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, eyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluzizigidi ezingama-350 zeerandi obeluthenjiswe kwiNkomfa yesine yoTyalo-mali yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAIC) ebibanjelwe kwiZiko leNgqungquthela laseSandton eRhawutini ngomhla wama-24 kweyoKwindla yowama-..     Eli ziko litsha elizizikwere zeemitha ezingama-62 000 lidibanisa imisebenzi ebiqhutywa ngaphambili kwiindawo ezintlanu ezahlukeneyo kwaye lingangena abasebenzi abamalunga nama-.

src_text: Hetshi tshiimiswa ndi tshiṅwe tsha thandela ṱhanu khulwane dzine dza vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dzi linganaho  4-biḽioni dze dza itwa nga vha ha Metair Investments Limited itela tikedza zwa engedzwa na fhaṱwa ha mimoḓoro miswa ya Ford Ranger fhano hayani.
tgt_text: Lelinye lawona maziko e-Sandvik amakhulu  kwihlabathi jikelele nanobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwaye lizawuvelisa iiloli zokulayisha emigodini.

src_text: Phresidennde vho dovha hafhu vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha vulwa ha thandela ya vusuluswa na engedzwa ha ḽimaga ḽa Sappi Saiccor Mill ḽine ḽa ḓura masheleni linganaho R7,7 biḽioni fhaḽa Umkomaas, zwine hezwi zwo livhiswa kha engedza vhukoni khathihi na vhea khamphani iyi kha maimo nṱhesa ḽifhasini ngeno nga thungo hu tshi khou sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi na ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Umyinge ongaphezulu kwama-60% wezi ntsimbi ziza kusetyenziswa xa kusenziwa ezi loli uza kuveliswa apha eMzantsi Afrika..     IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMongameli Ramaphosa lokuya kuhlola KwaZulu-Natal ngethuba kusungulwa komzi-mveliso wakwa-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza ngomhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi yowama-.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu vhumba tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dze dza itwa nga vhoranḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha muṱangano wa SAIC.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lelinye leeprojekthi ezintlanu zotyalo-mali oluyinkunzi eliyinxalenye yebhiliyonii eyi-.

src_text: Vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa kha shango ḽashu vhu thusa kha vusuluswa na vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu khathihi na vhea shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhubindudzi..     Mveledziso ya themamveledziso.
tgt_text: 4 yeerandi eyathenjiswa ngabakwa-Metair Investments Limited kumalinge okuxhasa umsebenzi wokwandiswa kunye nokuveliswa apha ekhaya kwe-Ford Ranger etsha.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa ha tshipiḓa tshiswa tsha bada ya Musina Ring Road ngei Limpopo ine ya ḓo leludzela vhathu uri vha kone enda zwavhuḓi mona na ḓorobo ya Musina khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na engedzea ha mbambadzo na miṅwe mishumo ya zwa ikonomi vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na maṅwe mashango Tshitshavha tsha Mveledziso tsha Tshipembe ha Afrika.
tgt_text: UMongameli ukwazimase ukuvulwa kweprojekthi yokuphucula nokwandisa i-Sappi Saiccor Mill exabisa iibhiliyoni eziyi-7,7 zeerandi e-Umkomaas, ejolise ekwandiseni nasekuphuculeni le nkampani itsho ikwazi ukukhuphisana kumgangatho wehlabathi  ngelixa ikwadala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo kunye nesisigxina.

src_text: Thandela ya masheleni swikaho R640-miḽioni yo sika mishumo ya tshoṱhe linganaho 275 hu tshi itelwa vhadzulapo vha vhupo honoho khathihi na ṋetshedza zwikhala kha zwitshavha zwapo hu tshi katelwa na mabindu maṱuku vhukati na mahulwane (SMMEs)..     Uhu fhaṱwa ha bada ya Musina Ring Road ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso tsha mbekanyamushumo ya themamveledziso ya muvhuso, hu tshi shumiswa ERRP ine muhumbulo wayo muhulwane wa vha bveledza nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na zwikhala zwa mishumo kha sekhithara dzoṱhe dzo fhambanaho na zwitshavha nga angaredza..     Tshiwo tsha fhaḽa Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luyinxalenye yezithembiso ezenziwe ngoosomashishini kwi-SAIC.
Lonke utyalo-mali olutsha elizweni lethu lunceda ekwakhiweni ngokutsha nasekuvuseleleni uqoqosho lwethu, kwaye luyaqhubeka nokungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ulilizwe elunamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali.
