src_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedza mapifi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ya avho vhe vha lovha  musi masalela mugodi wo ṱutshelwaho henefho kha vhupo honoho ha Jagersfontein vhu re vunḓuni ḽa Gauteng tshi swika hune pwashea, ha fhedza ho vha na lurofhe lwa khombo lwe lwa elela henefho musi ḓuvha ḽi tshi thoma bva nga matsheloni Swondaha, ya ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: Uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Tshiwo itsho tsho dovha hafhu tsha sia themamveledziso ya kha vhupo honoho, ndaka dza vhathu zwavho fana na zwiendedzi khathihi na miṱa minzhi zwo tshinyadzwa vhukuma.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwecandelo elitsha le-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo eliza kwenza kube lula ukuba abantu bahamba-hambe eMusina, likwavumele ukwandiswa kwemisebenzi yorhwebo neyoqoqosho phakathi koMzantsi Afrika kunye namazwe oMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC).

Le projekthi yezigidi ezingama-640 zeerandi idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-275 yabahlali bale ngingqi yaze yabonelela ngamathuba kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni nakumashishini amancinane, aphakathi namancinane kakhulu (ii-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwe-Musina Ring Road yinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yeziseko zophuhliso, ngokusebenzisa i-ERRP, ejonge ukudala uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye namathuba engqesho kumacandelo ahlukeneyo nakuluntu.
Intlekele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho henefho kha vhupo he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 12 Khubvumedzi 2022, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho sumbedza takalela mushumo wa phuluso na mbuedzedzo une wa khou itwa henefho kha vhupo honoho.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi ithi mazilale ngenxeba iintsapho zabo bathe basutywa kukufa emva kokugqabhuka kwedama lodaka lomgodi owavalwayo  wase-Jagersfontein e-Freystata lakhupha udaka olwenze umonakalo omkhulu ngentseni yangeCawa, umhla we-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha ṋea pfulufhedziso ya uri muvhuso ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo yo teaho kha vhadzulapo vha Jagersfontein vho kwameaho.
tgt_text: Le ntlekele iphinde yashiya izakhiwo zendawo, izinto zabantu ezifana nezithuthi kunye nezindlu ezininzi zonakaliswe kakhulu.. 2   Ngethuba lotyelelo lwakhe kummandla wentlekele ngoMvulo, umhla we-12 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, uMongameli Ramaphosa uvakalise umbulelo ngeenzame zohlangulo nezovuselelo kulo mmandla.

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedzea vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri vhaṋe vha mugodi uyu vho amba uri vho ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso na thikhedzo ya zwa thekiniki kha muvhuso arali hu tshi nga vha na khumbelo yo raloho nga vha Khoro ya zwa Minerala ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ukwathembise ukuba urhulumente uzakubonelela ngenkxaso efanelekileyo kubahlali abachaphazelekayo baseJagersfontein.
IKhabhinethi ikhuthazekile kukuba abanini balo mgodi bathe bakulungele ukunika uncedo lobugcisa nenkxaso kurhulumente ukuba banokucelwa benze njalo liBhunga lezeZimbiwa laseMzantsi Afrika.

3 Ishishini lezemigodi lisahleli linegalelo elibalulekileyo kuqoqosho ngokuqeshwa ngokuthe ngqo nangokungathanga ngqo, iingeniso evela kurhwebo namazwe angaphandle, kunye notyalo-mali oluthe ngqo lwangaphandle, kwaye lidlala indima ebalulekileyo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu kwiindawo ezinemigodi.

src_text: Nḓowetshumo ya zwa migodi kha ḓi vha yone shelaho mulenzhe zwihulwane kha ikonomi nga kha mishumo yo tou livhanaho nayo na miṅwe ya nga thungo, mbuelo dzi bvaho kha thundu dzi rengiselwaho nnḓa khathihi na vhubindudzi ho tou livhaho bva mashangoni nnḓa nahone dzi shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha khwinifhadza matshilo vhathu vha re kha zwitshavha zwine migodi yeneyo ya wanala khazwo.
tgt_text: 4 Urhulumente kunye neminye imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente baye bangenelela ngokungxamisekileyo ngokubonelela ngeendawo zokuhlala ezingxamisekileyo, ululeko lwengqondo nangezibonelelo ezingundoqo ezifana neengubo, oomatrasi kunye nokutya.
Ubonelelo lwamanzi nombane kulo mmandla sele lubuyele esiqhelweni.

src_text: Muvhuso khathihi na maṅwe madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso wo dzhenelela nga ṱavhanya nga ṋetshedza vhudzulo ha shishi, thuso ya muhumbulo musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha ḽikhaulambilu khathihi na tshomedzo dza ndeme dzi fanaho na mabai, maṱirasi na zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa.
Nḓisedzo ya maḓi na muḓagasi kha vhupo uho yo vhuyelela ngonani swika zwino.
tgt_text: 5 Nje ukuba indawo yentlekele icociwe, amagcisa alindeleke ukuba enze uhlolo lweendonga zezindlu.
IKhabhinethi ibulele iinkonzo zikaxakeka, imibutho yoluntu kunye namalungu oluntu ngeminikelo yesisa noncedo lwabo.
Uqoqosho.

src_text: Musi vhupo uho he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela khaho ho no fhela kunakiswa hafhu, vhorathekiniki vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ite tsenguluso ya zwifhaṱo zwa dzinnḓu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixoxe ngobume boqoqosho beli lizwe emva kokuba amanani akutshanje eZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) abonise ukuba ingeniso yemveliso yelizwe (i-GDP) yekota yesibini yowama-2022 yehle ngo-0,7%.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa tshumelo dza shishi, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na miraḓo ya tshitshavha kha thuso yavho khathihi na mpho dze vha dzi ṋetshedza..     Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Izinto eziphembelele oku kwehla ziquka ukucinywa kombane, ungquzulwano lwaseRashiya ne-Ukraine, kunye neendleko eziphezulu zokuphila kunye nokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ambedzana nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi kha shango ḽashu nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dza vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dzo sumbedzisa uri zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa shango (GDP) kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwo tsela fhasi nga 0,7%.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela enziwe siSicwangciso soKwakha ngokutsha kunye noVuselelo loQoqosho (i-ERRP) ubukhulu becala sithintele ilizwe kubunzima amashishini ajamelane nabo kwihlabathi, kwaye sakhusela imisebenzi kunye neendlela zokuphila.

src_text: Zwiitisi zwe zwa ṱuṱuwedza uhu tsela fhasi ndi zwi fanaho na khauwa ha muḓagasi, khakhathi dza vhukati ha shango ḽa Russia na ḽa Ukraine hu tshi katelwa na ḓura ha zwirengwa khathihi na tshanduko ya mitengo.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela ezoqoqosho aluqilima karhulumente aqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo, njengoko kungqinwe kwiziphumo zakutshanje ze-Stats SA zeKota zoVavanyo lwaBasebenzi, ezibonise ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala neyesibini yowama-     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Maga a dzhiiwa nga Pulane ya Mvusuludzo na Mbuedzedzo ya Ikonomi (ERRP) thusa shango vhukuma kha thaidzo dza ikonomi dze dza vha dzi tshi khou bvelela kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dovha hafhu tsireledza mishumo khathihi na nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo soBeko-liso noVavanyo (i-M&E) soMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha lweSizwe (i-NYP).

src_text: Maga muvhuso khwaṱhaho zwa ikonomi khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo sa zwe zwa vhonala kha mvelelo dza zwenezwino dza Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza nga Kotara dza vha tshiimiswa tsha Mbalombalo tsha Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dze dza sumbedzisa uri ho vha na mishumo miswa swikaho 648 000 ye ya sikwa vhukati ha kotara ya thoma na ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume isicwangciso-nkqubo se-M&E esiza kunceda ukubeka iliso okusebenzayo kunye novavanyo lweempembelelo zeentsika ze-NYP yowama-2020 ukuya kowama-.

src_text: Muhanga wa Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi (M&E) wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYP).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngezalathisi ezintlanu ezikwinqanaba eliphezulu ezihambelana neentsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muhanga wa M&E une wa ḓo thusa kha ita uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi ho khwaṱhaho khathihi na tsenguluso ya masiandaitwa thikho dza NYP ya ṅwaha wa 2020-.
tgt_text: Ezi zalathisi zaqulunqwa kubanjiswene namahlakaniafanelekileyo anomdla kuphuhliso nasekuxhotyisweni kolutsha kweli lizwe.

src_text: Muhanga uyu ṋetshedza zwilinganyi zwiṱanu zwa maimo nṱha zwine zwa elana na thikho dza NYP.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha eziza kuqokelelwa ziza kujonga iminyaka yobudala, isini, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga ngokwebala kunye nendawo yokuhlala ngokwemimmandla yala mangenelelo..     Ukubeka iliso kuza kwenziwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente, kumaqumrhu nakumacandelo abucala.

src_text: Zwilinganyi izwi zwo bveledzwa nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vho teaho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo kha zwa mveledziso na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa fhano shangoni.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ziza kwenziwa ngekota kwaye zipapashwe kabini ngonyaka..     Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo.

src_text: Zwa kuvhanganywa ha zwidodombedzwa zwi ḓo khethekanywa hu tshi tevhelwa miṅwaha, mbeu, vhuholefhali, tshigwada tsha murafho na vhupo vhune maga aya khou itwa khaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo kurhulumente, esijonge ukulungisa izikhewu eziboniweyo zocwangciso lomgaqo-nkqubo kwinkqubo yocwangciso yangoku.
Amanyathelo okungenelela acetywayo phakathi kwezinye izinto aza kujongana nokunqongophala kolungelelwaniso locwangciso phakathi kwamanqanaba amathathu karhulumente.

src_text: Zwa vhulavhelesi zwi ḓo itwa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso, zwiimiswa na kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela azo kuqalisa indlela yokubeka iliso esekelwe kubungqina.

src_text: Mivhigo ḓo bveledzwa nga kotara nahone ya anḓadzwa luvhili nga ṅwaha..     Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo somgaqo-nkqubo sikwazisa ukuqikelelwa lula ngocwangciso lwexesha elide ukuya kwixesha eliphakathi kunye nelexesha elifutshane kurhulumente wonke.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho kha muvhuso, une wa khou lingedza tandulula thaidzo dzo ṱaluswaho dza zwa vhupulani ha mbekanyamaitele kha sisteme ya zwa vhupulani ya zwino.
tgt_text: Siza kusebenzela ukwazisa uhlaziyo lwemithetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhambelana nokuqikelelwa kucwangciso kunye nokubekwa kweliso kukarhulumente..     Ukuvunywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-Arhente yaMayeza ase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Maga ane khou dzinginywa ḓo dovha hafhu sedzesa kha zwa sa elana ha vhupulani kha masia mararu muvhuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-AMA kunye nokungeniswa kwaso ePalamente ukuze sivunywe.

src_text: Maga aya ḓo thoma shumisa maitele zwa vhulavhelesi ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuzalisekisa isivumelwano esamkelwa yiNdibano yeManyano ye-Afrika ngowama-.

src_text: Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa nḓila yo leluwaho ya khumbulelo ine ya vha na vhupulani ha tshifhinga tshilapfu ya kha tsha vhukati na ha tshifhinga tshipfufhi kha mihasho ḓo dovha hafhu wa shuma wo livha kha bveledza maga u shandukisa milayo hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza zwa elana na humbulela kha zwa vhupulani na vhulavhelesi ha muvhuso.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano siseka ngokusesikweni i-AMA yeli lizwekazi.

src_text: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Thendelano ya Thomiwa ha Zhendedzi ḽa zwa Mishonga ḽa Afrika (AMA).
tgt_text: I-arhente iza kulawula amayeza onyango, kwaye iphucule ukhuseleko kunye nokusebenza kwamayeza onyango kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza sainwa ha Thendelano ya thomiwa ha AMA khathihi na ṋetshedzwa hayo kha Phalamennde uri kone khwaṱhisedzwa.
tgt_text: Ukutyikitya kunye nokuvunywa kungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uzibophelele kwizivumelwano zeli lizwekazi nezehlabathi malunga nokuphucula imithetho yeli lizwekazi elawula iimveliso zalo zempilo..     Ingxelo ngokuSebenza kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu yoPhando noPhuhliso (i-R&D) – yowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu ye-R&D kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo (ngowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/21).

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri thendelano dze dza ṱanganezwa nga Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika nga ṅwaha wa 2019 dzi thome shuma.
tgt_text: Oku kuhambelana necandelo 11D (17) loMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso, wowe-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 wowe-1962), elifuna ukuba ezi ngxelo zandlalwe ePalamente.

src_text: Thendelano idzi ndi dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu mbo ḓi thoma vhumbwa AMA ya dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tshiofisi.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yesibonelelo serhafu ijonge ukukhuthaza iinkampani zabucala ukuba zityale imali kwi-R&D ukuze zikhuthaze ukukhula kotyalo-mali.

src_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo langa zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga khathihi na khwinifhadza tsireledzea na shuma zwavhuḓi ha zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga kha dzhango.
tgt_text: Ivumela ukuqhubela-phambili kwenzululwazi kunye nobuchule bokuyilaobuza kunceda ekukhuleni koqoqosho, kwaye ikhuthaza ukhuphiswano.

src_text: Uhu sainwa na khwaṱhisedzwa ha thendelano idzi hu ḓo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽifhasini na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika ho livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa sisteme ya zwa milayo ya dzhango kha zwibveledzwa zwaḽo zwa mishonga..     Muvhigo nga ha Mashumele Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso na Mveledziso (R&D) – wa 2019/20 na 2020/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba le ngxelo ibonisa ukuba iinkampani ezintsha zifake izicelo zokufumana isibonelelo serhafu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa ngei Phalamenndeni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa miṅwaha mivhili yo fhelaho (2019/20 na 2020/21).
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza iinkampani ezininzi ukuba zifake izicelo zokuxhamla esi sibonelelo njengenxalenye yokukhulisa utyalo-mali lwazo kunye nokukhwezela ukukhula koqoqosho.

src_text: Hezwi zwi khou elana na khethekanyo 11D (17) ya Mulayo wa Muthelo wa Mbuelo, wa 1962 (Mulayo 58 wa 1962), une wa lavhelela uri hu ṋetshedzwe mivhigo iyi ngomu Phalamenndeni.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezine eziphezulu ezithe zasifumana esi sibonelelo serhafu zikwicandelo lokucola iimveliso zolimo; elezokuxhamlisa kwizimbiwa; elezamichiza, elezithambiso, elezamayeza kunye nelezobugcisa bezombane kunye nelezobuchwepheshe bolwazi ethe iKhabhinethi yawamkela njengemacandelo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kwisiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMgaqo-nkqubo wezoShishino.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya magavhelo muthelo ndi ine ya khou lingedza ṱuṱuwedza khamphani dza phuraivethe uri dzi ite zwa vhubindudzi kha R&D hu itela ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya vhubindudzi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa ya zwa saintsi na vhukoni yo livhiswaho kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza mashumele maimo nṱha.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo inokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye noBuchule bokuYila:  www.dst.gov.za..     IQonga loMthetho lokuKhula kunye namaThuba ase-Afrika (i-AGOA) – yowama-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri muvhigo sumbedza uri khamphani ntswa dzo ita khumbelo dza magavhelo muthelo khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza uri khamphani dzi swikele tshikimu itshi nga vhunzhi sa tshipiḓa tsha engedza vhubindudzi nga fhambana hadzo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweQonga le-AGOA ngowama-.
I-AGOA yaphunyezwa yiMelika (i-USA) ngowama-2000 ukuze yenze kube lula kumazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika akumazantsi e-Sahara ukurhweba ne-USA.

src_text: Khamphani nṋa khulwane dze dza swikela aya magavhelo muthelo ndi dzine dza vha kha sekhithara ya dzudzanya zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi; ya shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa migodini; ya dzikhemikhaḽa; ya lunako; ya mishonga na ya shumisa muḓagasi kha zwa thekhinoḽodzhi khathihi na sekhithara dza Thekhinoḽodzhi ya Mafhungo dze khabinethe ya dzi khwaṱhisedza sa dza ndeme kha Pulane ya Shuma ya Mbekanyamaitele ya zwa Nḓowetshumo.
tgt_text: Iimveliso zorhwebo zoMzantsi Afrika ezithunyelwa e-USA phantsi kwe-AGOA ziquka iziqhamo ezityiwayo, amandongomane, izithuthi, iintsimbi zemoto, intsimbi, isinyithi kunye neemveliso zemichiza.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho nga kona swikelwa nga kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhukoni ine ya vha: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramu ya Mulayo wa Nyaluwo na Zwikhala wa Afrika (AGOA) –.
tgt_text: Owona mhla nendawo zisaza kubhengezwa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ḓo farwa ha Foramu ya AGOA nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO) –.

src_text: AGOA yo phasiswa nga shango ḽa Amerika (USA) nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋetshedza tswikelo kha mbambadzo ine wa tou funa nga iwe muṋe kha vhunzhi ha mashango tshipembe ha soga ḽa Sahara khathihi na maraga wa ngomu ha shango ḽa USA.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNgqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-GEO eKapa ngowama-.

src_text: Zwibveledzwa zwa Afrika Tshipembe zwine zwa rengiselwa kha mashango nnḓa nga fhasi ha AGOA ndi zwine zwa katela mitshelo, nḓuhu, dzigoloi, zwipiḓa zwa dzigoloi, tsimbi khathihi na zwibveledzwa zwa khemikhaḽa.
tgt_text: I-GEO liqumrhu eliphakathi koorhulumente elasekwa ngowama-2003 emva kweNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yowama-2002 yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo.

src_text: Datumu ya fhedzisela na fhethu hune foramu ya ḓo farelwa hone kha ḓi ḓo ḓivhadzwa.
tgt_text: Isebenza njengeqonga lamazwe ngamazwe apho amazwe anikela ngokuzithandela kwinjongo enye yokwakha iinkqubo ze-GEO.

src_text: Tshigwada tsha nga ha Vhulavhelesi ha Ḽifhasi (GEO) Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa –.
tgt_text: I-GEO ngoku inoorhulumente bamazwe abangaphezulu kwe-113, abangama-30 kubo bavela e-Afrika kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba emalunga ne-140, kwaye i-11 lale mibutho livela e-Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwauri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa GEO fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Cape Town nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu leKomiti Elawulayo elisebenzayo ukusukela ngowama-2005 kwaye iinzululwazi zethu ngoku zithatha inxaxheba kumaphulo ophando amaninzi akhokelwa yi-GEO.

src_text: GEO ndi tshiimiswa tsha vhukati ha mivhuso tshe tsha vhumbwa nga ṅwaha wa 2003 nga murahu ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu wa ṅwaha wa shuma sa yone nḓila ya masia manzhi ine khayo mashango shela mulenzhe nga tou funa ho livhiwa kha swikela tshipikwa tshithihi tsha bveledza sisteme dza GEO.
tgt_text: Inyanga yezoThutho yeDwarha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: GEO zwazwino na mashango ane vha miraḓo linganaho 113, hune khao 30 ndi fhano Afrika khathihi na madzangano ane khou shela mulenzhe linganaho 140, hune 11 hone bva fhano kha ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusungulwa kwephulo le-OTM ngoMgqibelo, umhla woku-1 kweyeDwarha yowama-2022, phantsi komxholo othi:  “Sishov’ingolovane: sisonke sakha iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho ezakha nezigcina indlela yokuphila”.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ḓi dzulela vha muraḓo wa Khorotshitumbe fhelelaho bva tsha ṅwaha wa 2005 nahone vhorasaintsi vhashu zwazwino vha khou shela mulenzhe kha mishumo minzhi ya zwa ṱhoḓisiso ine ya khou rangwa phanḓa nga GEO.
tgt_text: I-OTM yonyaka isetyenziselwa ukwazisa ngezothutho njengenye yezinto ezibalulekileyo ekukhuleni koqoqosho kunye nophuhliso lweendawo ezihlala uluntu.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendi wa Tshimedzi (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi iza kwenziwa ukubonisa imiba eyahlukeneyo yeziseko zophuhliso lothutho kwezophapho, kwezaselwandle, kwezothutho lukawonke-wonke kunye neendlela.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa OTM nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 1 Tshimedzi 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Sishov’ingolovane fhaṱisana themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ine ya fhaṱa na bveledza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dza tshifhinga tshilapfu”.
tgt_text: Le misebenzi iza kwazisa uluntu malunga nokhuseleko kunye nokhuselo lwezothutho.

src_text: OTM ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumiswa kha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha vhuendi sa tshiṅwe tsha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme tsha nyaluwo ya ikonomi na mveledziso ya fhethu.
tgt_text: Iindibano zokubonisana namahlakani abachaphazelekayo nazo ziza kubanjwa ukuze kuxoxwe ngemiceli-mngeni eyahlukeneyo kwicandelo lezothutho.

src_text: Hu ḓo vha na mishumo minzhi ine ya ḓo itwa itela ṱana zwithu zwo fhambanaho zwa themamveledziso ya vhuendi, zwa kha vhuendi ha muyani, ha lwanzheni, vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi na dzibada.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazibophelele ekuphuculeni iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho zeli lizwe, kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kunye nasezidolophini, ukuze kube lula ukuthuthwa kweempahla kunye nabantu ngendlela esebenzayo nenempumelelo..     Intlanganiso yeZizwe Ezimanyeneyo (i-UN) neNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Mishumo iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṋea tsivhudzo nga ha tsireledzo na vhutsireledzi ha zwishumiswa zwa vhuendi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kwentlanganiso yamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eRhawutini ngomhla we-16 nowe-17 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Nyambedzano na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho na dzone dzi ḓo vha hone itela davhidzana nga ha khaedu dzo fhambanaho dzine dza vha hone kha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendi.

Muvhuso kha ḓi vha wo ḓiimisela khwinifhadza themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ya shango ḽashu, kha vhupo hoṱhe, ha mahayani na ha dziḓoroboni itela uri hu kone vha na enda ha vhathu na thundu nga nḓila yo leluwaho.
tgt_text: ISebe lezokuHlaliswa koLuntu liza kuququzelela le ntlanganiso yeentsuku ezimbini eza kuzinyaswa ziintshatsheli zezopolitiko, iingcali kunye nabaphandi, kuquka namalungu abalulekileyo eKomiti yaBammeli abasiSigxina be-UN-HABITAT ezinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.

Imiba engundoqo eza kuxoxwa iza kuquka ukufuna amanyathelo okungenelela aza kuza notshintsho kwiindawo zoogob’ityholo kunye nakumatyotyombe..     Iziphumo zezi ngxoxo ziza kufikelela kuvuthondaba ngokusungulwa kweSicwangciso-nkqubo seSicwangciso sokuSebenza seHlabathi, esiza kuthiwa thaca kwiNdibano ye-UN-HABITAT ukuze sivunywe ngowama-     Imithetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Muṱangano wa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu (UN-HABITAT) ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN).
tgt_text: Umthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe loBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) wowama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe le-GBVF wowama-2021 ePalamente ukuze uqwalaselwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa farwa ha muṱangano wa miraḓo ya UN-HABITAT fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 16 na 17 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo unika ingcaciso ngomthetho oza kusetyenziswa xa kusekwa iqumrhu elimiselwe ngokomthetho eliza kungqala ngqo kule ngxaki ye-GBVF..     Ukwakhululela ukuba kusekwe iBhodi yeli Bhunga eza kukhokela ize ibeke iliso kumalinge okuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe se-GBVF, esavunywa yiKhabhinethi kweyeDwarha yowama-2020 ukuba masiqalise ukusebenza.
Le bhodi iza kuba namalungu angama-51% avela kwimibutho yoluntu aze wona angama-49% aphume kurhulumente.

src_text: Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo tshimbidza hoyu muṱangano wa maḓuvha mavhili une wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga mazhakanḓila zwa polotiki, vhaḓivhi na vhaṱoḓisisi, hu tshi katelwa na miraḓo mihulwane ya Komiti ya Vhaimeleli vha Tshoṱhe vha tshiimiswa tsha UN-HABITAT tshine tsha vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Nairobi, kha ḽa Kenya.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo sele ugwadliwe kwiindibano zovakaliso-zimvo zoluntu...     Umthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-.

src_text: Mafhungo ndeme ane ḓo ambiwa nga hao ḓo katela wana maga tshandukiso ya vhudzulo ha mikhukhuni na mishasha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-2018 ePalamente, ojonge ukurhoxisa lo Mthetho woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba ukhoyo, wowe-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 wowe-1993), njengoko ulungisiwe.

Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwajonge ukuqinisa amanyathelo elizwe amalunga nezempilo yoluntu aze enziwe ukuba  ahambelane nesiVumelwano soMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi seSicwangciso-nkqubo soLawulo lweCuba kuLawulo lweCuba.

src_text: Mvelelo dza nyambedzano idzi ndi dzone dzine dza ḓo itisa uri hu vhe na rwelwa ṱari ha Muhanga wa Pulane ya Mashumele ya Ḽifhasi, ine ya ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha muṱangano wa Guvhangano ḽa UN-HABITAT hu tshi itelwa uri dzi khwaṱhisedzwe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuba kubhangiswe tu ukutshaya ngaphakathi kwizakhiwo nakwezinye iindawo ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo;; ukubhangiswa kokuthengiswa kwecuba ngoomatshini bokuthengisa, futhi ukwaphucula neendlela amaqokobhe ecuba enziwa ngayo kunye nemibhalo yokulumkisa ebhalwe kuwo.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu khathihi na Mabulayo Vhathu vha Tshifumakadzi wa Khoro ya Lushaka (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uhliwe amahlongwane wade wacokiswa ngamahlakani achaphazelekayo ahlukeneyo, aquka amashishini ecuba, imibutho yoluntu kunye namasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa GBVF wa Khoro ya Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2021 ngei Phalamenndeni itela uri kone dzudzanywa.
tgt_text: Iseshoni yama-77 yeNdibano Jikelele yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo ya vhumbiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha mulayo hu tshi itelwa maga u dzhenelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa GBVF dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza vhumbiwa ha Bodo ya Khoro ine ya ḓo ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha ndeme khathihi na vhona uri hu khou thoma shumiswa Maga Khwaṱhaho Lushaka u Lwa na Zwiito zwa GBVF a ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uthatha inxaxheba kwi-UNGA77 eqhubeka kundlunkulu we-UN kwisiXeko saseNew York e-USA ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 ukuya kowama-27 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi:  “Ixesha lesiganeko sokuphawula utshintsho olubalulekileyo lwembali:  Ukuvula izisombululo zenguqu kwimiceli-mngeni edibanayo”.

src_text: Bodo ḓo vha na vhuimeleli ha 51% bva kha vhadzulapo ngeno ha 49% vhu tshi ḓo bva kha muvhuso.
tgt_text: Umonakalo owenziwe ngubhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona kuqoqosho nentlalo yamazwe akumazantsi e-Ikweyitha awufani xa uthelekiswa nesantya sokubuyela kwimo yesiqhelo kumazwe atyebileyo asemantla e-Ikhweyitha kwaye ufuna amazwe ehlabathi ukuba abambisane ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba akukho mntu ushiyekelayo..     Ngaphambi kweNgxoxo-mpikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala-Jikelele we-UN, uMnu António Guterres, uza kubiza ingqungquthela "ngoTshintsho lweMfundo" kwaye abambe intlanganiso ekwinqanaba eliphezulu egxile kwiiNjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo (ii-SDGs).

src_text: Mulayotibe wo no ḓi fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na vhadzulapo..     Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Mulayotibe wa Ndangulo ya Sisteme dza Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Intlanganiso yee-SDGs kulindeleke ukuba iphonononge iindlela zokubuyela kula moya wodlamko wangaphambili kunye nokukhawulezisa ukuphunyezwa kwazo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Ndangulo ya Sisteme ya Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa 2018 kha Phalamennde, une wa vha wone une wa khou ḓo phumula Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola, wa 1993 (Mulayo 83 wa 1993) une wa vha hone zwazwino ya nga he wa khwinifhadzwa ngaho.
tgt_text: Usuku lwezaMasiko.

src_text: Mulayotibe khou dovha hafhu wa ṱoḓa khwaṱhisa maga zwa mutakalo wa tshitshavha shango khathihi na ita uri elane na Thendelano dza Muhanga wa Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi kha zwa Ndangulo ya Mafola.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kuba sisithethi sembeko kwimibhiyozo yoSuku lwezaMasiko yeSizwe ngowama-2022 kwiZakhiwo zoMdibaniso ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-24 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mulayotibe uyu wa khou dzinginya zwone, ndi vhupo ha nga nnḓa kana ha nga ngomu ha zwifhaṱo vhune khaho ha sa tendelwe zwa daha mafola nga nḓila yo fhelelaho;  nyiledzo kha zwa rengiswa ha sigareṱe hu tshi shumiswa mitshini ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho sigareṱe dzenedzo khathihi na khwaṱhisa zwa tswayo dza tsivhudzo kha phakhethe dza sigareṱe.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa phantsi komxholo othi:  “UkuBhiyozela imiSebenzi kaSolomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”..     Inyanga yaMasiko kulo nyaka igxile kumculo wemveli woMzantsi Afrika ize igxininisa kakhulu kumculo weSsicathamiya kunye negalelo lawo elikhulu kwimidlalo yethu, ubugcisa, inkcubeko kunye namasiko.

src_text: Mulayotibe wo pfukha nga fhasi ha maitele khwaṱhaho zwa vhukwamani na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho, hu tshi katelwa na vha nḓowetshumo ya mafola, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na mihasho ya muvhuso kwameaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Lo mxholo unika imbeko kwisikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-60 yokusweleka kwemvumi, umculi kunye nomqambi wengoma, uSolomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), nowaziwa njengoSolomon Ntsele, nowaziwa kakhulu njengomqambi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.

src_text: Dzulo ḽa vhu77 ḽa Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UNGA77).
tgt_text: UMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi wowama-2022 .

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha dzulo ḽa UNGA77 ḽine ḽa khou farelwa fhaḽa musanda wa UN une wa vha Ḓoroboni ya New York kha ḽa Amerika bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 27 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Tshikhala tsha ndeme vulela thandululo dza ḓisa tshanduko dza valela khaedu”.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha uMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi ngowama-2022 e-Durban ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Kha sia ḽa Tshipembe ha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe, masiandaitwa kha zwa ikonomi na kha ikonomi na matshilisano ḓiswaho nga Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) ḓi wanala sa lingani musi ho sedzwa luvhilo lwa mbuedzedzo musi tshi vhambedzwa na re kha sia ḽo bvelelaho ḽa Devhula nahone hezwi zwi ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na farisana vhukati ha tshaka dzoṱhe itela uri hu si vhe na ane salela murahu.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa ngexesha le-OTM, nayo eza kuba yinxalenye yokufundisa ngecandelo lethu lezaselwandle.
Lo msitho uza kuzinyaswa ngabathunywa abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo abazakuzibonela ngokwabo icandelo lezaselwandle loMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Phanḓa ha Nyambedzano dza Nnyi na Nnyi dza UN, Muṅwaleli Muhulwane wa UN, Vho António Guterres, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa nga ha “Tshandukiso ya Pfunzo” nahone vha ḓo dovha vha tshimbidza muṱangano wa vhurumelwa ha maimo nṱha une wa ḓo vha wo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu (SDGs).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu loMbutho waMazwe ngaMazwe waseLwandle ukusukela ngowe-1995, oyi-arhente ekhethekileyo ye-UN enoxanduva lokulawula uthutho lweenqanawa.

src_text: Hoyu muṱangano wa SDG khou lavhelelwa uri ḓo sedzesa kha zwa wana hafhu nḓila dza vhuisa nungo khathihi na engedza luvhilo lwa ita uri tshanduko idzi dza pfunzo dzi thome shumiswa.

tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa.
tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho kulo nyaka ibhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo woSuku loKhenketho lweHlabathi (ngomhla wama-27 kweyoMsintsi) othi “Ukucinga ngokutsha uKhenketho”.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tshavho tshihulwane kha vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa ḽa Lushaka ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 fhaḽa Union Buildings nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 24 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: Ukhenketho lwasekhaya lubalulekile ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezokhenketho, elinegalelo elikhulu kwi-GDP yoMzantsi Afrika nakumalinge okudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Vhuṱambo vhu ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U pembelela Vhufa ha Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika Wapo wa Afrika Tshipembe”..     Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa wa uno ṅwaha wo sedzesa kha muzika wapo wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe, nga maanḓa ho lavheleseswa kha muzika wa Isicathamiya khathihi na nḓila ye wa shela ngayo mulenzhe kha mitambo yashu, vhutsila, mvelele na vhufa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba icandelo lokwamkela iindwendwe libone ukunyuka kwenani labantu abangabatyeleli emva kwexesha le-COVID-.

src_text: Thero iyi fhululedza miṅwaha ya 60 nga murahu ha lovha ha ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa muzika Vho Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), vhe vha vha vha tshi ḓivhiwa hafhu sa Vho Solomon Ntsele, vhane vha ḓivhea vhukuma sa ene muṅwali wa luimbo lu no pfi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bazizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha wa 2022  .
tgt_text: 2 bathathe uhambo apha ngaphakathi elizweni kwisiqingatha sokuqala sowama-2022 babonakalisa ukuba inani labantu abathatha uhambo linyuke nge-114% xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou fara Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban bva nga ḽa 12 swika 14 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Oku kubonise ukunyuka kakhulu kwenani labantu abathatha uhambo xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-2019, apho ibingabantu abazizigidi eziyi-8,6 abathe bathatha uhamba apha ekhaya.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo farwa nga tshifhinga tsha OTM, ine na yone ya ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha sekhithara ya zwa lwanzheni.
tgt_text: Njengenxalenye yokubhiyozela iNyanga yoKhenketho, iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemmi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba bathabathe inxaxheba kwiphulo lokhenketho olubizwa nge-‘Shotleft’ batyelele amaphondo ethu ohlukeneyo.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo kuvhanganya vhurumelwa bva kha mashango fhambanaho vhane vha ḓo vha na tshikhala tsha kona vhona nḓowetshumo ya zwa lwanzheni ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo se-Air Belgium sokuba neenqwelo-moya  ngamaxesha athile onyaka eziza kuza eMzantsi Afrika, ukusukela kule nyanga (kweyoMsintsi), nto leyo eza kuphucula ukhenketho kwaye iqinise ngakumbi iwonga lethu njengendawo yokhenketho ethandwayo ngabakhenkethio.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi bva tsha ṅwaha wa 1995, ḽine ḽa vha zhendedzi ḽo khetheaho ḽa UN ḽine mushumo waḽo wa vha langa matshimbilele zwikepe.
tgt_text: I-Air Belgium iza kuba neenqwelo-moya zeveki eziya eKapa naseRhawutini     Imiyalezo.

Amazwi okuvuyisana     Ikhabhinethi ithumela amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle: kuMongameli William Samoei Ruto weRiphabliki yaseKenya, othe wabekwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesibini, umhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, emva konyulo lukazwelonke olunoxolo obelubanjwe ngomhla we-9 kweyeThupha ngowama-.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango.
tgt_text: Usekela-Mongameli u-David Mabuza ubezimase lo msitho wokubekwa ngokusesikweni egameni likaMongameli Ramaphosa, kunye norhulumente kunye nabantu beRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango wa uno ṅwaha khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Vhuendelamashango ḽa Ḽifhasi (27 Khubvumedzi) ine ya ri “U humbula hafhu zwa Vhuendelamashango nga huswa”.
tgt_text: kuMbutho woMbhoxo waseMzantsi Afrika kunye neSixeko saseKapa ngokusingatha ngempumelelo itumente yesibhozo yeNdebe yeHlabathi yoMbhoxo ye-Sevens phakathi komhla we-9 kunye nowe-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Vhuendelamashango ha fhano hayani ndi ha ndeme kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendelamashango ine ya shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha GDP ya Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na sika mishumo.
tgt_text: Oku ibikokokuqala ukuba lo mnyhadala ubalulekileyo usingathwe lilizwe lase-Afrika kwaye amawaka amaninzi abalandeli abebezimasile bayoliswa ngetheko lombhoxo kunye nobubele odume ngabo uMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri sekhithara ya zwa vhuḓimvumvusi yo rekhoda nyaluwo kha tshivhalo tsha vhaeni kha tshifhinga tsha nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.
tgt_text: Amazwi ovelwano      IKhabhinethi ivakalisa amazwi ovelwano kusapho nakubahlobo: babantwana besikolo abali-18 kunye nabantu abadala ababini abasweleke kwingozi emanyukunyezi e-Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesihlanu, ngomhla we-16 kweyoMsintsi yowama-2022 emva kokuba ilori esisigadla esinamatroko ithe yangqubana okweenkunzi zegusha kunye neveni ebithwele abafundi     Izikhundla.

src_text: Nyendo dza ngomu shangoni dzi linganaho.
tgt_text: Zonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala emfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuseleko     UMnu Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale njengoMlawuli-Jikelele (i-DG):  UMkomishinala weSizwe weSebe leeNkonzo zoLuleko     UGq Malixole Percival Mahlati njengeSekela lika-DG: Iinkonzo zeMpilo zeziBhedlele zaMaziko eMfundo Ephakamileyo kunye noPhuhliso lwezaBasebenzi kwiSebe lezeMpilo     UMnu Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki njengoNocanda-Jikelele oyiNtloko kwiSebe lezoLimo, uBuyekezo loMhlaba noPhuhliso lwasemaPhandleni     UMnu Phaswa Phineas Mamogale njengeGosa eliyiNtloko lezeziMali kwiSebe lezeMpilo..     IKhabhinethi ivume ukuqeshwa kwaba balandelayo     UMnu Tshediso Matona njengoMkomishinala weKomishoni yokuXhotyiswa kwabaMnyama ngokuBanzi kwezoQoqosho     Amalungu eSigqeba seziBheno seBhodi yeFilimu noPapasho:  UMnu Siyazi Tyamtyam (uSihlalo); UNksz Sohani Natasha Chundhur;UNksz Sisanda Nkoala;UNks Shandukani Mulaudzi;UNks Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;UGq Litheko Modisane;UMnu Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;UMnu James Shikwambana; kunyenoNksz Manko Thalitha Bufffel (uqeshiwe kwakhona).

src_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi.
tgt_text: Ugcino lwamanzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe kha tevhedza havho nyiledzo dza kushumisele kwa maḓi dze dza vha hone kha vhuṅwe vhupo ha ḓorobo ya Johannesburg, Tshwane na Ekurhuleni itela dzikisa tshikalo tsha maḓi madamuni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuthobela izithintelo zokusebenzisa amanzi eziphunyezwe kwiindawo ezithile zaseRhawutini, eTshwane nase-Ekurhuleni ngeenzame zokuzinzisa umthamo omumethwe ngoovimba bamanzi.

src_text: Madamu na fhethu ha vhulungela hone maḓi zwi kha ḓi vha fhasi ha mutsiko nga mulandu wa thempheretsha dzi re nṱhesa kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng ngeno ṱhoḓea ya maḓi ine ya khou dzulela engedzea yo kombetshedza uri vha ha Rand Water vha fhungudze vhukuma nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha mimasipala.
tgt_text: Amadama kunye noovimba banomthamo ongaphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yobushushu obukwiqondo eliphezulu e-Gauteng, kwaye ukwanda kwemfuneko yamanzi kunyanzelise i-Rand Water ukuba icuthe ngesaquphe unikezelo lwamanzi kwaba masipala.

src_text: Itshi tshiimiswa tsha zwa maḓi tshi ṋetshedza vhunzhi ha maḓi kunaho kha vhathu vha fhiraho 11 miḽioni vhane vha vha vhadzulapo vha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, zwipiḓa zwa vunḓu ḽa Mpumalanga, Free State na ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lamanzi libonelela ngobuninzi bamanzi aselwayo kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, kwiindawo zaseMpumalanga, eFreystata naseMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Hedzi nyiledzo dze dza vha dzi sa tinyei, dzo livhiswa kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo yavhuḓi ya maḓi nahone dzi ḓo bvela phanḓa vhuya swikela tshiimo tshi tshi khwinifhadzea.
tgt_text: Ezi zithintelo esingakwaziyo ukuzibaleka zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba siyaqhubeka nokuphaka amanzi ngendlela ezinzileyo, kwaye zisezakuhlala zikhona de imeko ibe bhetele.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha bvele phanḓa na tevhedza nyiledzo dza maḓi khathihi na shela mulenzhe nga shumisa hetshi tshiko tshi konḓaho wanala ngaurali nga nḓila yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba luqhubeleke luyithobela imiqathango yothintelo lwamanzi kwaye ludlale indima yalo ngokusebenzisa ngokonga amanzi kuba abaluleke kakhulu futhi anqongophele..   Ugwayimbo lakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Tshiṱereke tsha fhaḽa Transnet.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isivumelwano semivuzo yeminyaka emithathu ekufikelelwe kuso phakathi kuka-Transnet nombutho wabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esi sivumelwano sizosebenza ukusuka kumhla woku-1 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 ukuya kowama-31 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelano ya zwa miholo ya miṅwaha miraru ye ya swikelwa vhukati ha vha ha Transnet na vha Mbumbano ya Vhuthihi ha zwa Vhuendi ya Lushaka (UNTU), ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽa vhashumi, ine thendelano yeneyo ya ḓo thoma shuma vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai 2022 swika ḽa 31 Ṱhafamuhwe.
tgt_text: IKomishini yoXolelwaniso, kunye noLamlo ingenelele ngokulamla esi sivumelwano esenze ukuba luphele ngoko nangoko ugwayimbo obeluqhutywa ngamalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Vha Khomishini ya Vhupfumedzani, Vhuṋenḓila na Vhulamukanyi ndi vhone vho swikelaho vhupfumedzani ha miholo iyi, zwe zwa fhedza nga fhelisa tshiṱereke tshine tsha vha hone zwazwino tsha miraḓo ya UNTU nga ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo sombutho i-South African and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokurhoxisa olu gwayimbo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi vha zwa Vhuendi na Sekhithara dzi Elanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SATAWU) ya fhelisa tshiṱereke.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuzibophelela kuka-Transnet ekubeni agxininise ekugqibeni umsebenzi osemva okuwo wonke amazibuko noololiwe obangelwe lolu gwayimbo, oluchaphazele uqoqosho kunye namacandelo axhomekeke kwiinkonzo zale arhente.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha Transnet ha sedzesa kha fhungudza mishumo yo salelaho murahu ye ya vha hone kha sisteme yoṱhe ya vhuimangalavha na zwiporo nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha tshiṱereke tshe tsha kwama ikonomi khathihi na dziṅwe sekhithara dzine dzo ḓitika kha tshumelo yayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi..   Khabinethe yo livhuwa thikhedzo na tshumisano ye ya ṋetshedzwa nga vha mabindu nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tsha tshiṱereke.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise umbulelo wayo kwinkxaso nentsebenziswano ebisuka kwabezoshishino ngethuba logwayimbo.

src_text: Yo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa vhukati ha vha ndangulo ya Transnet na madzangano vhashumi vhune ha ḓo vhuedza khamphani yeneyi ya Transnet khathihi na ikonomi ya shango.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwane obukhona phakathi kwabalawuli bakwa-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuxhamle inkampani noqoqosho lwelizwe.

src_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo u Shuma a tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ngei kha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia nga ḽa 15 na ḽa 16 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa e-Kingdom of  Saudi Arabia olubeyimpumelelo, lwangomhla we-15 nowe-16 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo aya, mashango aya vhuvhili hao saina Memorandamu dza Thendelano (MoUs) ya 17 kha masia fhambanaho fanaho na zwa vhulimi, vhufuwakhovhe, migodi, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho, vhutsireledzi, vhuendi na vhufuwivhulimi ha zwifuwo na zwimela zwa maḓini.
tgt_text: Kolu tyelelo, la mazwe mabini atyikitye iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ii-MoU) ezili-17 kumacandelo ohlukeneyo afana nezolimo, ezokuloba, ezemigodi, amandla ombane ohlaziyekayo, ukhuseleko, ezothutho kunye nezolimo lwasemanzini.

src_text: Dziṅwe MoU dze dza sainwa ndi dza thomiwa ha Khoro ya zwa Mabindu yo Ṱanganelaho, tshumisano kha sia ḽa nḓowetshumo dza zwa mmbi na zwa renga thundu na tshumelo khathihi na tshumisano kha sia ḽa ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa tshivhumbeo tsha shango.
tgt_text: Ezinye ii-MoU ezityikityiweyo zisekusekweni kweBhunga lezoShishino eliDityanelweyo, intsebenziswano kushishino lomkhosi nokuthengwa kwempahla, kunye nentsebenziswano kuphando lwejiyoloji.

src_text: Phresidennde vho shumisa madalo avho kha ramba vhoramabindu vha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia uri vha dzhenele muṱangano wa zwa vhubindudzi wa vhuṱanu wa shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe une wa ḓo farwa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise olu tyelelo ukumema amashishini ase-Saudi Arabia kwinkomfa yesihlanu yotyalo-mali eMzantsi Afrika eza kubanjwa ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Shango ḽa Saudi Arabia ndi muvhambadzelani na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa vhuvhili nga vhuhulwane kha mashango oṱhe Vhubvaḓuvhakati ḽa dovha hafhu ḽa vha ḽone tshiko tshihulwanesa tsha thundu dzi ṱunḓwaho kha dzingu ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe elikwindawo yesibini ngokomthamo  wezorhwebo kumazwe arhweba noMzantsi Afrika kummandla woMbindi Mpuma, kwaye eli lizwe lingowona mthombo mkhulu wezinto ezithengwayo ezingena eMzantsi Afrika ezivela kulo mmandla.

src_text: Vhushaka ha dzitshaka vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ho itisa uri hu vhe na masiandaitwa avhuḓi kha maitele zwa mbambadzo na vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwala mazwe omabini bunesiqhamo esihle kurhwebo notyalo-mali.
Utyalo-mali kwiziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Vhubindudzi kha zwa themamveledziso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqaliswa kwamalungiselelo okwakha iziko elikumgangatho ophezulu lokuvelisa iiplastiki yinkampani ephambili kwihlabathi, , i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelo ya thomiwa ha ḽimaga ḽa maimo nṱha ḽa bveledza puḽasitiki nga vhamagi vha puḽasitiki vha ḓivheaho ḽifhasini vha ḓivhiwaho sa ALPLA Group, fhaḽa Lanseria kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Oku kongeza ekuzinikeleni kukaMongameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni uphuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo njengendlela yokuvuselela uqoqosho nokwandisa imisebenzi.

src_text: Hezwi zwo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ha vhea zwa mveledziso ya themamveledziso sa tshone tshithu tshi ṱuṱuwedzaho ikonomi khathihi na engedza sikwa ha mishumo..   Uvhu vhubindudzi vhu linganaho US$50 miḽioni vhu ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha pulane khulwane ya Lanseria Smart City ine ya ḓo ita uri zwithu zwi tshimbile nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho hu tshi katelwa na sika mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu Iinganaho.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali oluxabisa ama-50 ezigidi zeedola zaseMelika ligalelo elingundoqo kwisicwangciso esikhulu sedolophu yale mihla, ii-Lanseria Smart City esiceba ukuqhuba uzinzo kunye nohlaziyo lweemveliso kwanokudala nokugcina imisebenzi engama-.

src_text: Nga ngomu henefho ho katelwa na mbekanyamushumo ya vhugudisamishumo kha vhainzhiniere vha zwa thekiniki na lugisa vha linganaho 36 khathihi na vhorathekiniki vha zwa vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho ya mishumo ya vha khamphani ya ALPLA Group mona na mashango tshipembe ha Afrika.
tgt_text: Kukwabandakanywe nenkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kubasebenzi abangama-36 abazakuba ziingcaphephe zokusebenza ngoomatshini neengcali zokuhlaziya iinkunkuma ibeyimveliso entsha kwimisebenzi yeenkampani ye-ALPLA Group kuwo wonke amazwe  akumazantsi e-Afrika.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa vhugudisamushumo ḓo thoma nga ṅwaha wa 2023, hune vhagudi vha mishumo vha thoma vha Afrika Tshipembe vha linganaho 12 vha ḓo vha vha tshi bva kha zwitshavha zwapo..   Zwa migodi siho mulayoni.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi iza kuqalisa ngonyaka wama-2023, abafundi bokuqala abali-12 baseMzantsi Afrika bazakuba bephuma kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni.

src_text: Zwa migodo siho mulayoni zwi vhaisa zwitshavha khathihi na ikonomi, nahone zwi fhedza nga ita uri hu vhe na ndozwo ya mbuelo kha muvhuso khathihi na kha sekhithara ya zwa migodi..   Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa dzhiiwa ha muvhuli wa zwiṱhavhane khathihi na fariwa ha vhahumbulelwa vha swikaho 20 vhane vha ṱumanywa na zwiito zwa bwa migodi zwi siho mulayoni nga tshifhinga tsha fulo ḽe ḽa vha hone kha mulonga wa mugodi wa fhaḽa Stilfontein vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na shumisana na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo itela vhona uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa kha mafulo u lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga ḓaho.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni kulimaza uluntu kunye noqoqosho lwethu, kwaye kukhokelela kwilahleko yengeniso karhulumente nakwicandelo lezemigodi.

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo rumela mulaedza wo khwaṱhaho wa uri vhugevhenga nangoho vhu badeli, khathihi na uri zwigevhenga zwi ḓo farwa nahone zwa dovha zwa sengiswa hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia..   Fulufulu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuthinjwa kwemipu emininzi kunye nokubanjwa kwabarhanelwa abangama-20 aboyamene nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni ngethuba kuqhutywa iphulo lokulwa nolu lwaphulo-mthetho kumgodi wase-Stilfontein eMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Eskom kha ḓi tou bva saina thendelano dza ḽisi ya miṅwaha ya 30 na vhabindudzi vha mveledziso ya muḓagasi vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe vha swikaho vhaṋa dza fhaṱa fhethu huswa ha bveledza fulufulu ḽo kunaho fhaḽa kha tshiṱitshi tsha Majuba na tsha Tutuka tshi re fhaḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeleke nokusebenzisana nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuba nakwilixa elizayo amaphulo okulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho abayimpumelelo.

src_text: Hedzi ḽisi dza mavu dzi ḓo kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha khou humbulelwa ḓo swika henefha kha R40 biḽioni.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuthumela umyalezo ongqongqo wokuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunanzuzo, kwaye izaphuli-mthetho ziza kubanjwa, zitshutshiswe ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukwenzelela.

src_text: Avha vhabindudzi vhaṋa, vhane vha vha vha ha HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group na Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa, vha ḓo engedza 2 000 megawatts kha sisteme ya muḓagasi ya lushaka.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Uvhu vhukoni vhuswa ha bveledza muḓagasi vhu khou lavhelelwa uri vhu ḓo ṱumanywa na sisteme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi kha tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha miṅwedzi ya 24 ya kha ya 36 bva musi ho no tevhedzwa milayo yoṱhe ya zwa thendelano dza zwa masheleni khathihi na dziṅwe thendelano dza zwa milayo ya nga ha mupo, kukhethekanyelwe kwa mavu ya nga kushumisele kwao na miṅwe milayo yo teaho.
tgt_text: Kutshanje u-Eskom utyikitye izivumelwano zengqeshiso yomhlaba zeminyaka engama-30 nabatyali-zimali abane abazimeleyo abavelisa umbane ukuze bakhe amaziko amatsha okuvelisa amandla ombane ococekileyo kwizikhululo zombane zaseMajuba naseTutuka eMpumalanga.
Ezi zivumelwano zokuqeshisa ngomhlaba ziza kutsala utyalo-mali oluqikelelwa malunga nama-40 eebhiliyoni zeerandi.

src_text: Mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: Abatyali-zimali abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Power Renewable Developments South Africa – baza kufaka ubuncinane iimegawathi ezingama-2 000 kwiziko lombane lesizwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Guvhangano ḽa vha ha Agri SA ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 13 na ḽa 14 Tshimedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U lima fhano hayani”.
tgt_text: La maziko matsha okuvelisa umbane kulindeleke ukuba aqhagamshelwe kuthungelwano lombane kwisithuba seenyanga ezingama-24 ukuya kwezingama-36 ukusuka kumhla wokutyikitywa kwezivumelwano zezimali, kodwa ke konke oku kuzakuxhomekeka kumaphepha-mvume endalo, okucandwa komhlaba kunye neminye imithetho enxulumene nolawulo lomhlaba.

src_text: Guvhangano iḽi ḽo amba nga ha mafhungo fanaho na ita uri pulane khulwane dza zwa vhulimi dzi thome shumela vhalimi vha fhano hayani; themamveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa zwiḽiwa zwo liṅwaho fhano hayani ita uri vhupo honoho ha fhethu afho vhu tsireledzee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa yapo yo livhaho kha vhumatshelo khathihi na khwaṱhisa vhukoni ha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa ha shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwo ṱavhiwaho fhano hayani..   Sa nḓila ya dovha hafhu dzhiela nṱha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa, Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Senthara ya Mveledziso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Lushaka nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha Tshandukiso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Muhasho wa Saentsi na Tshandukiso vha tshi shumisana na vha Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: Ukufumaneka kokutya.

src_text: Senthara iyi ḓo tikedza zwa thivhelwa fhungudzwa na ndangulo ya malwadze zwiliṅwa na zwifuwo, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shela mulenzhe kha engedzea ha mveledziso, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa khathihi na mveledziso ya vhupo ha mahayani ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kweNkongolo ye-Agri SA yowama-2022 ePitoli ngomhla we-13 nowe-14 kweyeDwarha 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Silima Ukutya ekuHlaleni”.

src_text: Tsaino ya Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ya Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Le nkongolo ibishukuxa imiba efana nokwenza izicwangciso eziphambili kwezolimo zisebenzele abalimi basekuhlaleni; iziseko zophuhliso ezizinzileyo zokutya okulinywa ekuhlaleni; ukwenza imo yendalo nokusingqongileyo kwendawo kukwazi ukugcina imveliso yokutya okuveliswa ekuhlaleni nakwixesha elizayo, kunye nokomeleza amandla abavelisi bokutya ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nemveliso elinywe ekuhlaleni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa kha Phaḽamennde ha Thendelanomviswa ya AU ya nga ha Milayo na Maitele Phaḓaladzo, Muvhuso Wapo na Mveledziso Yapo uri sainiwe.
tgt_text: Ekubekeni phambili ukufumaneka kokutya, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweziko lesizwe lezoKhuseleko lwendalo i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphantsi kwenkqubo ye-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuyinkqubo yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye nokuSungulwa Kwezinto eyenziwe ngentsebenziswano neYunivesithi yasePitoli.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina iyi thendelanomviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Eli ziko liza kuxhasa uthintelo, ukuncitshiswa kunye nolawulo lwezifo zezityalo nezilwanyana, nto leyo eza kuba negalelo elihle ekwandeni kwemveliso, ukufumaneka kokutya kunye nophuhliso oluzinzileyo lwasemaphandleni   Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.
Ukuqinisekiswa koMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya weManyano ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ṋetshedza muhanga kha mashango oṱhe ane vha miraḓo une wa vha ḽiṅwalo ḽi sumbedzaho nḓila nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na mishumo bva kha mivhuso ya vhukati ya kha maṅwe masia muvhuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMqulu we-AU oqulathe iMithetho-siseko yokuNatyiswa Kwamagunya, uLawulo lweeNgingqi kunye noPhuhliso lwaseKhaya.

src_text: Iyi Thendelanomviswa ambesa nga maanḓa nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na vhuḓifhinduleli, muhanga wa mavhusele apo khathihi na mveledziso yapo..   Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa Khoro ya zwa Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ya Dzitshaka (IRSC) wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika utyikitye lo mqulu kweyeThupha kowama-..   UMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya ubonelela ngoxwebhu olusisikhokelo kuwo onke amazwe angamalungu e-AU, esi sikhokelo simalunga nokunatyiswa kwamagunya nemisebenzi yabasemagunyeni ukusuka kuzwelonke ukuya nakwamanye amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa IRSC wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 1 swika ḽa 6 Tshimedzi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U fhaṱa hafhu zwiporo nga huswa kha Ḽifhasi ḽi sa fulufhedzisi”.
tgt_text: Lo mqulu ujongene kakhulu nokwaba amagunya nemisebenzi, isikhokelo solawulo lwengingqi kunye nophuhliso lwengingqi.

src_text: IRSC ndi muṱangano wa dzitshaka une wa kuvhanganya vhaḓivhi vha zwa vhutsireledzi ha zwiporo bva kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe uri vha kovhane nḓivho hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza vhutsireledzi kha zwiporo..   Sa muraḓo wa IRSC, vha Vhulangi ha Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ha Afrika Tshipembe vho fara muṱangano uyu lwa fhedzisela nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IBhunga  Lentlanganiso Yamazwe Ngamazwe yoKhuseleko kumzila kaloliwe ebanjwa rhoqo ngoNyaka yama-32  (i-IRSC).

src_text: Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Mvetamveto ya Pulane ya Themamveledziso ya Lushaka ya 2050 (NIP 2050).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweNtlanganiso ebanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka ye-IRSC yama-32 ezakubanjwa eRhawutini ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeDwarha 2023 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukubunjwa ngokutsha koololiwe kwiHlabathi elingenakuqinisekiswa”.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ganḓiswa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Luṱa lwa 2 lwa NIP 2050 hu tshi itelwa zwa vhukwamani na miraḓo ya tshitshavha.
tgt_text: I-IRSC liqonga lamazwe ngamazwe elidibanisa iingcali zokhuseleko koololiwe ezivela kwihlabathi liphela ukuze zitshintshiselane ngamava ngeenjongo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lukaloliwe.

src_text: Pulane iyi sumbedzisa nḓila kha zwa khwaṱhiswa na engedzwa ha thandela dza muvhuso dzo ṱanganelaho nahone dza ndeme..   Lu dovha hafhu lwa ṱalusa thandela dza ndeme dza zwa vhudzulo ha vhathu; muḓagasi wa ha masipala; maḓi; mathukhwi omaho; vhuendi ha hwala vhaṋameli; themamveledziso ya pfunzo na mutakalo; themamveledziso ya didzhithala, vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli woKhuseleko kuLoliwe waseMzantsi Afrika ugqibele ukusingatha le ndibano ngo-.

src_text: Tshivhumbeo tsha pulane tshi ṋetshedza bono ḽa masia ane khou tea lavheleswa khao, tsha dovha hafhu tsha ṋetshedza tsenguluso ya tshiimo tsha zwino, tsha bvisela khagala nyimele dza ndeme dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu vhe na shuma zwavhuḓi khathihi na sumbedzisa zwine zwa tea itwa itela swikela bono ḽeneḽo.
tgt_text: UYilo lwesiCwangciso seSizwe seZiseko zoPhuhliso sowama-2050 (i-NIP 2050) iSigaba sesi-.

src_text: Tshi dovha hafhu tsha dzinginya maitele u thoma shumiswa ha pulane iyi ane ḓo itwa nga vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru ya pulane ya kushumele..   Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo lwe-NIP 2050 iSigaba sesi-2  kwiphephandaba likarhulumente ukuze nalo uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa thoma shuma ha Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso sinika umkhombandlela ekomelezeni nasekwandiseni iiprojekthi ezihlangeneyo zeqhinga likarhulumente.

src_text: Muhanga uyu wo anḓadzwa hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Ichonga iiprojekthi ezicwangcisiweyo zokuhlaliswa koluntu; umbane kamasipala; amanzi; inkunkuma nelindle; izithuthi zabakhweli; iziseko zamaziko emfundo nezempilo; iziseko ezingundoqo zobuchwephesha, ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

Ubume besicwangciso bucacisa ngombono wenkalo ekufuneka kujongwane nayo, bunikezela ngovavanyo lwemeko yangoku, buchaza iimeko eziyimfuneko ukuze kubekho impumelelo kwaye buchaza ekufuneka kwenziwe ukufezekisa umbono lowo.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza thikho ṱhanu dza nga ha maga u ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: INkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Thikho idzi dzi katela maitele ane vha u ranga musi hu tshi ṱoḓa kungwa vhashumi khathihi na u nanga vhashumi vho teaho henefho kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso pfumbudzwa na ṱanganyiswa na vhaṅwe vhashumi; ndangulo ya vhupulani na mashumele; vhugudi vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa, khathihi na mveledziso ya mishumogudwa hu tshi katelwa aluwa kha zwa mishumo khathihi na zwiwo zwa mishumo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo  kaRhulumente.

src_text: Tshanduko kha nyimele dza kutholelwe kwa Vhalangi Vhahulwane (DGs).
tgt_text: Le nkqubo-sikhokelo yapapashwa ngowama-2021 ukuze kuboniswane noluntu..   Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngeentsika ezintlanu ezizama ukungenelela ngoncedo lokwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente ibe nobungcali.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo une wa khou dzinginya maga u khwaṱhisa vhukoni na zwikili zwa dziDG kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Ezi ntsika zibandakanya ukuhlolwa nokuchongwa kwangaphambi kokungena emsebenzini komntu osele ekwiNkonzo kaRhulumente; uqeqesho loqhelaniso nomsebenzi; ucwangciso nolawulo lwentsebenzo; ukuqhubeka nemfundo kunye nophuhliso lobungcali, kunye nenkqubela phambili yekhondo lomsebenzi kunye nokujonga iimeko zamakhondo emisebenzi.

src_text: Muvhigo wo ṋetshedza makumedzwa fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na themo ya shuma ya dziDG khathihi na ndangulo ya vhurumelwa nga vha Khorotshitumbe ya muvhuso kha vhaofisiri vho ṋewaho maanḓa..   Muvhigo uyu dovha hafhu wa dzinginya uri DG Ofisini ya Phresidennde ḓo ḓivhiwa sa Ṱhoho ya Ndangulo ya Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Utshintsho kwiimeko zengqesho kuBalawuli-Jikelele (ii-DG).

src_text: Kha mavunḓu, hoyu mushumo ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha dziDG kha ofisi dza Vhalangavunḓu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele ingxelo ephakamisa amanyathelo okomeleza amandla kunye nokukwazi ukusebenza kwabo bakwisihlalo sika-DG kwiNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Muvhigo wo dovha hafhu wa dzinginya maga u eletshedza mihasho nga ha kulangelwe kwa khonṱhiraka dza dziDG.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yenze izindululo ezininzi, kubandakanywa ixesha lokulawula lee-DG kunye nendlela elandelwa ngayo imiyalelo yamaLungu esiGqeba soLawulo  ngamagosa aphendulayo.

src_text: Sisteme ya Ndangulo ya Mashumele dziDG yo senguluswaho khou dovha ya senguluswa hafhu nga huswa itela uri elane na tshanduko dzo tendelwaho.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwandulule ukuba i-DG kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli yonyulwe njengeNtloko yoLawulo Lwemisebenzi kaRhulumente.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo vho tou Farelaho, Vho Thulas Nxesi, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa vhoramafhungo vhege ḓaho une khawo vha ḓo bvisela khagala Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka wo livhiswaho kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa khathihi na bvisela khagala tshanduko dzo tendelwaho dza nga ha nyimele dza shuma dza dziDG.
tgt_text: Kwinqanaba lamaphondo, lo msebenzi uza kunikwa ii-DG kwii-ofisi zeeNkulumbuso.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vhane vha vha na Vhuholefhali (WPRPD) wa ṅwaha wa 2020-.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iphinde yaphakamisa amanyathelo okukhokela amasebe kulawulo lwezivumelwano zengqesho zee-DG.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD, ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho maswamaswa nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD.
tgt_text: Inkqubo ehlaziyiweyo yoLawulo lweNtsebenzo yee-DG iyahlaziywa ukuze ihambelane nolu tshintsho lwenziweyo.

src_text: Muvhigo katela na vhupfiwa bva kha mihasho ya muvhuso wa lushaka na wa mavunḓu dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala zwiswa nga ha thoma shuma ha mbekanyamaitele ine ya katela mikovho ya migaganyagwama..   Muvhigo wa thoma wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha wo anḓadzwa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa oBambeleyo wezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, kule veki izayo uza kubiza intlanganiso noonondaba ukuze achaze iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhunyezwa kobuNgcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye nokucacisa utshintsho oluvunyiweyo kwiimeko zengqesho yee-DG.

src_text: Muvhigo wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo ṱanganedzwa uri ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nahone wa dovha wa anḓadzwa nga vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali..   Khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha Thendelano dza nga ha fheliswa ha Zwiito zwoṱhe zwa Khethululo Itelwaho Vhafumakadzi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD) yama-2020-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha CEDAW itela uri sainiwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD), ibonelela ngohlaziyo lokuphunyezwa kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsho engedzwaho tsha miṱangano ya komiti ine ya shuma na mivhigo ya mashango ane vha miraḓo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibandakanya amagalelo avela kumasebe kazwelonke nawephondo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina hedzi thendelano nga ṅwaha wa 1993 he ḽa dovha ḽa tendelana nadzo nga ṅwedzi wa Nyendavhusiku.
tgt_text: Ikwanika ingxelo ngomiliselo lomgaqo-nkqubo olubandakanya ulwabiwo lohlahlo-mali.

src_text: Uhu ṋetshedzwa hadzo Phalamenndeni ndi hune ha khou lingedza ṱumanya thendelano dze na dzone ha tendelanwa khadzo tshifhingani tsho fhelaho na khwiniso idzi dza Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha thendelano.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenkqubela-phambili eye inikezwe rhoqo ngonyaka yapapashwa ngowama-.

src_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha .
tgt_text: Le ngxelo yesihlanu yenkqubela-phambili ivunyiwe ukuba ifakwe kwigazethi ize ipapashwe liSebe labaseTyhini, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha itela uri hu vhe na tendelana.
tgt_text: Ukulungiswa kweSiqendu sama-20(1) seSivumelwano sokuPheliswa Kwazo Zonke iiNtlobo zoCalucalulo Olujoliswe kwabaseTyhini (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Musi ho no vha na tendelana khadzo, dzi ḓo rumelwa kha vha Khethekanyo ya zwa Pfunzo, Saintsi na Mvelele ya vha Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) khathihi na ḓo ita uri ngeno hayani dzi shume nga kha Mulayo wa Muhanga wa Ndalukano wa Lushaka, wa ṅwaha wa 2008 (Mulayo 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesilungiso seSiqendu sama-20(1) se-CEDAW ukuze samkelwe yiPalamente.

src_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dzi bveledza milayo ya ḽifhasi ya ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza pfunzo dza nṱha nga nḓila linganaho re khagala nahone si na khethululo.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngexesha elongezelelweyo leentlanganiso zekomiti ejonga iingxelo zamazwe angamalungu.

src_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza tendela hu tshi vha na ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza mashango nnḓa kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN swikaho humiselwa murahu ha khwiniso dza Tsumbamaitele dza Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wasityikitya esi sivumelwano ngowe-1993 waza emva koko wasiphumeza kweyoMnga ngowama-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza nḓivhadzo ye ya ḓo itwa nga Ofisi ya Phresidennde nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 17 Tshimedzi 2022 ya humisela murahu ha khwiniso dze dza itwa kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya dovha hafhu ya ḓivhiwa sa Bugupfarwa ya Dziminisṱa, ya ṅwaha wa..   Khwiniso hedzi dze dza ḓo itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Lambamai 2022 dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha engedza vhaṅwe vhashumi kha dziṅwe dza dziofisi dza Dziminisṱa vhane vha vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha muhasho fhiraho muthihi.
tgt_text: Ukungeniswa kwesi silungiso ePalamente kujonge ukulungelelanisa isivumelwano esamkelwa ngaphambili kunye nolungiso kwiSiqendu sama-20(1) sesivumelwano.

src_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelela uri Muvhuso dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ho fhelelaho ha zwa masheleni ane elana na ṋetshedzwa ha maḓi na muḓagasi kha madzulo tshiofisi ane avho miraḓo ya khabinethe vha dzula khao..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha sa farea zwavhuḓi ha vhadzulapo he ya fhedza nga dzhia tsheo ya dovha shandukisa hafhu iyo Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano seHlabathi sokwaMkelwa kweziQinisekiso zeMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Haya maitele ḓo tshimbidzwa nga tshiimiswa tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe nahone musi tshi tou khunyeledzwa, iyo tsumbamaitele ya hone vho ḓo wanala na kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo ine ya vha: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesiVumelwano seHlabathi soKwamkelwa kweziQinisekiso eziphathelene neMfundo ePhakamileyo ukuze siqinisekiswe yiPalamente.

src_text: Vhushaka ha Shandukela kha Fulufulu ḽi Pfadzaho (JETP) na Pulane ya Vhubindudzi kha JETP (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Sakuba sivunyiwe siza kuthunyelwa kuMbutho wezeMfundo, ezeNzululwazi neNkcubeko weZizwe eziManyeneyo  (i-UNESCO) emva koko unikwe amandla okusebenza ngokoMthetho weli lizwe weNkqubo-sikhokelo kaZwelonke yeziQinisekiso, wowama-2008 (uMthetho wama-67 wama-2008).

src_text: Nga murahu ha ṱanganedza makumedzwa nga ha JETP na JETP-IP, Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza JETP-IP ya dovha hafhu ya sumbedzisa takalela mushumo nga vhuḓalo we wa itwa hu tshi itelwa i bveledza..   JETP-IP bvisela khagala vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea itela swikela vhuḓikumedzeli ha fhelisa zwa muhasaladzo wa khaboni he ha itwa nga Muvhuso wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi tshi khou ṱuṱuwedza mveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vhona uri hu khou vha na tshanduko pfadzaho kha vhashumi na zwitshavha zwi kwameaho.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sehlabathi sisungula imigaqo-jikelele yemfundo enobulungisa, eselubala nengenamkhethe kwiziqinisekiso zemfundo ephakamileyo.
Esi sivumelwano senzelwe ukukwamkelwa kweziqinisekiso zemfundo zamazwe angaphandle kumazwe angamalungu e-UN ali-.

src_text: Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa ya nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima ḓo fara muṱangano na vhoramafhungo hu si kale itela uri ṋetshedze zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo   Milayotibe.
tgt_text: Ukurhoxiswa kwezilungiso kwiSikhokelo saMalungu eSigqeba esiPhezulu.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile isibhengezo esenziwe yi-Ofisi kaMongameli ngoMvulo, umhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2022 sokurhoxisa izihlomelo ezenziwe kwiSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba esiLawulayo, esikwabizwa ngokuba yiNcwadana yabaPhathiswa, yowama-..   Izihlomelo ezenziwe ngenyanga kaTshazimpuzi kowama-2022 ziphakamise ukuba kongezwe inani labasebenzi kwezinye zee-ofisi zabaPhathiswa abaphethe amasebe amaninzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phalamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone davhidzaniwa nga hawo ya phanḓa.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zikwafuna ukuba uRhulumente ahlawule zonke iindleko  ezinxulumene nombane namanzi kwiindawo zikarhulumente ezihlala amalungu esigqeba.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu vusulusa uyo muṅwe Mulayo wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi, wa ṅwaha wa 1951 (Mulayo 57 wa 1951) une wa vha na miṅwaha ya..   Musi wo no phasiswa, Mulayotibe uyu ḓo ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo wa zwikepe zwa vhavhambadzi une wa ḓo shuma kha langa zwa engedza ndeme kha zwikepe ḓo dovha hafhu wa langa zwa olwa redzhisiṱara rinwa madzina na bviswa ha zwikepe nḓilani.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iziqaphele iinkxalabo eziphakanyiswe luluntu yaze yagqiba ekubeni iphonononge iSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba soLawulo.

src_text: Hedzi tshanduko dzi ḓo shela mulenzhe kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya vhuendi ha zwa lwanzheni khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na elana kha kutshimbidzele kwa zwa lwanzheni vhukati ha shango ḽino na Thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo iza kusingathwa liqela elingathathi cala kwaye emva kokuba igqityiwe, esi sikhokelo siza kwenziwa esidlangalaleni ngewebhusayithi yeSebe lezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente kunye noLawulo:  www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi.
tgt_text: Intsebenziswano Kutshintsho Nobulungisa Kwezamandla (i-JETP) kunye neSicwangciso soTyalo-mali lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP).
Emva kokwamkela intetho nge-JETP kunye ne-JETP-IP, iKhabhinethi yamkele i-JETP-IP yaza yavakalisa umbulelo wayo ngomsebenzi oneenkcukacha ezicacileyo owenziweyo wokuyiphuhlisa.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: I-JETP-IP ichaza utyalo-mali olufunekayo ukuze kuphunyezwe izibophelelo zokungangcolisi umoya ezenziwe nguRhulumente waseMzantsi Afrika ngelixa ekhuthaza uphuhliso oluzinzileyo, kunye nokuqinisekisa utshintsho olunobulungisa kubasebenzi kunye noluntu oluchaphazelekayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na davhidzaniwa nga hawo.
tgt_text: Kungekudala Ikomiti yabaPhathiswa ejongene noTshintsho lweMozulu iza kubamba indibano noonondaba ukuze inike iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngale nkqubo   Imithetho Esayilwayo.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso kha Mulayo wa zwa Mbalombalo, wa ṅwaha wa 1999 (Mulayo 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-.

src_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha bveledzwa na thoma shumiswa ha Sisteme ya zwa Mbalombalo ya Lushaka ine ya tikedza tsheo dzo ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi..   Dzi khwaṱhisa tshumisano ine ya vha hone zwazwino vhukati ha vha Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso khathihi na engedza muhanga wa zwa milayo kha Mulayo   Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Mabindu Maṱuku, Maṱukuṱuku na Vhukati (SMME) na Dzikoporasi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho usaYilwayo ungena endaweni yoMthetho wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo ngeeNqanawa wowe-1951 (uMthetho 57 wowe-1951), obusele uneminyaka engama-70 uqhuba..   Wakuba uphunyeziwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kubonelela ngenkqubo-sikhokelo yomthetho wokuthumela intengiso ngeenqanawa ozakulawula ikhonkco lokuthumela iimpahla ngeenqanawa.

src_text: Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vha kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha dziSMME na Dzikoporasi fhaḽa Bryanston, kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 13 swika ḽa 15 Lara..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo kuvhanganya fhethu huthihi vhashumisani kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe na ya muvhuso kha nḓowetshumo ya mabindu maṱuku uri vha ambe nga ha wana nḓila dza shumisana kha khwaṱhisa sekhithara iyi.
tgt_text: Iza kulawula, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuyilwa, ukubhaliswa, ukuthiywa kwamagama kunye nokuchithwa kweenqanawa.

src_text: Zwiimiswa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa shela mulenzhe zwi katela madzangano zwa makwevho, vhashumi vha kha dziSMME, vhoradzipfunzo, vhaiti vha mbekanyamaitele na zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso.
tgt_text: Olu tshintsho luza kuba negalelo ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezothutho lwaselwandle kunye nokulungelelanisa eli lizwe libe kwizinga leZizwe ngeZizwe loMbutho waseLwandle.

src_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha Pulane khulwane ya Lushaka yo Ṱanganelaho ya nga ha Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, ine ya ṋetshedza muhanga wa ndeme wa khwaṱhisa sekhithara ya SMME.

Muṱangano uyu khou dovha hafhu wa lavhelelwa thoma na Pfufho dza Phresidennde dza nga ha dziSMME dza Lushaka dza Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha farwa ha Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMthetho-sihlomelo osaYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha zwiito zwa GBVF wa vhuvhili fhaḽa Gallagher Convention Centre kha ḽa Gauteng nga ḽa 1 na ḽa 2 Lara.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Muṱangano wa thoma we wa farwa nga ṅwaha wa 2018 wo shumiswa kha kumedza hafhu muvhuso na vhashumisani vha zwa matshilisano kha fhelisa zwiwo zwo andesaho zwa khakhathi dzi itelwaho vhafumakadzi kha ḽino shango.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa isihlomelo kuMthetho weeNkcukacha-manani, wowe-1999 (uMthetho wesi-6 wowe-1999).
Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngophuhliso nokusetyenziswa kweNkqubo yeNkcukacha-manani yeSizwe exhasa izigqibo ezisekelwe kwiinkcukacha ezinobungqina.

src_text: Muṱangano wa vhuvhili ḓo shumiswa kha lavhelesa murahu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Ndeme ya Lushaka ya nga ha GBVF ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Vhuḓifhinduleli ṱavhanyedza na ṱavha mukosi ZWINO”..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha maṅwe mafhungo fanaho na wana nḓila dza ita uri zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou tea itwa zwi itwe nga tshihaḓu hu tshi katelwa na vhuḓifhinduleli bva kha mihasho ya ndeme khathihi na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho fana na madzangano zwitshavha, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na madzangano vhashumi.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo ziqinisa ulungelelwaniso olukhoyo phakathi kweziko leeNkcukacha-manani yoMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) kunye namanye amaziko karhulumente, kwaye zandise ubume bolawulo lwalo Mthetho   Imisitho Ezayo.
Ingqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yamaShishini amaNcinci, amaNcinane naPhakathi (ii-SMME) kunye nooKopolotyeni.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Vhuṱanu ngei Northern Cape.
tgt_text: ISebe loPhuhliso lwamaShishini amaNcinci, lisebenzisana namahlakani ecandelo labucala, liza kubamba iNgqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yee-SMME  kunye nooKopolotyeni e-Bryanston, e-Gauteng ukususela ngomhla we-13 ukuya kowe-15 kweyeNkanga..

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki ḽa Vhuṱanu (DDM) ngei Upington, kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape ḓo farwa nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 21 Tshimedzi 2022 fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tshapo tsha Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..    Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha DDM ḓo sengulusa mvelaphanḓa na khaedu kha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo fhaḽa kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape khathihi na dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa dzi tandulula.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kudibanisa ndawonye abathathi-nxaxheba abaphambili becandelo labucala nelikarhulumente kwikhonkco lamashishini amancinci, ukuze baxoxe ngokufumana iindlela zokusebenzisana ekomelezeni eli candelo.

src_text: DDM ḓo vhona uri vhupulani ha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo, zwa thoma shuma na ita mugaganyagwama zwi khou ṱanganyiswa fhethu huthihi itela khwaṱhisa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo kha zwitshavha.
tgt_text: Abathathi-nxaxheba abalindelekileyo baquka amagumbi orhwebo, iingcali ze-SMME, izifundiswa, abenzi bomgaqo-nkqubo kunye namaziko emali yophuhliso.
Le ngqungquthela iza kuxoxa kwakhona ngeSicwangciso esiDityanisiweyo esiPhambili seSizwe soPhuhliso lwamaShishini amaNcinci, esibonelela ngesicwangciso-nkqubo sobuchule sokomeleza icandelo le-SMME.

src_text: Musi tshifhinga tsha Imbizo tshi tshi khou sendela, Dziminisṱa, miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe na vhoṋeḓorobo vha ḓo thoma mafulo u kwamana na zwitshavha mona na vhupo ha Upington..   Tshitatamennde tsha Mbekanyamaitele ya Mugaganyagwama wa Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela kulindeleke ukuba ibamba umsitho wokuqala wokunikezelwa kwamaWonga oNyaka kaMongameli e-SMME eSizwe..   Ukubanjwa kweNgqungquthela kaMongameli yoBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) yama-.

src_text: Khabinethe tenda kha ḽa uri MTBPS ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ine ya khou ḓo ṋetshedzwa nga Minisṱa wa Gwama Vho Enoch Godongwana nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 26 Tshimedzi 2022 ndi tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha maitele u dzudzanya mugaganyagwama nga nḓila re khagala nahone ya vhuḓifhinduleli kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe..   MTBPS ṋetshedza ṱhalutshedzo ya vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha zwa kushumisele kwa masheleni kune shango ḽa nga kona ku swikela dovha hafhu ya bvisela khagala nḓila ine muvhuso wa ḓo vala ngayo tshikhala vhukati ha mbuelo na kushumisele kwa masheleni khathihi na ita zwinzhi hu tshi shumiswa zwiko zwine zwa vha hone zwazwino.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kubamba iNgqungquthela kaMongameli ye-GBVF yesibini kwiZiko leNgqungquthela lase-Gallagher e-Gauteng ngomhla woku-1 nowe-2 kweyeNkanga.

Ingqungquthela yokuqala eyayibanjwe ngowama-2018 yasetyenziselwa ukubophelela ngokutsha urhulumente namahlakani ezentlalo ukuba azibophelele ekupheliseni iziganeko ezikwiqondo eliphezulu zobundlobongela obujoliswe kwabasetyhini kweli lizwe.

src_text: Milingo ya Maṱiriki.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yesibini iza kusetyenziselwa ukujonga inkqubela esele yenziweyo ekuphunyezweni kweSicwangciso-qhinga seSizwe kwi-GBVF.

src_text: Milingo ya Lushaka ya Maṱiriki ya ṅwaha wa 2022 khou ḓo thoma nga ḽa 31 Tshimedzi ya fhela nga ḽa 7 Nyendavhusiku.
tgt_text: Iza kubanjwa phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukuphendula; Ukukhawulezisa kunye noKwandiswa NGOKU”.

src_text: Khabinethe khou tamela mashudu vhagudi vha Kiḽasi ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwenezwo musi vha tshi khou ḓo dzhena kha lwendo lwavho lwa fhedzisela lwa zwa tshikolo.
