tgt_text: Mr Themba Rikhotso as the CEO of the Land and Agricultural Development Bank of South Africa (Land Bank) and Executive Director on the Land Bank Board of Directors.

src_text: Mr Maesela Kekana as Deputy Director-General: Climate Change and Air Quality Management at the Department of Forestry, Fisheries and Environment.Cabinet concurred with the following appointments.
tgt_text: Mr Maesela Kekana as Deputy Director-General: Climate Change and Air Quality Management at the Department of Forestry, Fisheries and Environment.Cabinet concurred with the following appointments.

src_text: Muḓagasi .
tgt_text: Umbane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Kuvhanganya Zwiko (RMF) nga Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi ngomu Ofisini ya Phresidennde, Dokotela Vho Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweNgxowa-mali yokuHlanganisa iziBonelelo (i-RMF) nguMphathiswa wezoMbane kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Tshumisano iyi ya vhukati ha muvhuso na dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha zwa Mabindu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ndi ine yo livhiswa kha lingedza ṋetshedza zwiko na nḓivho itela uri muvhuso kone thoma shumisa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho Pulane ya shuma ya nga ha Fulufulu ye ya ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana 2022 na nga tshifhinga tsha musi vha tshi khou ṋetshedza Mulaedza wavho wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Lushaka  (SoNA) wa ṅwaha wa 2023 sa yone tsumbo ya tshumisano yo khwaṱhaho ya zwa matshilisano khathihi na bvela phanḓa na vha na fulufhelo kha shango ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Le ntsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente ne-Business Unity South Africa ijonge ukubonelela ngezixhobo nobuchule ukuze urhulumente akwazi ukuzalisekisa isiCwangciso sokuSebenza kwezaMandla esabhengezwa nguMongameli uCyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-2022 kunye nakwiNtetho kaMongameli engoBume beSizwe (i-SoNA) yowama-2023 njengomzekelo wentsebenziswano phakathi kwamahlakani ezentlalo kunye nokuthembeka okuqhubekayo kuMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Hetshi tshikwama tsha RMF tshi ḓo thusa vhukuma kha mushumo wa Komiti ya Lushaka ya Thaidzo dza zwa Fulufulu uri kone swikela tshipikwa tshayo tsha fhelisa zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: I-RMF iza kukhulisa umsebenzi weKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla (i-NECC) ukuze ifezekise injongo yayo yokuphelisa ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashelamulenzhe vhoṱhe uri vha shele mulenzhe kha ndingedzo dza thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya shuma ya zwa Fulufulu itela uri ri kone lwa na masiandaitwa vhavhaho ane izwo zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana zwa vha nao kha ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoze bonke abachaphazelekayo ukuba bafake isandla ekuphunyezweni kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza kwezaMandla ukuze kuliwe nomthwalo onzima wengxaki kacimi-cimi wombane kuqoqosho.

IKhabhinethi iqaphele inkxalabo ephakanyiswe kutshanje yi-S&P Global Ratings yokuba ukukhula koqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika kubanjezelwa kukunqongophala kweziseko ezingundoqo, ingakumbi ukunqongophala kombane okumandla.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha vhilahedzwa ha zwenezwino he ha bviselwa khagala nga vha S&P Global Ratings musi vha tshi sumbedzisa uri nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khou livhana na mutsiko une wa khou endelela bva kha vhukonḓi ha zwa thememveledziso, nga maanḓa ṱhahelelo yo kalulaho ya muḓagasi itela tandulula khaedzu iyi, muvhuso wo no mbo ḓi thoma ḓidzhenisa kha maga fhambanaho nahone khwaṱhaho, ane khao ha katelwa fhungudza ṱhahelelo ya masheleni na zwikolodo, tshanduko dza tshihaḓu dza zwa ikonomi khathihi na maga tshihaḓu livhiswaho kha fhungudza zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana kha tshifhinga tshipfufhi khathihi na shandukisa sekhithara nga bveledza tshanduko kha zwa mimaraga itela swikela nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Ukukhawulelana nalo mcelimngeni, urhulumente sele eqalise uthotho lwamanyathelo anzima, aquka ukuqiniswa kwezimali, uhlengahlengiso olukhawulezileyo lwezoqoqosho kunye namanyathelo angxamisekileyo ajolise ekunciphiseni ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane ngoku kunye nokuguqula eli candelo ngokwenza iinguqu kulo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba siza kuba nombane owaneleyo kule minyaka izayo.

IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwesithuba sokufaka izicelo zokuvelisa iibhetri ezinomthamo wokugcina umbane ozimegawathi (MW) ezingama-513  njengenxalenye yokomeleza indlela esisabela ngayo kumngeni wombane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza zwa vulwa ha luṱa lwa dzhenela thengophikhisano ya beṱiri dza vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho dza vhuhulu vhu linganaho 513 megawatts (MW) sa tshipiḓa tsha khwaṱhisa maga ane ra khou dzhia kha tandulula khaedu dza zwa fulufulu.
tgt_text: Umhla wokuvala ukungeniswa kwezicelo ngowe-5 kweyeKhala 2023 ngentsimbi yesi-17:00 kwaye onke amaqela anomdla angayizalisa ifom yobhaliso ekwikhompyutha efumanekayo apha: www.ipp-storage.co.za .

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa vala rumela thengophikhisano idzo ndi ḽa 5 Fulwana 2023 nga awara ya 17:00 nahone zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwine zwa vha na dzangalelo zwi tea ḓadza fomo ya ḓiṅwalisa ya eḽekhiṱhironiki nga inthanethe ine ya wanala kha : www.ipp-storage.co.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo soMphathiswa wezaMahlathi, wezokuLoba nokusiNgqongileyo, uNksz Barbara Creecy, sokuba u-Eskom angaqukwa kwabo baza kulandela inkqubo ende efunekayo yokwenza izilungiso kwi-Atmospheric Emission Licence yakhe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya Minisṱa wa Maḓaka, Vhufuwakhovhe na zwa Mupo, Mufumakadzi Vho Barbara Creecy, ya ṋea vha ha Eskom thendelo ya sa tea tevhedza maitele dzhiaho tshifhinga tshilapfu ane tea tevhelwa musi vha tshi ṱoḓa khwinifhadza Ḽaisentsi yavho ya Muhasaladzo kha Mupo ya nga vha Eskom, thendelo iyi ya ita ngauralo ḓo ita uri vha kone thoma shumisa thandululo dza tshifhinganyana kha tshinyalelo ye ya itea fhaḽa kha Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile nga ṅwedzi wa Lara 2023 lune zwa vho ḓo ita uri tshiṱitshi itshi tsha muḓagasi tshi kone dovha hafhu bvela phanḓa na vhubveledzi hatsho ha muḓagasi  wa 2 100 megawatts (MW) une wa ḓo thusa kha fhungudza thaidzo ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ya zwa khaulwa ha muḓagsi nga sielisana nga nṱha mbili..     Tshiṱereke tsha vha Mbumbano ya Vhashumi ya Lushaka kha zwa Pfunzo, Mutakalo na dziṅwe Sekhithara dzi Elanaho (NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Ngokuka-Eskom, oku kumnceda akwazi ukusebenzisa isisombululo sexeshana kumonakalo okwiSikhululo soMbane iKusile ngeyeNkanga wama-2023 kwaye ngaloo ndlela ivumele isikhululo sombane ukuba siphinde siqalise ukuvelisa umthamo weemegawathi ezingama-2 100 (MW) nto leyo eya kunciphisa ingxaki kacimi-cimi eMzantsi Afrika ngamanqanaba amabini.

src_text: Malugana na tshiṱereke tsha NEHAWU, Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa sainwa ha Thendelano ya Miholo fhaḽa kha Khoro ya Matshimbidzele Nyambedzano dza Miholo ya Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso (PSCBC) nga murahu ha vha na thendelano kha nyambedzano dza miholo ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/23 lwe zwa kona fhelisa tshiṱereke khathihi na dovha hafhu zwa ṱanganya mahoro oṱhe phanḓa ha Khoro ya Nyambedzano hu tshi itelwa dziṅwe nyambedzano ntswa dza zwa miholo dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2023/..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱahisa dzindivhuwo dzayo kha ayo madzangano zwa vhashumi a bvela phanḓa na vha tshipiḓa tsha PSCBC tshi itela bvela phanḓa na nyambedzano.
tgt_text: Ugwayimbo lwe-National Education, Health and Allied Worker’s Union (i-NEHAWU).

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha maitele nyambedzano khathihi na vha na tshumisano na vhashumisani vhoṱhe vho teaho itela vhona uri ndeme ya nyambedzano dzi katelaho khou tsireledzwa khathihi na ṱhonifhiwa.
tgt_text: Kugwayimbo lwe-NEHAWU, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuPheliswa koGwayimbo kwiBhunga loThetha-thethwano loLungelelaniso lweNkonzo kaRhulumente (i-PSCBC) esisombulula iingxoxo zothethathethwano ngemivuzo yowama-2022/23 nokuphelisa ugwayimbo kwakunye nokubuyisela onke amaqela achaphazelekayo kwiBhunga loThetha-thethwano kuxoxwe ngemivuzo yowama-2023/..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yavakalisa umbulelo wayo kwezo manyano zabasebenzi zithe zahlala kwi-PSCBC ukuqhubeka nothethathethwano.

Iphinde yakubethelela ukuzibophelela kukarhulumente kwinkqubo yothethathethwano, nokusebenzisana nawo onke amahlakani afanelekileyo ukuqinisekisa ukubaluleka kokusombulula izinto ngokubonisa ukuhlala kuhlonitshwa.

src_text: Ri tea zwi sumbedzisa uri maitele uri SONGO SHUMAHO, HA NGA WANI MUHOLO ḓo mbo ḓi thoma shumiswa na zwenezwo nahone masheleni ayo ḓo kokodzwa vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miṋa ḓaho sa tshipiḓa tsha Thendelano dza Miholo.
tgt_text: Masikucacise ukuba ABASEBENZI ABEBENGAPHANGELANGA NGETHUBA LOGWAYIMBO ABAZIKUBHATALWA.

src_text: Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Vhulanguli ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo lavhelesa zwa tevhedzwa ha tsheo idzi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: Imali yezi ntsuku bangaziphangelanga iza kuxhuzulwa ngezavenge kwezi nyanga zine zizayo, njengenxalenye yeSivumelwano sokuPheliswa koGwayimbo.
ISebe lezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo liya kubeka esweni ukuphunyezwa ngokupheleleyo kwezi zigqibo.

src_text: Nga nnḓa ha izwo, mazhendedzi zwa mulayo ḓo sala murahu zwiito zwoṱhe zwa vhugevhenga zwe zwa itwa nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu na tshiṱereke ngeno nga thungo vhalangi ya nga fhambana havho vha tshi ḓo sedzesa kha zwiito zwine zwa lwa na Milayo ya Vhuḓifari ha Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Ukongeza, ii-arhente zogcino-mthetho ziza kulandela izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezenziwe ngexesha logwayimbo, ngeli lixa abaphathi abahlukeneyo baya kuhoya izenzo ezaphula uMgaqo wokuZiphatha wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumente.
Uqhankqalazo lukazwelonke.

src_text: Zwiito zwa Migwalabo ya imisa Tshumelo Dzoṱhe kha Shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukuxhalaba ngezimemezo zoqhankqalazo ezicetywayo ngoMvulo, umhla wama-20 kweyoKwindla ngowama-2023 kwaye ithi ukwenza oku kubonakalisa ukungakhathali nokutsalela ecaleni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedzisa kwamea nga khuwelelo dza zwiito zwa gwalaba  zwine zwa khou dzudzanyelwa vha hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 20 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nahone dzhia khuwelelo yo raloho sa zwiito zwa sa londa nahone zwo bvaho..     Vha Tshigwada tsha zwa Vhulamukanyi Thivhela Vhugevhenga na Vhutsireledzi (JCPS) vha khou ḓidzhenisa kha mushumo wa vhona uri hu sa vhe na konḓelelwa ha zwiito zwa nyadza mulayo.
tgt_text: INtlanganisela yezoBulungisa, uThintelo loLwaphulo-mthetho kunye noKhuseleko (i-JCPS) lizixakekise ngomsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunyanyezelwa.

Ezi zikhalazo kutyholwa ngazo zimalunga nokupheliswa kokucinywa kombane, iindleko eziphakamileyo zokuphila kunye nenqanaba eliphezulu lentswela-ngqesho zaphendulwa nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngexesha le-SoNA ngomhla we-9 kweyoMdumba.

src_text: Izwo zwine zwa khou dzhiiwa sa dzone mbilo khulwane, zwine zwa vha fheliswa ha maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, mitengo re nṱhesa ya ṱhoḓea dza misi yoṱhe khathihi na tshikalo tsha shayea ha mishumo tshi re nṱhesa, ndi zwithu zwe zwa ambiwa nga hazwo nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa kha mulaedza wavho wa SoNA nga ḽa 9 Luhuhi.
tgt_text: Malunga nomba wengxaki kacimi-cimi  wombane, uMongameli uqeshe uMphathiswa wezoMbane, uGq Ramokgopa, noza kujongana kuphela nokulwa ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho thola  Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi, Dokotela Vho Ramokgopa, vhane vha ḓo tou lavhelesana tshoṱhe na zwa fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana.
tgt_text: Ukuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza saMandla esinaManqaku amaHlanu kuyaqhuba ngenzondelelo kwaye uMphathiswa wezoMbane kwiiveki ezizayo uza kubhengeza imisebenzi ejolise kuyo u-Eskom ekupheliseni ukucinywa kombane..     UMongameli kwi-SoNA yakhe yowama-2023 wathetha nangamanyathelo amiselweyo okujongana namazinga aphezulu olutsha olungaphangeliyo kunye neendleko zokuphila.

src_text: Zwa thoma shumiswa ha  Pulane ya shuma ya nga ha Fulufulu ya Nṱha Ṱhanu zwazwino zwi kati lwa tshoṱhe nahone Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi vha ḓo ri dzivhegeni dzi ḓaho, vha ḓivhadza zwipikwa zwa mashumele Eskom zwo livhiswaho kha fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana..     Musi zwo ralo, Phresidennde kha mulaedzwa wavho wa  SoNA ya ṅwaha wa 2023, vho amba nga ha maga ane vha hone zwazwino u tandulula thaidzo dza tshikalo tshi re nṱhesa tsha shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa khathihi na engedzea ha mitengo ya ṱhoḓea dza misi yoṱhe.
tgt_text: Ngoko ke, isikhalazo esishiyekileyo kwezi zibaliweyo zolu qhankqalazo likazwelonke sesokufuna ukususa uMongameli Ramaphosa esikhundleni ngeendlela ezingavisisaniyo nomgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Ngauralo, mbilo ine ya tou vha tshone tshidziki tshithihi fhedzi tsha heino migwalabo, ndi ndingedzo dza bvisa  Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa tshiduloni hu tshi shumiswa nḓila dzine dza sa tendelane na ndayotewa.
tgt_text: Sifuna ukubazisa bonke ukuba UKUTSHINTSHA UMBUSO OPHETHEYO NGOKUSEBENZISA IINDLELA EZINXAMNYE NOMGAQO-SISEKO AKUYI KWENZEKA EMZANTSI AFRIKA.

src_text: Ri khou tama ḓivhadza avho vhoṱhe uri ZWA SHANDUKISWA HA MUVHUSO HU TSHI SHUMISWA MAITELE ANE SI ANANE NA NDAYOTEWA ZWI NGA ḒO ITEA FHANO AFRIKA TSHIPEMBE.
tgt_text: Nabani na oneminqweno yokulawula eli lizwe makalinde ukuze angenele unyulo lowama-.

src_text: Ḽihoro ḽifhio na ḽifhio ḽine ḽa vha na dzangalelo ḽa vhusa ḽino shango, ḽi tea imela dzhenela khetho dza nnyi na nnyi dza ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Iinzame zokudala uphazamiseko nezidubedube elizweni ziya kuhlangatyezwana nengalo yomthetho.

src_text: Ndingedzo dza vhanga khakhathi na pfudzungule fhano shangoni dzi ḓo lwiwa nadzo lwa mulayo nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: Kufuneka kwakhona sicacise ukuba akukho vuk’engceni wezopolitiko uza kulukuhla abemi boMzantsi Afrika benze izinto ezinxamnye nomthetho.

src_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra zwi bvisela khagala uri hu na zwiito na zwithihi zwa vhuhokoko ha zwa polotiki zwiṋe zwa ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe nga iṅwe nḓila..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha mafhafhaḓo ane zwiṅwe zwigwada zwa khou amba uri zwo ṋea Khabinethe maḓuvha sumbe uri vale zwikolo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwavile namaqela abhibhidla amazinyo esithi anike iKhabhinethi iintsuku ezisixhenxe ukuba zivalwe izikolo.

src_text: Khaḽendara ya zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, zwa muvhuso na zwa phuraivethe, ye ya anḓadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022, yo no ḓi sumbedzisa ḓuvha ḽa 20 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 sa ḓuvha ḽa holodeyi ya zwikolo yo khetheaho.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda yezikolo zaseMzantsi Afrika yezikolo zikarhulumente nezikolo zabucala, eyapapashwa kwigazethi kweyoKwindla 2022, sele iwubeke njengeholide yesikolo eyodwa umhla wama-20 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Zwo ḓi dzula zwi tshi tou vha khagala uri hu na ndingedzo dza ṱoḓa ḓiita vhafhenyi ngeno zwi songo ralo.
tgt_text: Kudala lo mkhuba wokuqhayisa ngezinto ezingenamsebenzi ukhona, yile nto kanye ngoku aba baphambili kulo mkhuba bafuna ukuyenza, benze ngathi inyanzeliswe ngabo into eqhelekileyo yokwenziwa iholide yesikolo eyodwa kosuku oluphakathi kweentsuku ezimbini zeholide kawonke-wonke..     Inkqubo kaMongameli yobuNkokheli boLutsha.

src_text: Zwenezwo zwo ḓi ralovho na kha vala ha zwikolo phanḓa ha ḓuvha ḽa holodeyi ya nnyi na nnyi..     Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Vhaswa ya Phresidennde.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweNkqubo kaMongameli yobuNkokheli boLutsha nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2023, kwiDyunivesithi yase-Walter Sisulu, eMthatha, nalapho kwasekwa inkqubo yobudlelwane phakathi kwe-Afrika yonkana.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Vhaswa ya Phresidennde nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga ḽa 10 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023, fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Walter Sisulu re ḓoroboni ya Mthatha, ye mbekanyamushumo yeneyi ya ita uri hu vhe na thomiwa ha mbekanyamushumo ya vhuthihi ha Pan-African..     Hezwi zwo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha dzulo ḽa rwelwa ṱari ha tshiimiswa tsha Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Vhurangaphanḓa ha Mikhwa nahone ha vhukati ha mirafho hu tshi itelwa bveledza Afrika ḽa khwine”.
tgt_text: Oku kube yinxalenye yeseshoni yokusungulwa kweNgxoxo yoLutsha luka-Nelson Mandela phantsi komxholo othi: “Ubunkokeli obusesikweni nobuphakathi kwezizukulwana nge-Afrika engcono”.

src_text: Hetshi tshikhala tsha vhurangaphanḓa ha vhukati ha mirafho ndi tshone tshine tsha khwaṱhisa pulane na thendelano dzine dza vha hone zwazwino mona na dzhango nga angaredza fana na iyo ya Adzhenda ya Mbumbano ya  Afrika ya 2063, Thendelanomviswa ya Vhaswa vha Afrika khathihi na Thendelano dza Vhupo ha Mbambadzo yo Vhofholowaho kha Dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Eli qonga lobunkokheli phakathi kwezizukulwana lomeleza izicwangciso nezivumelwano ezikhoyo kwilizwekazi ngokubanzi ezifana ne-Ajenda yeManyano ye-Afrika yowama-2063, uMqulu we-Afrika woLutsha kunye neSivumelwano soMmandla woRhwebelwano weLizwekazi le-Afrika.

src_text: Muhanga wa thendelano dza maga mimoḓoro fhano Afrika Tshipembe .
tgt_text: Isivumelwano seNkqubo-sikhokelo sokwakhiwa kweemoto eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mafhungo uri khamphani ya maga mimoḓoro ḓivhiwaho sa Stellantis South Africa yo saina memorandamu wa thendelano na vha Koporasi ya Mveledziso ya Nḓowetshumo khathihi na vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Phikhisano vha tshi itela fhaṱa tshiimiswa tsha bveledza mimoḓoro miswa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iindaba zokuba inkampani yeemoto i-Stellantis South Africa ityikitye isivumelwano sokusebenzisana ne-Industrial Development Corporation kunye neSebe lezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuze kwakhiwe iziko elitsha lokuvelisa izithuthi eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Vha ha Stellantis ndi vhone vhane vha rengisa mimoḓoro ya Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel na Peugeot kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: I-Stellantis ithengisa i-Jeep, i-Alfa Romeo, i-Fiat, i-Citroën, i-Opel ne-Peugeot eMzantsi Afrika .

src_text: Vhushaka ha shango ḽa Tanzania na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Tanzania.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Muvhuso kha ḽino ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 16 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga Phresidennde Vho Samia Suluhu Hassan vha Riphabuḽiki ya Tanzania, nga murahu ha thambo bva kha mushumisani navho,  Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni oluza eMzantsi Afrika ngoLwesine, umhla we-16 kweyoKwindla 2023 nguMongameli Samia Suluhu Hassan we-United Republic of Tanzania, ngokumenywa ngugxa wakhe, uMongameli Ramaphosa.

src_text: Madalo aya khou vha hone nga murahu ha Khomishini ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa dza Mashango aya Mavhili ane vha Afrika Tshipembe na Tanzania (BNC) ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Pretoria nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 15 Ṱhafamuhwe ḓo dovha hafhu rwela ṱari dzulo ḽa vhuvhili ḽa BNC ya vhukati ha Afrika Tshipembe na Tanzania, ine yo vhumbwa nga komiti nṋa: ya zwa Polotiki na Vhudipuḽomati; Vhupileli na Tsireledzo; Mafhungo zwa Ikonomi, na Mafhungo zwa Matshilisano na Mvelele.
tgt_text: Olu tyelelo lulandela iKomishoni yabaPhathiswa boMzantsi Afrika nabaseTanzania (i-BNC) ebibanjelwe ePitoli ngoLwesithathu, umhla we-15 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Nga nnḓa ha zwa tikedza haḽo Afrika Tshipembe kha nndwa yaḽo ya lwela mbofholowo, shango ḽa Tanzania ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango ane vha mushumisani muhulwane wa ḽino ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhushaka ha zwa mbambadzo, lwe mbambadzo yoṱhe nga angaredza vhukati ha tshaka idzi mbili, ya engedzea bva kha  89 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021 swika kha  71 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Iza kuthwesa iseshoni yesibini ye-BNC yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Tanzania, equka iikomiti ezine: eyezoPolitiko nezoZakuzo; eyoKhuselo noKhuseleko; eyeMicimbi yezoQoqosho, kunye neyezeNtlalo neNkcubeko.

src_text: Hu na khamphani dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe dzi swikaho 250 dzine dza khou shuma kha sekhithara dzo fhambanaho kha ḽa Tanzania.
tgt_text: Ukongeza kumsebenzi wokubambisana noMzantsi Afrika kumzabalazo wenkululeko, i-Tanzania lelinye lamazwe aphambili esirhweba nalo, urhwebo lulonke phakathi kwala mazwe mabini lunyuke ukusuka kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-.

src_text: Ṱhanganyo ya khamphani ya Heineken na ya Distell.
tgt_text: 89 zeerandi ngowama-2021 laya kutsho kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa tendelwa ha ṱhanganyo ya dzitshaka ya khamphani dza vhaingi vha halwa vha Yuropa ḓivhiwaho sa Heineken na vhabveledzi vha halwa vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe, vha ḓivhiwaho sa Distell Group Holdings nga vha Khoro ya Phikhisano.
tgt_text: 71 zeerandi ngowama-.

src_text: Ṱhanganyo iyi, ine ya ḓo vhumba vhabveledzi vhahulwanesa vha halwa vhu ingwaho nga dzhusi ya maapula fhano shangoni, ndi ine ya ḓo tendelwa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na nyimele nnzhi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhadzulapo, dzine dza katela ṱuṱuwedza zwa bveledziswa ha vhaṋetshedzi bvela phanḓa na renga zwibveledzwa na tshumelo dzapo ṱuṱuwedzwa ha vhubindudzi kha zwa ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso khathihi na engedzea ha zwa vhumagi hapo..     Izwi zwiimiswa zwo ṱanganywaho zwi ḓo dovha hafhu zwa ṱuṱuwedza vhuṋe ha bindu nga vhashumi vhaḽo nga bveledza pulane ine ngayo vhashumi vha fhedza vho vha  vhaṋe vha mikovhe khathihi na ṋea vhashumi vhuimeleli kha bodo.
tgt_text: E-Tanzania kukho iinkampani zoMzantsi Afrika ezingaphezu kwama-250 ezirhweba kumacandelo ahlukeneyo.
Ukudityaniswa kwe-Heineken kunye ne-Distell.

src_text: Vhulavhelesi ha Mvelaphanḓa kha zwa Ṱhaḓulo ya Miḓalo ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvunywa yiNkundla yezoKhuphiswano kwesigqibo sokudityaniswa kwenkampani edidiyela utywala yaseYurophu, i-Heineken kunye nevelisa utyalwa yoMzantsi Afrika i-Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mushumo we wa itwa nga Minisṱa wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu,  Mufumakadzi Vho Mmamoloko Kubayi na Miraḓo ya MinMEC ya Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu wa lavhelesa mvelaphanḓa kha zwa sudzuluswa na ṋewa vhudzulo ha tshoṱhe ha miṱa yo kwameaho nga miḓalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei kha vunḓu ḽa KwaZulu-Natal zwenezwo musi shango ḽi tshi khou swika kha tshifhinga tsha tshihumbudzi tsha thoma tsha tshiwo itshi tou bva tshe tsha wela shango ḽashu..     Mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho nga ha Mbuelo dzine dza wanwa nga Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa.
tgt_text: Oku kudityaniswa kwezi nkampani zimbini kuza kudala elona shishini likhulu kweli lizwe elivelisa uhlobo lotywala oluyi-cider, kubekelwe imiqathango ekhokelisa phambili iimfuno zoluntu, eziquka ukuqhutywa kwamaphulo okuphuhlisa ababoneleli-nkonzo, ukuqhubeleka kuthengwa iimveliso zalapha ekhaya, ukukhuthazwa kotyalo-mali kuphando nophuhliso kunye nokwandisa kwesakhono sokuvelisa apha ekhaya.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedzisa kwamea nga zwa phaḓaladzwa ha mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho hune ha khou bvela phanḓa nga ha Mbuelo dza Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa zwi tshi fhambana na zwiṋe zwa vha zwone kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya bvisela khagala mbuelo, tshomedzo dza mushumo na magavhelo Miraḓo ya Khabinethe hu tshi itelwa uri vha kone ita mishumo yavho nga nḓila yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: Le nkampani iza kuzalwa zezi nkampani zimbini zidityanisiweyo iza kuqinisekisa ukuba abasebenzi banezabelo kuyo futhi bayinxalenye yebhodi yayo.

src_text: Nzudzanyo dza Vhudzulo ha Dziminisṱa dzi khou vha hone nga murahu ha Thendelano dza 1910 dza musi hu tshi vhumbiwa Mbumbano ya Afrika Tshipembe ine ya vha yone ye ya ta misanda miraru ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ine khayo,  Pretoria ya vha yone Musanda wa Shango, Bloemfontein ya vha yone Musanda wa zwa Vhulamukanyi ngeno Cape Town yo vha yone Musanda wa hune ha vha na Phalamennde.
tgt_text: UkuHlola iNkqubela ngoNcedo lweZikhukula zowama-.

src_text: Nnḓu idzo dzine ha khou pfi dzi tou vha maḓu vhunzhilinzhili, dzoṱhe dzo rengwa phanḓa ha ṅwaha wa 1994 ngeno hu na uri muvhuso wo ḓaho nga murahu we wa rangwa phanḓa nga African National Congress wo tou ita fhedzi uri hu vhe na ṱhogomelo yo teaho ya nnḓu dzenedzo itela uri dzi dzule dzi na ndeme yo teaho uri dzi kone vhuelwa nga gonya ha ndeme ya ndaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umsebenzi owenziwe nguMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa koLuntu, uNksz Mmamoloko Kubayi kunye namaLungu e-MinMEC yokuHlaliswa koLuntu wokuhlola umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokufunelwa kweendawo zokuhlala ezisisigxina iintsapho ezazichatshazelwe zizikhukula zowama-2022 kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal njengoko sele kuzakuphela unyaka kwenzeka ezi zikhukula ngowama-.
Iingxelo ezingeyonyaniso malunga neziBonelelo zabaPhathiswa kunye nooSekela-baPhathiswa.

src_text: Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa vhane vha shumisa nnḓu dze vha ṋetshedzwa dzone nga muvhuso vha badela rennde nga nḓila fanaho na zwine miraḓo ya phalamennde vha itisa zwone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukuxhalaba zingxelo ezingeyonyaniso  ngeziBonelelo zabaPhathiswa nooSekela-Baphathiswa ezicaciswe kwiSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba esiLawulayo, esichaza izibonelelo, izixhobo zokusebenza kunye namaqithi-qithi aMalungu eSigqeba ukuze enze umsebenzi wawo ngokufanelekileyo.

src_text: Zwi ḓo vha zwi si zwavhuḓi lavhelela uri Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa vhane vho ngo tsireledzea kha mishumo yavho ya zwino vha tou ḓiṱoḓela madzulo avho vhone vhaṋe musi vha tshi khou shumela lushaka..     Zwiendedzi zwine zwa shumiswa nga Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa zwi elana zwavhuḓi na Ministerial Handbook nahone ndeme yazwo ya nṱhesa tiwa nga Minisṱa wa zwa Masheleni vha tshi khou shumisana na Minisṱa wa zwa Mapholisa nga ha zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo.
tgt_text: Isigqibo ngeziNdlu ezisisiBonelelo zabaPhathiswa sathathwa kwisiVumelwano sowe-1910 ngethuba lokusekwa koManyano loMzantsi Afrika apho kwamiselwa ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uza kuba nezixeko ezithathu eziza kudlala indima yokuba likomkhulu: iPitoli iza kuba liKomkhulu likaRhulumente, iBloemfontein yona ibe liKomkhulu leCandelo leeNkundla, ize yona iKapa ibe liKomkhulu lezoWiso-mthetho okanye elinePalamente.

src_text: Zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo ndi zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme musi hu tshi tiwa mitengo ya nṱhesa nahone zwiwo zwine zwa si vhe zwavhuḓi zwa zwenezwino zwa musi  dziMEC vha tshi lozwa matshilo avho kana vha vha kha khombo dza moḓoro dzi shushaho, zwi ombedzela ndeme ya fhungo iḽi nahone ḽi tei shumiswa nga nḓila ya ḓiṱoḓela mbuno dza zwa polotiki..     Miraḓo yoṱhe ya Phalamennde vha tewa nga vha na vhashumi vhavho vha thikhedzo vhane vha vha thusa kha ita mishumo yavho.
tgt_text: Ezi zindlu kuthiwa zifana namabhotwe zonke zathengwa phambi kowe-1994 kwaye urhulumente okhokelwa yi-African National Congress yena uqinisekisa nje ukuba ziyalungiswa ukuze amaxabiso wazo angehli, ahlale esenyuka njengazo zonke izindlu zexabiso.

src_text: Phambano kha tshivhalo tsha vhashumi vha thikhedzo kha ofisi dza Dziminisṱa vha hone nga mulandu wa tshifhinga tshe Minisṱa onoyo tholwa ngatsho sa izwi vhashumi vhoṱhe vha tshi ṱumanywa na themo ya ofisi ya Minisṱa onoyo.
tgt_text: Abaphathiswa kunye nooSekela baPhathiswa abasebenzisa izindlu zombini ezibonelelwe nguRhulumente bahlawula irenti ngendlela efanayo naleyo yenziwa ngamalungu epalamente.

src_text: Hezwi zwo ralo nga mulandu wa uri Ministerial Handbook ndi ḽiṅwalo ḽine ḽa dzulela shandulwa misi yoṱhe..     Phresidennde vho rumela Ministerial Handbook ine ya vha hone zwazwino kha vha Khomishini ya nga ha Miholo ya Vhaofisiri vha kha Ofisi Khulwane dza Muvhuso yo Ḓiimisaho nga Yoṱhe ine zwazwino ndi yone ine ya sedzana na zwa miholo ya vhaofisiri vhoṱhe vha ofisi khulwane dza muvhuso uri senguluswe     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Iya kuba yinto engalunganga ukulindela ukuba abaPhathiswa kunye nooSekela baPhathiswa abanemisebenzi engesosigxina ukuba bazifunele ngokwabo iindawo zokuhlala ngelixa besebenzela isizwe.

src_text: Mvetamveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhafumakadzi vha zwa Mitambo.
tgt_text: Izithuthi ezisetyenziswa ngabaPhathiswa kunye namaSekela abo zivumelekile ngokwemigaqo ekwiNcwadana yabaPhathiswa futhi ixabiso limiselwa nguMphathiswa wezeMali ngokubonisana noMphathiswa wamaPolisa kwiinkalo zokhuseleko.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhafumakadzi vha zwa Mitambo hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Ubuxhaka-xhaka nezinye izibonelelo zezokhuseleko ezifakelwa kuzo budlala indima xa kumiselwa ixabiso lazo futhi iziganeko ezibuhlungu zakutsha nje ze-MECs zokuphulukana nobomi babo okanye ukubandakanyeka kwiingozi ezimbi zemoto zigxininisa ukubaluleka kwalo mba kwaye kufuneka ungasetyenziswa njengomba onxulumene nezopolitiko.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele bvisela khagala mutevhe wa maga ane ḓo ṱuṱuwedza na tikedza vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na mbekanyamaitele dza fhelisa thaidzo dza tshayandingano ya zwa mbeu kha mitambo yo fhambanaho na zwiimiswa zwa hone dovha hafhu ya tandulula thaidzo dza zwikhukhulisi zwa dzhena ha vhafumakadzi kha mitambo zwi ngaho shayea ha masheleni, ndambedzo na miholo songo eḓanaho.
tgt_text: Onke amalungu ePalamente anelungelo lokuba abenabasebenzi ababancedisayo kwii-ofisi zawo ukuze akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wawo.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ine ya khou dzinginywa yo livhiswa kha ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo na vhurangaphanḓa nga nḓila yo engedzeaho fana na zwa vhugudisi na vha malogwane.
tgt_text: Umahluko kwinani labasebenzi abanika inkxaso kwii-ofisi zabaPhathiswa unxulumene nexesha lokuqeshwa koMphathiswa othile, njengoko bonke aba basebenzi beqeshwa kunye nokuqeshwa koMphathiswa othile.
Oku kungenxa yokuba iNcwadana yabaPhathiswa luxwebhu oluhlaziywa rhoqo.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele dzhiela nṱha uri zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo na vhurangaphanḓa zwo engedzeaho, zwi ḓo fhungudza vhukuma khathihi na fhelisa lwa tshoṱhe zwa tshayandingano ya mbeu khathihi na zwiito zwo fhambanaho zwa khethululo itelwaho vhafumakadzi dovha hafhu ya lavhelela ṱuṱuwedza ndinganelo khathihi na vhona uri vhafumakadzi vha khou wana ṱhonifho na dzhielwa nṱha kha maimo phurofeshenaḽa, hu tshi katelwa na miholo linganaho sa vhashumisani vhavho vha vhanna farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mutakalo wa Vhomme na Dzitshetshe dzavho -.
tgt_text: UMongameli uthumele le Ncwadana yabaPhathiswa ikhoyo ngoku kwiKomishoni eziMeleyo yeMivuzo yabaSebenzi be-Ofisi kaRhulumente, esele ijongene nemivuzo yabo bonke amagosa karhulumente ukuba iphonononge     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṋea thendelo ya uri shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mutakalo wa Vhomme na Dzitshetshe dzavho khaḽo fhaḽa Ḓoroboni ya Kapa bva nga ḽa  8 swika 11 Shundunthule 2023, une muṱangano uyo wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga vhashelamulenzhe vha swikaho 1 000 bva ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe vha tshi lingedza wana thandululo nga ṱavhanya dza khwinifhadza tshikhala tsha tshila ha vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho khathihi na thivhela zwa bebwa ha vhana vho no lovha.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo waManina akwiMidlalo.
IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo wamaNina akwiMidlalo ukuze uluntu luhlomle kuwo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha ndingedzo dza swikela Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu zwa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN) hu tshi itelwa mutakalo wa vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho khathihi na zwa thivhelwa ha vhana vhane vha bebwa vho no lovha.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwamanyathelo aza kukhuthaza kwaye axhase abasetyhini kwezemidlalo nokuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zikhona ukulungisa ukungalingani ngokwesini kwiintlobo zemidlalo kunye namaqumrhu ezemidlalo.

src_text: Shango ḽashu ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa vhuelwa vhukuma musi vhueni ha muṱangano uyu vhu tshi ḓo vha vhu tshi khou kovhana zwinzhi nga ha pulane na mihumbulo yavho ine ya khou shuma zwavhuḓi ya nga ha mafhungo kwamaho mutakalo wa vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho.
tgt_text: Ikwajongana nemiqobo yokungena kwabasetyhini kwezemidlalo efana nokunqongophala kwenkxaso-mali, izibonelelo zemali kunye nomvuzo onganelanga.

src_text: Thandela ya nga ha Nḓila dza Vhufa ha Nndwa ya Mbofholowo na Mbofholowo  (RLHR).
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo unenjongo yokukhuthaza wokunyusa inani labasetyhini abathatha inxaxheba  kwimidlalo nabakwizikhundla zokukhokela ezifana nokuba ngumqeqeshi okanye usompempe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wo dodombedzwaho wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha thandela ya RLHR.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uyakuqonda ukuba ukwanda kwenani labantu basetyhini abathatha inxaxheba kwezemidlalo nabakwizikhundla zokukhokela kuzakuphelisa le ngxaki yokungalingani ngokwesini kunye nezinye iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zocalucalulo olujoliswe kwabasetyhini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya tendela zwa uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa zwa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano khathihi na Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa  zwa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Ndulamiso vha vhe tshipiḓa tsha Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa (IMC) kha RLHR..     RLHR ndi thandela ya vhea mafhungo ṱhohoni ya lushaka yo livhiswaho kha fhululedza na pembelela nḓila ya Afrika Tshipembe ya livha kha mbofholowo.
tgt_text: Ikwafuna ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini bayayinikwa indawo yabo xa bekwididi labahlawulwayo kwezemidlalo, kuquka nokuhlawulwa imivuzo elinganayo neyabadlali abangamadoda.

src_text: Khabinethe yo vhumba IMC itela lavhelesa thandela iyi khathihi na ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha zwa polotiki.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kweNkomfa yeHlabathi yowama-2023 yeMpilo yooMama AbaKhulelweyo neeNtsana eziSanda kuZalwa.

src_text: Thandela iyi ndi ine ya khou lavhelela katela tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza vhea mafhungo ṱhohoni nga ha vhuḓiṋetshedzeli he vhalwelambofholowo vha vhu ita vha tshi itela uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe shango ḽo vhofholowaho nahone ḽa demokirasi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu kone fhaṱwa mimuziamu, zwihumbudzi, dziḽaiburari na mbulungelo nahone yo livhiswa kha dzhiela nṱha maitele vhuthihi na tshumisano vhukati ha vhathu vha Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inike imvume yokuba uMzantsi Afrika ubambe iNkomfa yeHlabathi yooMama Abakhulelweyo neeNtsana Ezisanda kuZalwa ukususela ngomhla we-8 ukuya kowe-11 kuCanzibe ngowama-2023, apho amahlakani angaphezulu kwe-1 000 avela kwihlabathi jikelele aza kudibana ukuze kukhawuleziswe izisombululo zokuphucula umgangatho wempilo yoomama abakhulelweyo kunye neentsana ezisanda kuzalwa, kunye ukuthintela ukuzalwa kwabantwana beswelekile.

src_text: Yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedzwa nga vha UN nahone na khonadzeo ya khwaṱhisa tshumisano vhukati ha vhathu na vhathu nga shumisa mvelele na vhufa mona na dzhango ḽoṱhe ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wenze inkqubela phambili enkulu ekufezekiseni iinjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo zeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) zempilo yoomama abakhulelweyo nabantwana abasanda kuzalwa, kunye nothintelo lokubeleka sele beswelekile.

Ilizwe liza kuxhamla kakhulu njengoko abathunywa benkomfa beza kwabelana, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ngezicwangciso zabo ezisebenzayo kunye nezinto ezintsha kwimiba yempilo yoomama  abakhulelweyo nabantwana abasanda kuzalwa.

src_text: Vhunzhi ha mishumo ye ya itwa nga ṅwaha wa 2022 ndi ine ya katela madalo Minisṱa u ya ngei Botswana na Zimbabwe hu tshi katelwa na dzudzanya miṱangano na mashango ngaho Angola na Tanzania..     Mishumo ine ya khou itwa kha iyi thandela, ndi ye ya livhiswa kha ṱumanya mashango oṱhe Tshipembe ha Afrika khathihi na funza vhaswa nga ha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa vhukoḽoni na khethululo nga lukanda.
tgt_text: Iprojekthi ye-Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (i-RLHR).

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele na yone ita uri hu kone vha na khonadzeo dza vhuisela murahu hayani masalela vhalwelambofholowo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha vhulungwa kha mashango nnḓa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo yenkqubela eneenkcukacha malunga nokuphunyezwa kweprojekthi ye-RLHR.

src_text: Mavhiḓa linganaho 11 ane ḓivhiwa sa mavhiḓa vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe swika he ṱaluswa fhaḽa kha shango ḽa Zambia, hu tshi katelwa na iḽo ḽa Ḽizhakanḓila ḽa mulwelambofholowo Vho Duma Nokwe..     Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Vhutsila, Mvelele na Vhufa zwi vhe nga nḓila ya Didzhithaḽa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwavumile ukuba uMphathiswa wezoBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano kunye kunye nowezoBulungisa kunye neeNkonzo zoLuleko babe yinxalenye yeKomiti yabaPhathiswa (i-IMC) ejongene ne-RLHR.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Vhutsila, Mvelele na Vhufa zwi vhe nga nḓila ya Didzhithaḽa uri thome shuma.
tgt_text: I-RLHR yiprojekthi yesikhumbuzo yesizwe ejolise ekukhumbuleni nasekubhiyozeleni indlela yoMzantsi Afrika esa enkululekweni.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Zwiko zwa Vhufa zwi vhe zwa Didzhithaḽa ye ya bveledzwa nga Muhasho wa Vhutsila na Mvelele wa kale nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iseke i-IMC ukuba yongamele le projekthi kwaye ibonelele ngobunkokeli bezopolitiko.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo lavhesesa kha zwa ita uri zwiko zwa vhufa zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri zwi kone vhulungea swikelelea khathihi na uri hu kone vha na ndangulo ya vhuṋe.
tgt_text: Le projekthi ijonge ukuquka iintlobo ngeentlobo zezikhumbuzo zezinto ezancanywa ngamajoni enkululeko esenzela  uMzantsi Afrika ukuba ukhululeke kwaye ube nentando yesininzi.

src_text: Naho aya maitele u ita uri zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa tshi tou vha maitele u shandukisa mafhungo bva kha anaḽogo ya kha didzhithaḽa, hu tshi katelwa na rekhode dza mabambiri, microfiche na mafhungo rekhodiwaho kha theiphi dzine dza si vhe dza didzhithaḽa, mbekanyamaitele yo lapfisa ṱhalutshedzo iyi ya vho katela zwiko zwo dzulaho zwi zwa dzidzhithaḽa tou bva na mathomoni fana na mafhungo a bveledzwa nga nḓila ya didzhithaḽa ane nga si vhuye bva shandukiselwa ya kha tshivhumbeo tshi fareaho..     Aya maitele u ita uri zwiko izwi zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa ḓo vha na mbuelo nnzhi kha shango sa izwi tshi ḓo ita uri hu kone vha na tswikelo yo leluwaho ya zwiko zwa mafhungo, nga maanḓa izwo zwine zwa vha fhethu ha mbulungelo, dziḽaiburari na mimuziamu.
tgt_text: Ukwavumela ulwakhiwo lweemyuziyam, amatye ezikhumbuzo, amathala eencwadi noovimba, kwaye jolise ekuqondeni umoya wembumba yamanyama nentsebenziswano phakathi kwama-Afrika.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha mihasho yoṱhe ya muvhuso na tshitshavha nga angaredza     Mulayotibe.
tgt_text: Ivunywe yi-UN kwaye inamandla okuqinisa intsebenziswano phakathi kwabantu ngokusebenzisa inkcubeko kunye nelifa lemveli kwilizwekazi lonke.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Vhulamukanyi, wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi eyenzekileyo ngowama-2022 iquka utyelelo lwabaPhathiswa eBotswana naseZimbabwe kwakunye nokwenza amalungiselelo okubamba iintlanganiso e-Angola nase-Tanzania.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Vhulamukanyi, wa ṅwaha wa 2023 ngei Phalamenndeni.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi ejikeleze le projekthi ijolise ekudibaniseni onke amazwe akuMazantsi e-Afrika kunye nokufundisa abantu abatsha malunga nomzabalazo wokulwa ubukoloniyali kunye nobuhlanga.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelala khwinisa Milayo yo fhambanaho ine ya vha nga fhasi ha ndangulo ya Muhasho wa zwa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Ndayotewa nga tandulula mafhungo zwa thekiniki khathihi na zwithu zwine zwa kwama shumiswa ha Milayo nga nḓila re khagala.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kuvulela nokuba kubuyiswe amathambo amajoni enkululeko aseMzantsi Afrika angcwatywa kumazwe angaphandle.

src_text: Mulayotibe na zwiteṅwa zwa 37 zwine khazwo ha khou dzinginywa khwiniso itela khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze ha ndayotewa kha Milayo yo fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Kukho amangcwaba amalunga ne-11 aziwayo ukuba ngawabemi boMzantsi Afrika athe abhaqwa e-Zambia, aquka elo legqala loMzabalazo uMnu Duma Nokwe.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi lwezoBugcisa, iNkcubeko kunye namaFa eMveli.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza mulaedza wavho wa ḓuvha kha vhuṱambo ha lushaka ha elelwa Ḓuvha ḽa Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ha ṅwaha wa 2023 nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 fhaḽa Tshitediamu tsha De Aar West, kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Devhula..     Thero ya uno ṅwaha ndi ine ya ri: “U khwaṱhisa na Bvela Phanḓa na Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ho Livhiwa kha Vhumatshelo”, zwenezwo musi ri tshi khou elelwa mabulayo fhaḽa Sharpeville na Langa hu tshi katelwa na miṅwe migwalabo ye ya vha hone nga ḽa 21 Ṱhafamuhwe 1960 mona na shango ḽoṱhe..     Sa muvhuso, ri kha ḓi vha ro ḓiimisela kha zwa vhuḓifhinduleli ha ndayotewa ha tsireledza pfanelo dza vhuthu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi lwezoBugcisa, iNkcubeko kunye namaFa eMveli ukuba uphunyezwe.

src_text: Kha ri shumisane itela vhona uri hu na ane khou salela murahu musi ri tshi khou lingedza ita uri mbetshelwa dza Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 khathihi na Mulayotibe wa Pfanelo zwi vhe zwithu zwine zwa kona swikelwa nga vhathu vhoṱhe.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uzalisekisa  uMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi ngamaFa eMveli owaqulunqwa  liSebe langaphambili lezoBugcisa neNkcubeko ngoko ngowama-.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Maḓi ḽa Ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo umalunga nokufakwa kwikhompyutha kolwazi olunxulumene namafa emveli kusenzelwa ukuba lugcinwe, lufumaneke lula futhi kwaziwe nabanikazi balo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya zwa Maḓi ya Lushaka bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 26 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱavhanyedzisa Tshanduko”..     Vhege iyi kho fhululedzwa nga tshifhinga tshithihi na  Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Maḓi ḽa Ḽifhasi nga ḽa 22 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023, ḽine ḽa vha ḓuvha ḽi ombedzelaho ndeme ya maḓi kunaho.
tgt_text: Nangona inkqubo yokufaka kwikhompyutha iyinkqubo yokuguqula ulwazi olushicilelwe emaphepheni lube lulwazi olushicilelwe kwikhompyutha, kuquka amaphepha aselugcinweni aneenkcukacha, i-microfiche kunye neteyiphu ezingashicilelwanga kubuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla,  lomgaqo-nkqubo uye wayihlomela le nkcazelo yaquka nemithombo yolwazi eshicilelwe ngobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwasekuqaleni efana nolwazi oluveliswa ngeekhompyutha, lona olungasoze lushicelelwe ephepheni okanye kwesinye isixhobo esibambekayo.

src_text: Naho ho vha na mvula dze dza na vhukuma zwenezwino kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha shango ḽi re na ṱhahelelo ya maḓi nahone ḽi dzhiiwa sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango 30 shayesaho maḓi ḽifhasini.
tgt_text: Ukufakwa kolwazi kwikhompyutha kuza kulinceda kakhulu eli lizwe njengoko kuza kwenza ukuba kube lula ukufumana imithombo yolwazi, ingakumbi leyo igcinwe koovimba bolwazi, amathala eencwadi kunye neemyuziyam.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha tsireledze zwiko zwashu zwa maḓi fana na maroroma sa izwi hezwi zwi zwiko zwa ndeme kha zwa nḓisedzo ya maḓi ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kusetyenziswa ngurhulumente wonke nakuluntu ngokubanzi     Umthetho osaYilwayo.

src_text: Roṱhe, ri na zwine ra nga ita kha lingedza vhulunga maḓi khathihi na ita uri zwiko zwashu zwi si swike hune zwa nga xa..     Ḓuvha ḽa Vhulwadze ha Lufhiha (TB) ḽa Ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMiba yeeNkundla wowama-.

src_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Paul Mashatile vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tsha ḓuvha nga tshifhinga tsha vhuṱambo ha tshiofisi ha elelwa nga ha Ḓuvha ḽa TB ḽa Ḽifhasi nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ee!
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMiba yeNkundla wowama-.

src_text: Nṋe na Vhone Ri nga Fhelisa Dwadze ḽa TB”..     Vhuṱambo ha tshiofisi vhune ha ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tsha Thlabane vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela vhu ḓo thusa kha ḽa uri Khoro ya Lushaka ya Afrika Tshipembe ya nga ha AIDS khathihi na rwelwa ṱari ha Pulane ya Ndeme ya Lushaka ya nga ha Dwadze ḽa TB, HIV na ayo Fhiriselwaho nga zwa Vhudzekani kha miṅwaha ya bva nga 2023 swika kha.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ujolise ekuhlomeleni iMithetho emininzi elawulwa liSebe lezoBulungisa noPhuhliso loMgaqo-siseko ngokujongana nemiba yobugcisa kunye nemiba echaphazela ukusebenza ngokubonakalayo kwale Mithetho.

src_text: Hezwi zwi khou tou vha ḓadzisa kha mvelaphanḓa khulwane vhukuma ye ya swikelwa nga mulandu wa tou lavhelesa tshoṱhe kha zwa thivhela ilafha shumisa mishonga na tevhedza vhiga na tevhedza khathihi na fhelisa zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo na nyefula         Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ayo u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Thimu ya The Proteas ine zwazwino ya khou tamba na thimu ya West Indies kha madalo zwivhumbeo zwo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho usaYilwayo uqulathe amagatya angama-37 aphakamisa izilungiso ukulungisa iindawo ezinxamnye nomgaqo-siseko kwiMithetho eyahlukeneyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha tikedze thimu ya The Proteas zwenezwo musi tshi khou bvela phanḓa na fhefheḓisa fulaha yashu nṱha..     Maipfi ndiliso Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa na mashaka a: MEC wa Muhasho wa Pfunzo wa vunḓu ḽa Free State, Vho Tate Makgoe (60), vhe vha shela mulenzhe vhukuma kha sekhithara ya zwa pfunzo lwe vha fhedza vho kona ranga phanḓa zwavhuḓi vunḓu ḽa Free State kha uri ḽi wane tshikalo tsha nṱhesa tsha vhagudi vho phasaho maṱiriki kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miṋa nga tevhekana.
tgt_text: Usuku lwamaLungelo oLuntu.

src_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Maurencia Gillion, vhe vha vha vha tshi imela vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela kha Khoro ya Mavunḓu ya Lushaka vha dovha hafhu vha shuma na kha Komiti ya Tshumelo dza zwa Mutakalo na Matshilisano ya NCOP.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kwenza intetho ephambili kumsitho wesizwe woSuku lwamaLungelo oLuntu lowama-2023 ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-21 kweyoKwindla 2023 e-De Aar West Stadium, eMntla Koloni.

src_text: Vho vha vhe mulwelambofholowo ḓivheaho nahone vho shumela vhathu vha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela, nga maanḓa kha zwipiḓa zwa vhupo ha mahayani zwa vunḓu ḽeneḽo lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha minzhi.
tgt_text: Umxholo walo nyaka uthi: “UkuBethelela nokuKhusela amaLungelo oLuntu kuLungiselelwa Amangomso”, njengoko sikhumbula inyhikityha  yokubulawa kwentlaninge yabantu e-Sharpeville nakwaLanga, kunye neminye imingcelele eyathi yaqhutywa ngomhla wama-21 kweyoKwindla kowe-1960 kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Vho John Wills (66), ramilayo na mulwelambofholowo lwelaho pfanelo dza vhathu ḓivheaho we ḓo imela vhunzhi ha vharangaphanḓa vha zwa polotiki, hu tshi katelwa na  Phresidennde wa kale Vho Nelson Mandela.Vho Mark Pilgrim (54), muthu ḓivheaho kha zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo we dovha  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhanzhi kha yeneyi nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente, sihlala sizibophelele kuxanduva lomgaqo-siseko lokukhusela amalungelo abantu bonke elizweni.

src_text: Mufumakadziwavhaṋe Vho Gloria Bosman (50), ramuzika na musiki wa dzinyimbo wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ane vha muwini wa pfufho dza zwa muzika dzo fhambanaho ane lidza muzika wa jazz   tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.
tgt_text: Masisebenzisane ukuqinisekisa ukuba asishiyi namnye ngasemva ekwenzeni izibonelelo zoMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 kunye noMqulu wamaLungelo oLuntu zibe yinyani ephilayo kumntu wonke.

src_text: Miraḓo ya Khorongeletshedzi ya Ndangulo ya Tshikimu tsha Vhuṋe ha Tshipiḓa tsha Mavu     Muambeli Vho Boyce Mkhize (Mudzulatshidulo)     Khosi Vho Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Muthusamudzulatshidulo)     Mufumakadzi Vho Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Vho Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Muambeli Vho Nomonde Nokuthula January     Vho Iqbal Mohamed Motala; na     Dokotela Vho Vuyisani Moss..     Miraḓo ya Khomishini ya Vhomadzhisiṱaraṱa     Mufumakadzi Vho Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    Vho Hanif Vally;(iii)    Dokotela Vho Cornelia September;(iv)    Vho Makgabhana Mokoena (vha khou tou dovha tholwa hafhu); na     Phurofesa Vho Estelle Hurter (vha khou tou dovha tholwa hafhu).
tgt_text: Usuku lwaManzi lweHlabathi.
